story:
Product description:

T-holder is made up of different elastic layers, which help to keep your shirt in place. The elastic bands are attached to another band, which is covered in elastic material. This band is comfortably wrapped around your thigh. At the end of the band there are several clips, which you then attach to your shirt to keep it in place.  


 How to choose the proper size

On the basis of the tests and measurements we performed, we found out that the optimal size is approximately 15cm/5,9inch smaller than the widest part of your thigh.

Example: If your thigh is 55 centimeters/21,7 inch wide, your optimal size is 40 cm/ 15,7 inch, which corresponds to M in our table.

Note: if your thigh is wider or thinner than the max/min number in our table, we can make a custom T-holder just for you.


Perk system              

T-holder comes exclusively in black colour, that means black elastic bands, material and buckles. With it you recieve a bag, which is also black.


 Plan 

Plan The idea of T-Holder was born in the beginning of 2014. At first, we had a lot of doubts about the product, we didn't know if it would appeal to the people. But in December we decided to get it started. We created several different prototypes and put them to the test, thus creating the optimal version of T-Holder. In February we will launch a kickstarter campaign. If we get enough funds, we will buy the materials and start the production, as soon as we have enough finances to get it going. If everything goes according to plan, the first T-Holders will be avaliable in June 2015!


Shipping  

The one thing you really do not need to worry about is the shipping. It will be totally free, thanks to our business partners. The package will be delivered to your home safely in just a few days. When the campaign is over, you will recieve a questionnaire, where you will be asked to put down your personal information (address, phone number) and information about the product (size, colour, classic/custom).

Acknowledgements

I would really like to thank the people who have helped me and made the birth of T-holder possible, as well as its presentation on Kickstarter. 

Gregor Rihtaršič, Rok Berglez, Toni Mlakar, the crew in charge of the presentation film. They perfected my basic story with their incredible ideas, humour and a lot of talent for making quality clips. 

Luka Krek, a language intermediation student, has made it possible that you can read everything about T-Holder in proper English. 

Aljaž Mrak, a student of the Academy of Arts, designed the 3D models of the T-holder, all the spreadsheets and also our web page as a whole. 

Team of dressmakers, lovely ladies who are making sure that T-holders of the best quality become a part of your everyday life.

Niko Klanšek, business advisor

story:
Tag Anything - Never Lose it - SmartTag Finds It!  

SmartTag What's Important to You... 

The SmartTag - Never Lose Anything Again!

The SmartTag is a Bluetooth low-energy tracking alarm. Pair it with your iOS or Android phone or tablet and if you walk away from your tagged item, the SmartTag will emit an audible alarm, and at the same time your Smartphone will ring to let you know you have lost connection between your phone and your tagged item. Using Google Maps on your Smartphone you can also see where you and your item were separated. Lost your phone? Press the SmartTag button & your phone rings. Lost your tagged item? Press the "Find Me" button on the App, the SmartTag will ring. 
   Cool Bonus: the SmartTag is also a Selfie Remote for your cell camera! 

The WalletTag - Never Lose Your Wallet Again!

 The WalletTag Bluetooth Tracker

At just 3mm thin, the WalletTag is the slimmest tracking device in the world! It's a Bluetooth low-energy silent alarm tracker. Pair it with your iOS or Android phone or tablet and if you walk away from your tagged item, the WalletTag will alert your Smartphone/tablet to let you know you have lost connection between your phone and your wallet/purse etc. Using Google Maps on your Smartphone you can also see where you and your item were separated. Lost your phone or tablet? Press the button on your WalletTag, your device will ring to help you locate it. 
  Cool Bonus: the WalletTag is also a Selfie Remote for your cell camera! 

  Ideal for iOS, works with Android too. iOS can tag 4 items, Android can tag 2 items.
      

Locate Lost Items in the App

 App links to Google Maps for accuracy

 

 Download the free App. See it here: Free VB app 

 Adjust the sensitivity from near to far

 Set the volume from low to high

 Set custom alarm sounds

   If your phone is on silent, your tag can notify you of incoming calls

 Drop a marker where you parked your car

 Find out where you lost your tagged item

Use either tag as a remote control for your cell camera

Availability: Currently the SmartTag is only available in black or Ladybug red.
As we grow this indiegogo campaign, we will issue updates on availability for the other colors. The more backers we achieve the more chances we have of funding the extra colors. As more colors become available you will be emailed prior to shipping to ask if you'd like a different color.
App Updates & Modification
The WalletTag is purposely designed to NOT make a sound, thereby not alerting other people to YOUR cash and credit cards. So, as we grow the backers and funding, we will improve the WalletTag App function to include a distance indicator, in addition to the map location function. 
VoyagerBlue Unique Asset & Identity Protection 
Thanks to these combined RFID and Bluetooth tracker products you can protect your identity, your data, your cash, your laptop and more  with one unique system.

BONUS GIFT WITH CERTAIN PERKS

                 Depending on your donation level, we will also add 1, 2, 3 or 4 unique                   patented RFID-blocking credit card shields to your order!

    

With the ever-increasing concern over credit card theft and now with the latest "tap & pay" contactless credit cards in stores and on transit systems, protect yourself from accidental payments and identity theft. Just place this patented RFID-blocking credit & debit card shield in your wallet over your contactless cards to protect yourself from accidental payments and credit card skimming theft. 

         



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute right now, that doesn't mean you can't help:

Ask your friends to get the word out and share this idea with them. Just use the Indiegogo social media links and email your friends. Thank you!

FAQ's

How big are the Tags?

The WalletTag measures 50mm x 30mm and is only 3mm thin (2" x 1 & 3/16" x 0.11") – THE WORLD'S THINNEST TRACKER AVAILABLE TODAY!

The SmartTag measures 60mm x 35mm x 12mm (2.5" x 1.5" x 0.5").

How many Tag devices can a Smartphone pair with?

Using the free App, an iOS Smartphone can manage up to 4 Tags at once or 2 Tags on Android.

How do I replace the battery in my Tag?

Both devices have a simple sliding door to make battery replacement easy. WalletTag uses a single CR2016 battery (supplied). SmartTag uses a single CR2032 battery (supplied).

What is the range of Tag?

Both Tags have a range of approximately 150 feet radius.

How do the Tags attach to items?

The WalletTag is super slim & slips inside any wallet or purse without detection. It also has a custom pouch available. The SmartTag comes with a key chain.

How are these Tags different from other locator products?

1) They each have a Selfie Remote!! C'mon, how cool is that?

2)Two-Way Technology with the SmartTag: Find your item using your phone or find your phone using your SmartTag. (Note the WalletTag can find your phone, but the WalletTag itself is silent and cannot ring - it's specifically designed that way as a warning device for losing your wallet - i.e. your cash, so it doesn't let everyone else know!)

3) The WalletTag is THE THINNEST TRACKER AVAILABLE ON THE PLANET: only 3mm (0.11") thin.

4) Loss Proximity Alarm: Notifies you when you leave an item behind as well as remembers where you left the item as shown within the app on Google Maps.

Are the Tags water resistant?

The device will last through rain but isn't waterproof. 

What version of iOS are these Tags compatible with?

They are compatible with iOS 6 & up - Max 4 tags

Are they compatible with Android?

Yes, Android OS 4.4 & up - Max 2 tags

* Android currently pairs with a maximum of 2 Tags

And Here's the Technical Stuff...

Smartphone Compatibility for the WalletTag & SmartTag App:

iOS Version 6 & above

Android OS version 4.4 & above

iPhone: Versions 4S/5/5C/5S/6/6+ operating iOS 6 & above 

iPad Version 3 and above operating iOS 6 & above. iPad Mini, all versions operating iOS 6 & above. iPad Air & iPod Touch (Version 4) operating iOS 6 & above 

Samsung: Galaxy S3/4/5/Note 3: Android OS, v4.4, Bluetooth® v4.0, Galaxy J: Android OS, Galaxy Round, Galaxy Note 10.1 (2014 Edition), Galaxy S4 mini:  

SONY Xperia Z1, Xperia Z Ultra 

LG Nexus 5  

HTC One Max

Asus Google Nexus 7 (2013), Asus PadFone Min

Motorola Moto G

  • Communications Standard: Bluetooth® 4.0 Low Energy Wireless Technology

  • Thin design "WalletTag" (silent alarm) slips inside your existing wallet and purse easily (3mm / 0.11" thick), or you can purchase the custom-made Tag holder/clip

  • "SmartTag" (audible alarm) can be clipped to your bag, suitcase, child in the mall or any item you wish to tag

  • Search Cover Range: 164 Ft/50m 

  • Alert Range: User adjustable up to 50ft

  • Low cost & durable

story:
Co-owned by Paul Simmons and Amber Hochbein, Posa Apparel is a Colorado based company that has redefined traditional style by blending high end-fashion with optimal function. We have a patent pending design on a signature product called a POSA, which is our modern reinterpretation of the common scarf. Not only is the POSA smart, sleek, chic, and sophisticated, but it is built with performance in mind. 


Our Story

When Amber was nineteen years old, her mother passed away from cancer and butterflies became a symbol for her mother and a way for her family to commemorate her life. Two months after her mom passed away, she moved to Gunnison, Colorado to finish college. After being in Gunnison for two weeks, Amber was given a little puppy, who she named "Posa" short for "Mariposa," or butterfly in Spanish.  Posa was Amber's loyal companion for the next fourteen years and a true comfort in her mother's absence.   Posa Apparel was founded in March of 2014 and sadly, Posa passed away in May 2015.  Posa Apparel's name is a tribute to  Amber's mother and her dog, and also to the extended butterfly metaphor of growth and transformation that is incorporated into our products.  

WHY WE'RE ASKING FOR YOUR HELP 

We have come to Indiegogo to gain your support and to ensure that we can manufacture our product.  Your support will allow us to create designs from the highest quality fabrics and materials and continue to manufacture this unique product in Denver, Colorado.

WHAT YOUR FUNDS WILL HELP US ACHIEVE 

We are asking for your help to raise $12,000 in order for us to manufacture this amazing American made product! Those funds will go directly to sourcing the finest quality materials and textiles, eco-friendly packaging, and manufacturing expenses.  Any additional funds will go towards marketing & branding campaigns, trade show booth space rentals, and any overhead costs.

TEXTILES- Italian and Japanese wools, breathable waterproof nylons, industry leading fleece, cashmere and alpaca woolens, silk, and even bison downs! 

ADDITIONAL MATERIALS- High-end fashion zippers. (Gold, Silver, Colored Plastic) Unique and high quality buttons. 

THE POSA

The Posa is a patent pending design that is gender neutral, high fashion, and highly functional.  It is our modern reinterpretation of the traditional scarf.

We currently have three lines of our product:

Casual

Materials:  wools, wool blends, denim, and fleece.  


Sports/Active

Materials:  breathable waterproof material, quilted down, and fleece. 

Exclusive/Luxury

Materials: cashmere, silk, bison wool blend, and fleece.  

HOW TO WRAP

Wrapping the Posa is easy.  Simply place one side behind your neck, wrap the remaining side around the front of your face, lining up the zipper in the center.  Wrap the other side behind your neck and around the opposite shoulder.  Place both ends through each of the straps, and unzip the Posa to your desired level of exposure.


ECO-FRIENDLY PACKAGING

Each Posa is packaged in a band made of plantable seed paper that can later be planted to grow beautiful wild flowers! It is extremely important to us to be a socially conscience company that believes in providing high quality luxury products, while remaining eco-friendly.



THE PERKS OF SUPPORTING US!

$65 Perk Sports/Active - Paint Splatter Waterproof

                           

$80 Perk Casual - Gray/White Italian Wool Houndstooth 

$85 Perk Casual - Terracotta/Black Itallian Wool Herringbone

$75 Perk Casual - Turquoise Italian Wool

$100 Casual - Black/White Italian Wool Tweed Herringbone

$90 Perk Casual - Black Striped Japanese Wool

$90 Perk Casual - Abstract Animal Print Wool 

$150 Perk Luxury - Dark Gray Bison Wool Blend

$175 Perk Luxury - Green/Black Cashmere Buffalo Check

THANK YOU

We cannot express what your support means to us.  Thank you for helping us make our dream of providing an incredible product, while also creating a lasting legacy for Posa and for my mom, a reality.

story:
Im an artist aspiring to become a filmmaker and a successful business owner. I love to have fun & live life to the fullest. Variety is key so I like to try new things and visit new places. I enjoy expressing my personality & creativity in different ways, whether it be through writing, art, photography or just everyday life. My goals are to film a web series and run my own online retail company that will represent the series.

I've always wanted earn a living doing something I enjoy, not to just live paycheck to paycheck. There's more to life than just paying bills. Why not take something you love, such as a hobby or a talent, and earn money from it? I've always loved to draw and use my creativity in different ways growing up and as the years went by, my interests grew darker. I've incorporated this darkness into my creations. I have some of my work posted on DeviantArt.com  and Tumblr.com, under TwistedElli.

The more people who have discovered and took a liking to my work, the more I've been inspired to share with more and more people. I've also created a FaceBook page (Twisted and Sadistic) where I not only share my work and interests within the dark community, I also update my followers on my progress with this business as well as a film project I have been working on for the past few years. This film project will be a psychological thriller/horror web series that my retail business will represent.

I'm very aware that the dark tone of my products won't suit everyone, and that's completely acceptable. There's a wide variety of different people in this world, and that's good. I also know that there will be setbacks and roadblocks, but I'm very confident in what I'm trying to accomplish. I'm willing to put all the time, effort, blood and sweat into this so no matter what happens or how long it takes, I will continue to believe.

story:
JIMO SALAKO is redefining the future of hairdressing experiences and we'd love for you to join us by donating in exchange for any of the perks listed here!


JIMO SALAKO has worked with many personalities including Björk, Claudia Schiffer, Yasmin Sewell, Mariacarla Boscono, Gemma Arterton, Elisa Sednaoui, Sharon Stone, Daniel Craig, Jude Law and Ewan McGregor to name a few.



He began his hairdressing career in 1985. A top international stylist working on the runways of London, Paris and New York, as well as working with some of the world’s most prestigious magazines and luxury fashion houses.



JIMO's vision is to bring the catwalk shows, music videos and fashion shoots from around the world - to pay homage to his clients' hair... and this is how the unassuming, edgy and very unhairdresser-like SALAKO LONDON salon near Baker Street in London's Marylebone was born in 2014; far removed from intimidating, chichi blow-dry bustle of traditional West End salons.

The final outcome? Artisanal hair-craftsmanship, cuts with the right touch of "nowness" without trying too hard.



At SALAKO LONDON we currently have 300+ loyal and recurring clients and 9k Facebook followers and we would simply love to get more people to experience our innovative hairdressing concept.



Our clients are men and women who are professionals working as lawyers, bankers, doctors, art directors, etc. who want to match their lifestyle and personality with their physical appearance. Men and women who want to differentiate themselves from the crowd… but most importantly are hungry for new experiences.



In order to achieve this vision, SALAKO LONDON will be hiring two key stylists that will allow Jimo to transfer his unique skills and techniques and expand the business.

We would love for you to join us in this exciting journey, either by donating in exchange for any of the perks listed here or simply by spreading the word bit.ly/SALAKOLONDON via Facebook and Twitter.

story:
Het project: (English version below)

I’am gold is het crowfund project voor het opstarten van de collectie van Kim w:lle, het nieuwe schoenmerk dat zich richt op mode en comfort.

Kim W:lle,

Omdat we het soms bijna vergeten hoe belangrijk onze voeten voor ons lichaam zijn stellen, wij u graag het nieuwe Belgische schoenmerk voor waar mode en comfort op gelijke voet staat. Deze lijn is voor vrouwen die al dan niet steunzolen dagen.

I’am gold is het crofund project voor het opstarten van de collectie van Kim w:lle,

Voor dit project is een gelimiteerde oplage schoenen voorzien die voor u op bestelling vervaardigd wordt. Het paar schoenen is bij aankoop huidskleurig maar door het proces van dragen/slijtage verandert de kleur en krijgt dit paar schoenen een goudkleurige gloed.Het upper is gemaakt van geitenleer, en de voering van kalfsleder.

Waarom Crowfunding:

Kim W:lle staat zelf al in voor een deel van de investering maar voor de pret-à-porter-collectie en de opstart van het productieproces is een bijkomende investering via crowdfunding noodzakelijk.

Je investereert in:

20% van het budget is voor nieuwe innovatieve materialen met 100%  word een nieuwe leest ontwikkeld, daarnaast zouden wij als we 120% van het budget halen kunnen investeren in de webshop, bij 170% een kleine voorraad aankopen en bij 250% kunnen wij een fotoshoot organiseren. 

Waarom Comfort en Fashion? 

Vroeger werden schoenen op aanvraag bij de schoenmaker gemaakt, de klant richtte zich op comfort en design en de persoonlijke noden van de consument. Er was geen overproductie en alle materialen kwamen vanuit de omgeving. Het is mijn missie dit terug te brengen binnen mijn lijn.

Van thuis uit heb ik de liefde voor ambachten mee gekregen. Als kleuter leerde ik breien op de schoot van mijn grootmoeder en een paar jaar later probeerde ik mijn vader te helpen in zijn schoenmakerij. Na mijn opleiding mode volgde ik een opleiding schoenmaken en kantklossen.

Vorig jaar heb ik beslist mijn droom waar te maken en een eigen schoenmerk op te starten. Zelf moet ik steunzolen dragen en vind ik niet altijd mooie schoenen die dat toelaten, daarom heb ik beslist om dit verwerken binnen mijn merk. Samen met mijn vader die vroeger ook orthopedische schoenen maakte, ben ik gaan brainstormen. Vorig jaar hebben we een leest ontwikkeld die hiervoor geschikt is, nu willen wij deze in productie brengen voor iedereen die houdt van mode én van comfort.

The project: 
I'am gold is the crowfund project to start the collection of Kim w:lle, the new shoe brand that focuses on fashion and comfort. 
Kim W:lle, 
because we sometimes forget how important our feet for our body, we will be presenting the new Belgian shoe brand for where fashion and comfort on an equal base. This line is for women that may or may not support soles. 
I'am gold is the crowfund project to start the collection of Kim w:lle, for this project is a limited edition shoes witch that for you on special order. The pair of shoes is when you purchase skin-coloured but through the process of wearing them they wil tear ,the color changes and this pair of shoes will have a gold-colored glow. The upper is made of goatskin, and the lining of calf leather. 
Why Crowfunding:
Kim W:lle  already invested for a part but for the pret-à-porter collection and the start-up of the production process is an additional investment through crowdfunding necessary. You wil help her invest in: 
20% of the budget is for new innovative materials with 100% become a new model developed, in addition we would if we get 120% of the budget to invest in the Web shop, at 170% a small stock purchases and at 250% enables us to organise a photo shoot.
Why Comfort and Fashion? 

In the past, shoes  where made by a cobbler on request, the customer focused on comfort and design and there was also a big attention for the  the personal needs of the consumer. There was no overproduction and all materials came from the environment around us. It is my mission to bring this back in my line.

I love for crafts. As a kid I learned knitting on the lap of my grandmother and a few years later I tried to help my father who was a cobbler. After my training Fashion I followed a training shoe design and making and  bobbin-lace making.

Last year I decided to make my dream come true and a shoe brand. I have to wear myself  orthopaedic insoles  and  I do not find the style that i love where the soles fit in, therefore I have decided to handle this within my brand. Together with my father, I started brainstorming. Last year we developed a last that is suitable for this, now we want to bring this into production for anyone who loves fashion and comfort.

story:
As a small jewelry design business, it can be difficult to fund the rising manufacturing expenses required to keep jewelry cost-effective without affecting the craftsmanship.  This campaign benefits the brand with the ability to invest in the necessary tools and materials to maintain a safe and sustainable small business.  In order to complete a successful campaign, we are offering a small goal in what will be a first step in overall growth for Wit & Pepper.  Since each piece is assembled and finished by hand, the contributions from this campaign will go towards the higher volume production of my new Truss, Navi, Pod and Peak cast designs, the purchase of a small exhaust unit, a EuroTool rolling mill, other replacement equipment as well as bulk materials needed to grow the Wit & Pepper brand.  ** Check out the Gallery above for examples of both campaign perks and the goal items I'll be purchasing according to raised funds**

For your contribution, I’ve set aside some special items of appreciation.   Some of those items include Wit & Pepper jewelry items, coupons off future purchases and promotional items.  Each contribution gift will be made and shipped within 2-4 weeks after the close of the campaign, most will ship earlier.  This is a flexible campaign so all contributors will receive their donation perk regardless of the campaign's successful goal of $2000. 

Thank you for checking out my IndieGoGo fundraiser and keep an eye out for new item announcements!  Follow me on Instagram and Facebook!

http://www.witandpepper.com

story:
Hi, my name is Alec. Simply put, The Sock Society is the service that delivers you two pairs of quality, stylish, smart and dapper socks of your choosing, to your door, every month!

Right now we are offering awesome special offers for our first backers!

Pledge $35 or more:

A 3 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION: A three month subscription to The Sock Society. This is a special price to the first 100 backers. This includes all shipping and handling costs. 3% of this backing will go to the Non-Profit of your choice. We will contact you to find out which Non-Profit you would like your donation to go to.

Pledge $70 or more:

A 6 MONTH SUBSCRIPTION: A six month subscription to The Sock Society. This is a special price to the first 100 backers. This includes all shipping and handling costs. 3% of this backing will go to the Non-Profit of your choice. We will contact you to find out which Non-Profit you would like your donation to go to.

Pledge $100 or more:

FIRST COME WEEKLY SURVIVAL 7: Seven pairs of socks in your choice of any of our patterns and colors. Offered at a special price to 100 backers. This includes all shipping and handling costs. We will ship this anywhere in the world. 3% of this backing will go to the Non-Profit of your choice. We will contact you to find out which Non-Profit you would like your donation to go to.

Pledge $102 or more:

A 1 YEAR SUBSCRIPTION: A one year subscription to The Sock Society. This is a special price to the first 100 backers. This includes all shipping and handling costs. 3% of this backing will go to the Non-Profit of your choice. We will contact you to find out which Non-Profit you would like your donation to go to.

As a young professional working in my first job out of college, I found myself having to "Look Professional" and wear the traditional male work garb everyday. Being a fashion forward individual, I found myself wanting to make a statement with my outfits and have fun with the boring suit and tie getup. 

Not being one to wear ties much (as I tend to be a roll up the sleeves and unbutton the shirt kind of worker) I started to get on my sock game and wear fun, fashionable and sometimes outrageous socks. These proved to be a great conversation starter in the office as well as with clients. I'd get comments of "Nice socks, where can I get some?" or simply just a smile when i'd cross my legs in a business meeting and my socks would show.

I started to want to grow my sock collection so that I could get a good rotation going. The only issue, good quality socks are usually over $15 a pair and as a entry level worker, my hours at work were crazy and I rarely could make it to the store. 


This got me thinking, everyone loves to accessorize and dress to impress. Socks are one way for men to express their individuality and have a little fun with everyday dress and work wear. I can't be the only one who loves socks but can't afford $15 a pair with no time to make it to the mall. 

This is where the idea for The Sock Society started. 

Individuals will sign up for a membership: 

Members of The Sock Society will receive two pairs of socks a month. Members choose from 6 different design patterns. Available patterns change monthly. If a member does not choose a design to be sent to them each month, then patterns will be selected at random for the customer. Members can sign up for $8 a month plus $2 shipping and handling. 

When a member signs up for a membership, they will receive a monthly email newsletter on the first of the month, showcasing that month’s selection of socks. Members can then login to their accounts and select which socks they would like to receive that month. 

We are excited and very proud to announce a new partnership with FirstGiving. FirstGiving is a peer funding company that helps trusted non-profits gain funding for their cause. FirstGiving is proud to power well known organizations like Special Olympics, The Humane Society, Habitat for Humanity, and many, many more.

Our partnership will empower our members to give a piece of their monthly membership to their favorite non-profit of their choice with just a click of a button. Members will then be able to login to their account anytime and manage their non-profit contribution, allowing members to donate to a different non-profit every month if they choose. 

Non Member Purchase: 

Plenty of times I have not been able to choose which socks I want. Because of this, we will release the socks that were available to our members for regular e-commerce purchase at a non-member price of $6 a pair (still cheaper then the name brand guys). This way, people that may not be ready for a membership can still get their hands on our socks. This is also great for our members who can not get enough of our socks, and need a new pair or two right away. 


The Sock Society Community:

What I always noticed about other people that saw my socks is that they always wanted to comment, had something to say or wanted to tell me about their favorite pair of socks. Everyone always has great ideas for design patterns. This prompted the idea that The Sock Society should include a way for members to enter their own sock designs to be commented on by The Sock Society community. 

Members can login to their account at anytime and submit design ideas that they would love to have. Members can then vote on these ideas and the number one most voted for design will be part of the following months member offering. 

The Sock Society's mission is to provide comfortable, fashion forward and quality socks delivered conveniently to the doorstep of sock enthusiasts for an under market price. You will notice that Quality is everywhere in The Sock Society brand. Although we want to deliver our socks at an affordable price to our customers, we will not bend on quality. 

Our Blend 

Our socks are an 80% cotton. 17% nylon and 3% spandex blend. In doing extensive market research, this seems to be the most widely accepted blend for socks providing durability to withstand wear and tear as well as washing without shrinking. It also provides the most comfort with great heal and toe cushion while providing the best breathability for your feet.  

All of our socks are Fashioned Jacquard knitted done with hand linking, making the socks more beautiful.  

Elastic Fantastic

The worst thing that can happen with socks is that they fall down when you are walking because they have no hold. Our socks have an elastic spandex comfort top that works to combat sock slip and keep them high on your calfs. 

Socks That Fit

The first thing that you will notice when you pull on a pair of our socks is that they are stretchy. Our spandex plaiting thread throughout the body of our socks, allows our socks to form fit smoothly to your feet. The best part is that because of the spandex structure, our socks fit a wide range of foot sizes. 

Currently I work as a project manager for a online marketing and web design company. Through my current position I have access to technical, creative and marketing resources. Having an extensive background in web design and website builds, I know what it takes to create a user friendly, functioning and engaging website that will be The Sock Society.

  •  The website will be built in responsive form meaning it will be optimized for mobile and tablet devices as well as desktop computers. This will allow our members to access their Sock Society account from any device anywhere, allowing them to easily update their membership and select their monthly socks. 
  • It will be built on a custom content management system that will allow The Sock Society to handle memberships, e-commerce, tiered pricing, inventory, product management and marketing management. 
  • The site will be hosted on an industry leading hosting provider that is secure. 
  • Integrating with Facebook Store will allow our members another channel to access their account, sign up for memberships, and share their favorite socks with their friends. 
  • Social Media will be key for voting on members designs and sharing their favorites. Having integrations with Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Pintrest and Google + gives members the ultimate flexibility and access to their social feeds. 

We're raising money on Indigogo to help us manufacture our initial inventory of designs for our members and retail customers as well as the initial build of the website and initial marketing. Well we have secured enough money to produce our prototypes, we are in need of assistance in securing funds to help produce our socks in enough quantity to fulfill our member orders as well as manufacture designs for our non-member retail customers. 

Also we are working with a very skilled team of developers and designers to help us with the website build. Well working for a web design company has its advantages, it does not mean that they will do this work pro-bono. 

Marketing is key for the success of The Sock Society. We have started small social media marketing campaigns but we do not have enough of a budget to reach the amount of people we need to be successful. There are tons of members out there that are waiting to join that don't even know about us yet.

With the help of this community and $15,000, it will ensure that we have enough socks to fulfill our first two months of memberships as well as our backer rewards, non-member retail socks, a beautiful website and social marketing campaign money. 

Thank you so much for your pledge! - It means everything to The Sock Society and we can not do this without you. Once our Indigogo campaign ends, you will be able to choose your rewards from the designs that we release for the first month's member selection. Designs will be similar to the ones that you have seen here in our Indigogo campaign. When we are ready to fulfill your pledge, we will send you an email to go to the-socksociety.com and select which socks you would like to receive. 

Help us by sharing The Sock Society with your friends!

Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about The Sock Society? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top. Sharing is caring!

It also provides the most comfort with great heal and toe cushion while providing the best breathability for your feet.  All of our socks are Fashioned Jacquard knitted done with hand linking, making the socks more beautiful.   Elastic FantasticThe worst thing that can happen with socks is that they fall down when you are walking because they have no hold. Our socks have an elastic spandex comfort top that works to combat sock slip and keep them high on your calfs. Socks That FitThe first thing that you will notice when you pull on a pair of our socks is that they are stretchy. Our spandex plaiting thread throughout the body of our socks, allows our socks to form fit smoothly to your feet. The best part is that because of the spandex structure, our socks fit a wide range of foot sizes.   Currently I work as a project manager for a online marketing and web design company. Through my current position I have access to technical, creative and marketing resources. Having an extensive background in web design and website builds, I know what it takes to create a user friendly, functioning and engaging website that will be The Sock Society.
 The website will be built in responsive form meaning it will be optimized for mobile and tablet devices as well as desktop computers. This will allow our members to access their Sock Society account from any device anywhere, allowing them to easily update their membership and select their monthly socks. 
It will be built on a custom content management system that will allow The Sock Society to handle memberships, e-commerce, tiered pricing, inventory, product management and marketing management. 
The site will be hosted on an industry leading hosting provider that is secure. 
Integrating with Facebook Store will allow our members another channel to access their account, sign up for memberships, and share their favorite socks with their friends. 
Social Media will be key for voting on members designs and sharing their favorites. Having integrations with Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Pintrest and Google + gives members the ultimate flexibility and access to their social feeds. 
 We're raising money on Indigogo to help us manufacture our initial inventory of designs for our members and retail customers as well as the initial build of the website and initial marketing. Well we have secured enough money to produce our prototypes, we are in need of assistance in securing funds to help produce our socks in enough quantity to fulfill our member orders as well as manufacture designs for our non-member retail customers. Also we are working with a very skilled team of developers and designers to help us with the website build. Well working for a web design company has its advantages, it does not mean that they will do this work pro-bono. Marketing is key for the success of The Sock Society. We have started small social media marketing campaigns but we do not have enough of a budget to reach the amount of people we need to be successful. There are tons of members out there that are waiting to join that don't even know about us yet.With the help of this community and $15,000, it will ensure that we have enough socks to fulfill our first two months of memberships as well as our backer rewards, non-member retail socks, a beautiful website and social marketing campaign money.  Thank you so much for your pledge! - It means everything to The Sock Society and we can not do this without you. Once our Indigogo campaign ends, you will be able to choose your rewards from the designs that we release for the first month's member selection. Designs will be similar to the ones that you have seen here in our Indigogo campaign. When we are ready to fulfill your pledge, we will send you an email to go to the-socksociety.com and select which socks you would like to receive.  Help us by sharing The Sock Society with your friends!Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about The Sock Society? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top. Sharing is caring!

story:
If 500 People donate a minimum of $10 we can reach our GOAL!!


A change with your help

Revamping the image of Fashion in a Beautiful, Elegant, and Earth friendly way.

We intend to create a brand that is both conscious in fashion and Eco-Friendly.

Model Abigail Swan and her partner have been working vigorously for a year with many people to create the idea and visionary brand that has a positive environmental impact.

Through Model Abigail Swan, we have spread the word worldwide of project Image Swan and gained strong support in various places such as Israel, California, Mexico, Italy, Egypt and U.S.A.

Our goal is to use the funding from your help to invest in Eco-Friendly material in order to create organic clothing, marketing material, further brand development, and posters to keep funding this all in the name of spreading a positive environmental impact.


“What are you known for?”

Image Swan’s motto. We want people to feel proud and let others know where they stand when wearing an Image Swan product. Our product reflects the future, awareness, elegance, and change. We are building a statement where fashion meets Mother Earth.


What your funding will accomplish

We are trying to raise $5,000 with your help in order to elevate this project to new levels.

-Pledging at the $30 level you will receive 1 out of 3 posters to be published under our brand, “Image Swan”.

-Pledging at the $60 dollar level you will receive a poster (poster will be of your choosing) and our first ever Organic Hemp “Image Swan” shirts. You can feel proud in knowing you were part of the first step to a revolutionary change in fashion.

-All pledges over $100 will receive our Organic Hemp shirt, plus a poster (poster of your choosing), and a 10 minute Skype call from model Abigail Swan to thank you for your support.  

-The highest pledge residing in the Houston area will go on a 2 hour meet and greet with brand ambassador/co-creator of Image Swan, model Abigail Swan. *

Visit ImageSwan.com to view current highest pledges. 

All posters in all pledges will be personalized by our brand ambassador, Abigail Swan. (Our customer care team will contact you via email regarding personalization of posters. i.e. to who, message, birthday gift, etc.)

No amount is too small to help us reach our goal

With your help we can make a difference in reducing our carbon footprint.

Please share this project and spread the word of the future change through your social media, e-mail and with friends. Thank you for all your support and helping make this happen!

NOTE: Person who shares this project the most before the end of the project deadline will be submitted in the raffle to win a free poster/shirt in behalf of Image Swan. Contact info@imageswan.com for us to keep an eye on your news feed count for shared link.

*Our customer care team will contact you regarding the rules and restrictions on the 2 hour meet and greet with Abigail Swan. The location of the meet and greet will be that of the choosing from the Image Swan team and all dinner expenses will be covered by Image Swan.

Poster 1


Poster 2

Poster 3


Poster 4


Concept Shirt 1

Concept Shirt 2


Men's shirts coming soon

Submit Concept Ideas to help create the product at info@imageswan.com




Special thanks to all the people who made this possible

(Lead)Photography by: Nerio @ facebook.com/leonel.nerio      instagram.com/neriophoto/    http://neriophoto.4ormat.com/   NerioPhotography@Gmail.com

(2ndary) Photography by: Kimberly instagram.com/kim_overboard/   https://kpivaralphoto@gmail.com   kpivaralphoto@gmail.com

Videographer: Rick Garza @  www.eyeamphotos.com

story:
Last summer our little team launched a clothing line called Patrian Clothing. 
Go to our Facebook page, or webpage and check out what we did back then. It was pretty big deal, we sold more then 100 pieces of t-shirts in two months of our trial, and every single customer was really happy. Then we took a longer break over the winter, to create new designs, and extend the offer.  It's time to get back, but we need a little help with the costs of developing and manufacturing.


We are based in capital of Bosnia and Herzegovina, Sarajevo. The theme of our work is related to the fascinating history of our country.  Bosnia and Herzegovina is a melting pot of many different cultures, a bridge between East and West. The tourists experience here is like nowhere else; from Roman times to the reign of the Bosnian Kings;from the Ottoman Period, the Austro-Hungarian Empire and the Yugoslavian era with Marshal Tito as its leader. Every year more then a million tourists come to Bosnia, and have a time of their life. We give them opportunity to take part of Bosnian story with them, when they return to their homes. Good quality, low price, light weight  and with interesting story to tell, our products are ideal souvenirs for tourists.


With our modern designs we will tell stories about Kings and Queens, rise and fall of an Empires and Rulers, stories about Culture, Wars, Customs, Sport, Tradition and all other interesting events that took place in Bosnia and Herzegovina. The clothes we all wear everyday is the best way to share that beautiful story with the world.

Last summer we have covered two different periods of time with our three designs.

One of them  is telling the story of Sarajevo Winter Olympics, held in 1984. Under the motto Citius, Altius, Fortius (Faster, Higher, Stronger), Sarajevo became an Olympic city. 14th Winter Olympic Games were declared the best organized until then. Sarajevo was the capital of the world these days.

The other two designs are representing the time when Bosnia was a kingdom.  Every kingdom has a king, so the Bosnia had one! His name was Tvrtko I Kontromanich. The story of him is one of the most interesting stories in the European history.

The main motive in this two designs is lily flower! Not a french lily, but Lilium bosniacum (authentic Bosnian Lily). It was a symbol of  royal dynasty of Kotromanich. The coat of arms of the Kings of Bosnia consisted of a blue shield with six golden lilies displayed around a white bend, and it survived to this day as a symbol of Bosniaks. Although it is not official flag of Bosnia, in hearts of many it is, so you can see it in the the stands whenever Bosnia National Team is playing, even when Edin Dzeko, Miralem Pjanic, Asmir Begović, Mirza Teletović, and many others perform for their clubs, or when Adnan Ćatić(Felix Sturm) works his magic in the boxing ring.

Through the past  many empires were naive enough to think they can rule the crude Bosnian land. Every single of them brought the peace of their identity and left it in there while retreating. As a result , Bosnia became a complex mixture of Mediterranean, Byzantine, Ottoman and Central European cultures, with many stories to be told.

We are happy to combine modern fashion with history and present interesting clothing that is able to tell these stories in a in a whole new way.


This is where you jump in. We are just couple of students, and  most of our money is spent on the first phase of the project. So we need to fundraise. All the money we get will be wisely spent to enable us finish the development process and start manufacturing new products. Also, if we achieve the given campaign goal ($ 2500), we will be able to significantly reduce prices of final products.  Last summer our offer included just white t-shirts, and four available designs. This year you will be able to choose between 4 available colors, and except t-shirts our ofter will include: polo shirts, hoodies and caps.
Also, the custom label (booklet) goes with every product, with interesting story related to the design.Five different designs are ready, and will be presented in May, 2015. Other designs will be developed with your help and if we reach our goal, all products will be available for sale on 15th of June 2015.


Your support will enable us to buy the components and start manufacturing  of our summer collection.

$2,200 will be reserved for product development, manufacturing, fulfilling campaign orders. That includes:

  • producing materials for our clothing line here in BiH.
  • buying graphic tablet that will help us doing better designs
  • printing labels at the factory
  • paying professional photographer, so we can present our new designs
  • printing and sewing expenses
  • extension of our company registration
  • extension of our web domain and hosting
  • online and offline advertising

The remaining $300 will be reserved for Indigogo's fee and other expenses.


The most wanted models from "2014 collection" are available for you as a Perks, together with some great surprises.

If we don't reach our target funding we will borrow the remaining funds to make sure that you still receive your items. This option will significantly compromise the rate at which our business and range can grow (hence this campaign) but it is the only other option available to us.

Don't forget to send us shipping address, number of wanted design (#1, #2, #3) , and size (S, M, L, XL, 2XL), via email: info@patrian.net, or via private message (Indiegogo, Facebook). More info in two pictures below. If you are not sure about the size, take a look at size chart.

*For international orders, please add $12 USD to your order.

* Items will be shipped in June, 2015.

We’re immensely proud of the quality of all our garments and the super futuristic technology that creates our unique t-shirts and hoodie prints. Our t-shirts are long lasting, individual and extremely useful for abiding by public decency laws.

  • Sweatshop-free, ethically sourced cotton apparel
  • 100% Preshrunk Cotton
  • Printed using cutting edge direct to garment technologies
  • Eko-tex standard 100

Take a look at some high quality products from our last-year collection!


Be one of the first to wear one of the stunning  Patrian Clothing t-shirts this summer. One more time, this is how it works:

  1. Select a contribution amount on the right-hand side, or select a perk to initiate the order.
  2. On the following page you will receive all important information about your selected offer. Enter your delivery address. Don't forget to send us number of wanted design (#1, #2, #3 - this is related to the donation of $20), and size (S, M, L, XL, 2XL), via email:(info@patrian.net), or via private message. (Indiegogo, Facebook).
  3. Pay via Credit/Debit Card. (PayPal will be available soon).
  4. You will receive your order as soon as campaign ends. Meanwhile we will keep you posted about all relevant news via email. If you have any questions you can send us an email: info@patrian.net.

story:
HAUSJAH (HOUSE-JAR)


 Leather Animals Keychains!


Introducing all the way from Asia, made by skilled artisans, these handmade leather animals keychains are doomed to suit any age!
Hi, My name is Calvin Hausjah. I'm a freelance Fashion designer from Indonesia, born and raised in Singapore. With a strong foundation in the design field, i have explored different mediums and art form to bring out the best creativity in me.
With a foundation in Leather Crafting. I have decided to use unique natural, tanned leather, as well as exotic skins, to produce fun-looking, adorable animals keychains for everyday use.
For the first batch , we have come out with several animal designs. But fret not, we will be making a whole bunch of animals if this takes off! We need your support Indiegogo!



Using only High-quality natural tanned leather for our products.

Every piece is hand-stitched by our best artisans.
For the first batch of Leather Animal Keychains, these are the available animals !



ELEPHANTS!


BULL!

These are the available colour for the respective designs for the first batch of Animals.


First Round of Funding! 

We have estimated about a goal of $5,000 to produce the first batch of HAUSJAH Leather Animal keychains!
Thank you for your support Indiegogo.
First round of funding will be delivered to :
-Producing of First Batch of HAUSJAH Leather Animals Keychains.
-Support the labour cost of our Artisans
-Continue to produce more Animal Designs.
-Implement EXOTIC skins like snakeskin, lizardskin,alligator.etc

It looks great with your bunch of keys!

Compliments fabulously with any bags or accesories!

COMPLIMENTARY CARDHOLDER
FULL-GRAIN LEATHER WITH LOGO.

FRONT VIEW

BACK VIEW
SUEDE KEYCHAIN

email chausjah@yahoo.com for CUSTOMIZATION!

Great to pair with any Bags!
PACKAGING

Comes with a nice black box with a dust bag, to ensure your lovely pets are safe and clean in your hands!


SNEAK PREVIEW OF NEW MATERIALS!



Example of an Elephant Snake Skins! 

This will be possible for 2nd Round of Funding!


Look what we have here? Coming soon......


NEVER STOP SUPPORTING US!
We are deeply appreciated by your endless support ! We really care!
"Every risk is worth taking as long as it's for a good cause, and contributes to a good life" - Sir Richard Branson.
Do you want to know who cares more? 


SINGAPORE RED CROSS SOCIETY
With the recent earthquake that has shocked the world in Nepal, we have decided that this campaign to be tied up to this cause.

SOURCE:WIKIPEDIA
 20% of our revenue will be donated to Singapore Red Cross Society to assist the families and lives that have suffered from the natural disasters.
HOUSE-JAR send our condolences to the family, hoping they can lead back the life that once had, standing on their feet.

Risk and Challenges we might face:
With every piece of keychain hand-made, we might encounter a slight delay in our production process to ensure the highest quality of craftsmanship is in our control.
But do not worry guys! Production process is a big problem for many crowdfunding start-ups and campaigns, we ensure we do the best we can for your 100% satisfaction.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT , INDIEGOGO!

SINGAPORE RED CROSS SOCIETYWith the recent earthquake that has shocked the world in Nepal, we have decided that this campaign to be tied up to this cause.
SOURCE:WIKIPEDIA 20% of our revenue will be donated to Singapore Red Cross Society to assist the families and lives that have suffered from the natural disasters.HOUSE-JAR send our condolences to the family, hoping they can lead back the life that once had, standing on their feet.

Risk and Challenges we might face:

With every piece of keychain hand-made, we might encounter a slight delay in our production process to ensure the highest quality of craftsmanship is in our control.
But do not worry guys! Production process is a big problem for many crowdfunding start-ups and campaigns, we ensure we do the best we can for your 100% satisfaction.THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT , INDIEGOGO!

story:
Lipscani was created to tell the story of my country and heritage, with prints that illustrate stories of an Art Nouveau era. 

One of the most important points in our journey is to build a sustainable company, that relies mostly on working with local suppliers, showcasing the quality of Portuguese craftsmanship.


The Reason for this campaign

We need help to come up with the funds to start exporting and showcase our work in an international trade-fair show. Because we started this brand very small, we need help to  to show our brand to a higher number of people.

Why is this important


  • At this moment, Portugal’s leather shoe and accessories industry represents 3.8 percent of the global leather goods trade. However, we still lack domestic brands with history and global recognition. As a country we need more people that will bet on creating the path to make Portugal a global brand.

  • One in every 3 Portuguese below the age of 25 is neither working nor studying. When I started my brand, I was also unemployed, and this campaign is a way to open my personal experience to others.  I hope that others feel encouraged to also start their own campaign for their projects and share their story too. 

  • Our goal is to raise awareness and to open a dialogue with other entrepreneurs, team up with similar Portuguese companies that might see my campaign and that might want to join us in doing a trade fair or a project together involving global distribution. 

What You Get

You can look on the side of this page, for our PERKS. Most of them consist of getting products from our collection. You can choose or to get any product you want through Gift Voucher, or to choose a Product type (Tote Bag, Cell Phone cover, complete collection).

Lipscani's Items are

  • Manufactured by a small family-owned business that is specialized in making high-end bags,
  • All the fabrics are made in Portugal with our own hand-drawn textile designs.
  • The leather is of Portuguese origin and is made in a small scale factory that respects the ethical treatment of animals and is environmentally conscious in the chemicals used to treat the leather.



What We Need 


  • We need 3500 EUR that will go into the production costs of a sample collection - 1000 eur for the manufacturing of the bags, 500 euros for fabric, 1000 eur for leather, and the remaining 1000 euros will be spent on accessories (thread, zippers, metal components, personalized leather tags) travel costs and  packaging costs (bags, fabric and leather tags).

  • After we reach the first goal, then we need the remaining 6500 EUR  to cover the costs of doing an International trade fair show. We have chosen three trade fairs, (two in NYC, one in Paris) and we will choose one of those three that will offer the best stand location and potential client presence.



Awards

  • Nominee for The Best of Commerce and Services Awards in Portugal, 2014.
  • Our Fadista shawl was recognized as one of the iconic Portuguese design items of 2012 by one of the best newspapers in Portugal, Publico.
  • Along with many other appearances on newspapers and TV, that you can check in our Press page

Some of the media partners we had so far



About me

My name is Mariana and I'm a 23 year-old fashion designer.

From the age of 14 I enrolled in Lisbon Fashion School to start studying to become a fashion designer. After completing my Masters degree in the Netherlands, did an internship for a haute couture company, and began working on my own designs as of 2012.



Other Ways You Can Help


  • Sharing means the world to us! A great way you can help is to share this video/page on social networks and spread the word to friends and loved ones. Like our Facebook page, and follow us on Instagram to see how this story will unveil.

  • Tell you friends to tell their friends about this campaign.

  • Do our 1 EUR I believe! donation, just to show that you have seen and believe in our project. Every donation is important to us.

  • Stay in touch with us! Email me at info@lipscani.pt and share your story with me. We can do a project together, or if you are strating your own company I can give you some advice.



Together we can inspire and raise awareness for more fashion businesses to thrive.


Thank you for your support,
Mariana

story:
Help Us Fund Our Newest Product!

TCM Sports is looking for enthusiastic NRL fans to help us get our newest product up and running.
We are looking to raise funds to support the production of our newest product and your support will enable us to produce this new and exciting product for NRL fans.These 2015 Official NRL autograph card set will be a must for the true collector. Each card is a collectable item that can be used to remember crowning moments from the season, keep up to date with player statistics or use the included permanent marker to gather player autographs. The set contains a players stats card for each player in the team and a timeline of the Club's history. These card sets are a great gift ideas for those that love to collect season by season but don't want to constantly miss out on their favorite players because trading cards sets are incomplete.  All new players during the season will have a players card issued which will be free of charge to customers that have registered to receive the new signings cards set.

A Gift For Your Support

By helping us get our newest product to market you will receive a thank you gift of the NRL team of your choosing.
Your gift will be delivered to you, free of charge, as a THANK YOU from the TCM Sports Team.
Check out the "perks" funding options for details.

Use Of Funds

The funds received will be used by TMC Sports to produce this exciting new product by helping towards the costs of quality control, production and shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help

As a new company, we are always looking for people that believe in our products. Even if you can't help us fund this new and exciting product you can help us get the word out via social media.

Be sure to like and share our Facebook posts, register to receive our weekly newsletters at www.tcmsports.com.au or follow us on Twitter.

The TCM Sports team thanks everyone for their support and help.

story:
Alison Trowbridge Designs strives to create unique, high quality pieces of jewelry that will stand the test of time. Our goal is to make distinctive pieces perfect for everyday wear that will become the heirlooms of tomorrow.  We are proud to have our pieces manufactured in the USA.

We are a woman owned and operated business. We are creative entrepreneurs with a passion for jewelry, great design, and beautiful gems.

We need your help:

The funds we are seeking will launch our new Aurora line of rings, earrings, and pendants. We are ready to go; the vendors have been sourced, the molds are made, and the samples produced. We will use the money towards the purchase of gems, manufacturing the first product runs, and marketing efforts; including giving a professional polish to our website, and attending trade shows.  Additional funds raised during this campaign will go towards producing and bringing to market our Satellites, and Anastasia lines.

As our thank you for supporting us we are offering significant discounts on our first runs of the Aurora line. These will be pre-sales and only 15 of each piece will be available at the Premier Investor price.  As each piece sells out at the Premier Investor level we will then offer that piece at the IndieGoGo price level which is 25% off of the retail price. There is no limit to the number of pieces that will be sold at the IndieGoGo level as long as the campaign is running.

Ring Pricing:                    Swiss Blue Topaz     -     Amethyst     -     Rhodolite
Premier Investor                     $235.00                     $315.00              $400.00
IndieGoGo                                 $282.00                     $375.00              $480.00
Retail                                           $375.00                     $500.00             $639.00

Earring Pricing:              Swiss Blue Topaz     -     Amethyst     -     Rhodolite
Premier Investor                   $340.00                      $630.00              $748.00
IndieGoGo                               $409.00                      $739.00               $896.00
Retail                                         $545.00                      $985.00              $1195.00

Pendant Pricing:          Swiss Blue Topaz     -     Rhodolite     -     Amethyst
Premier Investor                  $310.00                      $700.00             $405.00
IndieGoGo                              $371.00                       $840.00             $484.00
Retail                                       $495.00                     $1120.00             $645.00

If now is not the best time for you to invest in a new piece of jewelry, we are offering other perks for smaller amounts:

Invest $10 in us and you will receive a hand written thank you note, and a coupon for 10% off the purchase of one piece of jewelry at regular retail.

A $25 investment also comes with a hand written thank you note, and a coupon for 25% off the purchase of one piece of jewelry at regular retail.
 
For $50 you will receive a hand written thank you note and two (2) coupons for 25% off the purchase of one piece of jewelry at regular retail. 

And for $100 you will also receive a hand written thank you note and four (4) coupons for 25% off the purchase of one piece of jewelry at regular retail.

We sincerely appreciate your support and hope you will share the link to our campaign and help us reach our goal.  We are eternally grateful.

story:
Help me print my own t-shirts!


I really want to print my own illustrations onto t-shirts and potentially start my own business!

I've been drawing since I could first hold a pencil, I've always wanted to make something of myself but have never had the right outlet until now.

I recently have started building and online profile for myself and have posted a few of my illustrations online.
Surprisingly they had an amazing response!

Many people have told me that I should make t-shirts with my designs on, and I've had a great number of people asking if they can buy one, so now I'm finally attempting it!

I am just one person, and I just need that little financial push to get me started! 

The donations will be used to finance the printing of the t-shirts as well as the packaging/ marketing/any other fees



Then who knows?! I could have my own clothing line by this time next year! (I can dream).

So please donate whatever you can, every penny will help towards my final goal and will be much appreciated!

I could have my own clothing line by this time next year! (I can dream).So please donate whatever you can, every penny will help towards my final goal and will be much appreciated!

story:
8 Functions One Backpack

Comfortable and Attractive


Backpack or quick grab shoulder sling

20 or 70 liter waterproof bag

8 in 1 Built to last!

Regular Backpacks are Boring and are not designed for the elements of summer!  I wanted a Backpack that was really well built with summer fun in mind.  A pack that could handle all my summer adventures both big and small!

Maybe you just want to keep your stuff dry with the ultra strong and light weight waterproof bag.  Salt Pack Deluxe will dry out your wet stuff and protect your dry stuff at the same time.  

Or maybe you just need a pack that can transform in size because you just never know how much or how little you need to carry around. 

Or maybe you just want to share your music with friends and family with the waterproof bluetooth speaker while your phone is protected in its own built in Smart Phone waterproof pocket.

Rewards:

Salt Pack Features

1. Dry and wet pack in one! We all have backpacks... But there has never been a pack like Salt Pack! Salt Pack is the first backpack built with summer fun in mind. Not only is Salt Pack functional and practical, it is fun! No matter weather you are a swimmer, a surfer, a paddle boarder, or you just love the water and the sunshine, Salt Pack is for you! From the lake to the ocean to the pool, Salt Pack gives you both waterproof protection and air dry ventilation in one pack. Salt Pack will keep dry what you need to keep dry and will help dry out what you have wet.


2. Smart Phone protection! Salt Pack Deluxe is the first backpack ever to have it's own sewn in waterproof pocket specifically for your smart phone. Salt Packs patent pending waterproof pocket keeps your phone dry, safe, protected, and accessible.


3. Doubles in Size with one unzip... Salt Pack Deluxe is 4 sizes in one pack. First it only weighs about a pound and can become very compact perfect for travel or for storing in your car or boat compartment ready to use. Then Salt Pack becomes the perfect backpack. It feels great on your back and has a style like no other. Next, Salt Pack can become a large backpack with one unzip. Finally, undue the velcro strap holding up the expansion material and Salt Pack becomes more than double in size. Salt Pack Deluxe is a pack you can put into whatever you are into. Patents pending.


4. The Beauty of Mesh  If you have ever pulled a wet towel or something wet out of a dry backpack, it is horrible, musty, and stinky! Not with Mesh! Salt Packs professional grade dive mesh allows wet stuff to dry out with ventilation.


5. Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker You and your friends and family can enjoy music at the beach with our waterproof Bluetooth speaker. You can play music, skip songs, and adjust the volume all from your smart phone.


6. Backpack or Quick Grab Shoulder Sling Salt Pack Deluxe gives you the option to carry your expanded Salt Pack Deluxe as a large backpack or pull out the single shoulder sling for quick grab and go transport of all of your gear.


7.  Top Quality!  To assure the highest Quality product, i have contracted Armor Manufacturing here in Florida to handle our production.  Armor's bags are known worldwide as some of the highest quality bags in the dive industry.  


8.  Extremely Compact!  Salt Pack Deluxe is not only expandable transforming into a huge Pack, it is also extremely compact.  Salt Pack Deluxe is perfect to fit into your boat or car compartments or in your luggage ready for travel. 

Salt Pack Deluxe, is a one of a kind and first of its kind top quality pack built with Summer fun in mind. You will love how light it is and how the smooth and soft Nylon Mesh feels on your back. And for durability, Salt Pack is surrounded on the base and sides with super strong and great looking Ballistic Nylon. 

Choose Your LOGO...

Meet Salt Packs Creator

I have lived near the water all of my life. Raised my family near the water.  The design of Salt Pack Deluxe is perfected from these many experiences over the years.  From the beaches of California, Hawaii, and now Florida, to the lakes of British Columbia Canada, I love the "wet life"! Salt Pack Deluxe is the water sport and lifestyle pack that I have always dreamed of having bringing together all that you need when you are off to the pool, the open water, a day hike, or for any sport.

Video of random reaction to our original Salt Pack


Risks and challenges

China is Tricky 
Though we have everything lined up, the design perfected, the features tested, I am always concerned about China. It is not a quality concern as Armor Manufacturing has been using the same top quality bag maker for the past 20 years. It is the distance!

Because China is on the other side of the world, everything takes so much time. Fortunately we have the most difficult elements finalized. One can never tell though if another larger bag maker that this manufacturer supplies will call in a favor to expedite an order bumping us out of line or to the back of the line.

The other concern I have is our pending patents. We do not want anyone to copy all the work we have done and the intellectual property we want to own. This will not directly effect the production, the quality, or any other factor of the product! It will only effect us being able to be exclusive in our efforts.

Frequently Asked Questions

1.  Is Salt Pack Deluxe Top Quality?  Yes, Yes, and Yes!  we are so proud of the quality of these bags!  Made in relation with Armor Bags USA.  One of the top quality bag makers in the world with a 20 year old relationship with the same top quality overseas manufacturer.  And Salt Pack Deluxe has been designed and redesigned to assure wear and tear can be minimized.  With the Professional Grade Dive Mesh and Ballistic Nylon base and sides, Salt Pack is STRONG and DURABLE with STRONG stitching!
2.  8 in 1?  What are the 8?  1. Waterproof Bag and it's own hidden pocket  2. More than Doubles in Size with a Zip  3. Waterproof Phone Pocket  4.  Bluetooth Speaker  5.  Quick Grab and Go Shoulder Sling  6.  Breathable Mesh, Ballistic Nylon, Top Quality  7. Regular Backpack   8. Ultra Compact
3.  How Does Salt Pack more than Double in Size?  Salt Pack has what is called an "Expansion Zipper" which releases the hidden material that doubles the size of Salt Pack.  Patent Pending.
4.  How Do You Make Salt Pack Small Again?  It is so easy!  Just role it up like a sleeping bag and use the attached velcro strap to hold the material hidden inside of your Salt Pack.  Patent Pending.
5.  How light weight and strong is the Waterproof Bag?  These bags are simply remarkable.  The material is tuff and ultra light.  In fact, when you are not using your waterproof bag and it is tucked into its hidden pocket, you cannot notice it is there.  Your gonna love this life saver!  It is great for your lunch, camera, wallet, towel, clothes, baby stuff and you name it.
6.  How loud is the Speaker?  It is much louder than your Smart Phone and the volume will depend on where you are and how close you are to the speaker.
7.  Can I submerge my Salt Pack when my phone is inside the waterproof pocket?  We do not recommend this mostly because it is always possible the water tight seams were not closed completely.  It is water tight but mostly recommended as a splash guard to keep your phone safe and just in case of emergency should your Salt Pack confront significant water.
8.  Can I strap Salt Pack on my Paddle Board?  Yes!  Put Salt Pack Deluxe inside your waterproof bag or without a waterproof bag and strap it on.  It works perfect
9.  Can I put tall Dive Fins inside Salt Pack Deluxe when it is expanded.  Yes!  Salt Pack Deluxe will handle the tallest of Dive fins.
10.  What about Snorkel Gear?  Salt Pack Deluxe is perfect for Snorkeling.  Without fins, put your snorkel gear inside your Salt Pack.  With fins, unzip the expansion material and Salt Pack will handle them easily along with your mask, snorkel, and other gear.
11.  How many pockets does Salt Pack have?  There are 4 pockets.  One in the front, the large main compartment that expands, the hidden pocket for the waterproof bag, and the Smart Phone pocket in the front.                                                     12.  Is there a headphone hole so I can listen to music while carrying my Salt Pack Deluxe?  Yes, there is!                                                                                                         13.  How much does Salt Pack weigh?  The basic Salt Pack Deluxe weighs about a pound.  That is with the waterproof Smart Phone pocket and  without the waterproof bag and speaker.

14.  Can I adjust the size of the expanded Salt Pack Deluxe?  Yes!  There are clips at the top of the bag allowing you to roll up the material and clip the clips together to adjust Salt Pack Deluxe to the size you desire.

Finally, undue the velcro strap holding up the expansion material and Salt Pack becomes more than double in size. Salt Pack Deluxe is a pack you can put into whatever you are into. Patents pending.



4. The Beauty of Mesh  If you have ever pulled a wet towel or something wet out of a dry backpack, it is horrible, musty, and stinky! Not with Mesh! Salt Packs professional grade dive mesh allows wet stuff to dry out with ventilation.



5. Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker You and your friends and family can enjoy music at the beach with our waterproof Bluetooth speaker. You can play music, skip songs, and adjust the volume all from your smart phone.



6. Backpack or Quick Grab Shoulder Sling Salt Pack Deluxe gives you the option to carry your expanded Salt Pack Deluxe as a large backpack or pull out the single shoulder sling for quick grab and go transport of all of your gear.


7.  Top Quality!  To assure the highest Quality product, i have contracted Armor Manufacturing here in Florida to handle our production.  Armor's bags are known worldwide as some of the highest quality bags in the dive industry.  



8.  Extremely Compact!  Salt Pack Deluxe is not only expandable transforming into a huge Pack, it is also extremely compact.  Salt Pack Deluxe is perfect to fit into your boat or car compartments or in your luggage ready for travel. 


Salt Pack Deluxe, is a one of a kind and first of its kind top quality pack built with Summer fun in mind. You will love how light it is and how the smooth and soft Nylon Mesh feels on your back. And for durability, Salt Pack is surrounded on the base and sides with super strong and great looking Ballistic Nylon. 
Choose Your LOGO...


Meet Salt Packs Creator
I have lived near the water all of my life. Raised my family near the water.  The design of Salt Pack Deluxe is perfected from these many experiences over the years.  From the beaches of California, Hawaii, and now Florida, to the lakes of British Columbia Canada, I love the "wet life"! Salt Pack Deluxe is the water sport and lifestyle pack that I have always dreamed of having bringing together all that you need when you are off to the pool, the open water, a day hike, or for any sport.


Video of random reaction to our original Salt Pack



Risks and challenges
China is Tricky Though we have everything lined up, the design perfected, the features tested, I am always concerned about China. It is not a quality concern as Armor Manufacturing has been using the same top quality bag maker for the past 20 years. It is the distance!
Because China is on the other side of the world, everything takes so much time. Fortunately we have the most difficult elements finalized. One can never tell though if another larger bag maker that this manufacturer supplies will call in a favor to expedite an order bumping us out of line or to the back of the line.
The other concern I have is our pending patents. We do not want anyone to copy all the work we have done and the intellectual property we want to own. This will not directly effect the production, the quality, or any other factor of the product! It will only effect us being able to be exclusive in our efforts.
Frequently Asked Questions
1.  Is Salt Pack Deluxe Top Quality?  Yes, Yes, and Yes!  we are so proud of the quality of these bags!  Made in relation with Armor Bags USA.  One of the top quality bag makers in the world with a 20 year old relationship with the same top quality overseas manufacturer.  And Salt Pack Deluxe has been designed and redesigned to assure wear and tear can be minimized.  With the Professional Grade Dive Mesh and Ballistic Nylon base and sides, Salt Pack is STRONG and DURABLE with STRONG stitching!2.  8 in 1?  What are the 8?  1. Waterproof Bag and it's own hidden pocket  2. More than Doubles in Size with a Zip  3. Waterproof Phone Pocket  4.  Bluetooth Speaker  5.  Quick Grab and Go Shoulder Sling  6.  Breathable Mesh, Ballistic Nylon, Top Quality  7. Regular Backpack   8. Ultra Compact3.  How Does Salt Pack more than Double in Size?  Salt Pack has what is called an "Expansion Zipper" which releases the hidden material that doubles the size of Salt Pack.  Patent Pending.4.  How Do You Make Salt Pack Small Again?  It is so easy!  Just role it up like a sleeping bag and use the attached velcro strap to hold the material hidden inside of your Salt Pack.  Patent Pending.5.  How light weight and strong is the Waterproof Bag?  These bags are simply remarkable.  The material is tuff and ultra light.  In fact, when you are not using your waterproof bag and it is tucked into its hidden pocket, you cannot notice it is there.  Your gonna love this life saver!  It is great for your lunch, camera, wallet, towel, clothes, baby stuff and you name it.6.  How loud is the Speaker?  It is much louder than your Smart Phone and the volume will depend on where you are and how close you are to the speaker.7.  Can I submerge my Salt Pack when my phone is inside the waterproof pocket?  We do not recommend this mostly because it is always possible the water tight seams were not closed completely.  It is water tight but mostly recommended as a splash guard to keep your phone safe and just in case of emergency should your Salt Pack confront significant water.8.  Can I strap Salt Pack on my Paddle Board?  Yes!  Put Salt Pack Deluxe inside your waterproof bag or without a waterproof bag and strap it on.  It works perfect9.  Can I put tall Dive Fins inside Salt Pack Deluxe when it is expanded.  Yes!  Salt Pack Deluxe will handle the tallest of Dive fins.10.  What about Snorkel Gear?  Salt Pack Deluxe is perfect for Snorkeling.  Without fins, put your snorkel gear inside your Salt Pack.  With fins, unzip the expansion material and Salt Pack will handle them easily along with your mask, snorkel, and other gear.11.  How many pockets does Salt Pack have?  There are 4 pockets.  One in the front, the large main compartment that expands, the hidden pocket for the waterproof bag, and the Smart Phone pocket in the front.                                                     12.  Is there a headphone hole so I can listen to music while carrying my Salt Pack Deluxe?  Yes, there is!                                                                                                         13.  How much does Salt Pack weigh?  The basic Salt Pack Deluxe weighs about a pound.  That is with the waterproof Smart Phone pocket and  without the waterproof bag and speaker.
14.  Can I adjust the size of the expanded Salt Pack Deluxe?  Yes!  There are clips at the top of the bag allowing you to roll up the material and clip the clips together to adjust Salt Pack Deluxe to the size you desire.
