Providing direct support to the many physicians and surgeons at Emory enlightened David in his quest for not only finding a treatment and cure for his own eye disease, but to also develop practical technologies that will enhance and improve activities of daily living.David first concieved our FAR system sitting in the hospital several years ago after he was hit by a car walking his four-year-old son to school along with his Seeing Eye dog, Simon. A man failed to stop at a stop sign and crashed into the three in the cross walk. David's seeing eye dog, Simon, saved his son and sacrificed his own life in the process.Watch David's story as told by many media outlets including CNN, NBC, and USA Today. This event was a defining moment for all of us and is why we are here today asking for your help. We have developed a product that can change people’s lives through increased safety and independence. Your contributions will enable us to expand the coverage of our system and exponentially increase the number of users that will benefit from it.We appreciate any level of support you can give us to make the world a more independent, safe, and enjoyable place for the the visually impaired and blind.Thank you!David Furukawa, PA-C

story:
In 1996 loss my right leg to Cancer at the age of 21; and for next ten and half months I was bedridden. After rehab it was time to face my new lot in life; will I stay on disability for the rest of my life or will I find my independence? Another new problem that  I had was a lot of unused shoes; I thought what a waste of closet space and shoes. While being bedridden all those months I begin writing poetry and short stories and one day stumble on Les Brown on television  (Motivational Speaker); I decided then that  I was going to motivate others through poetry. I figured I need a book so I wrote and self published 2 books of poetry (Lyrical Gumbo and Lyrical Gumbo Vol. 2, I'm Not Ready ) with the help of my professor Dr Deborah P. Caines, while attending Southern University at New Orleans. In 2003 I graduated with an Bachelor in Accountant. For the last 13 years I have work have worked as a Accountant. My experience started with City of New Orleans, corporations and other businesses  in Houston and evenly six and half years in the nonprofit industries with the Houston Area Urban League.

To this day the second situation about those unused has still been a issue for me and other amputees. With war, crime, and sickness about 507 people who legs are amputated in United States per day according to Amputee Coalition. with One Foot Two Shoes I want to start a movement for other amputees like myself. I have a vision but without the proper funding. With the funds collected i can purchase shoes in bulk where I can sell one, or two left, or two right shoes to amputees. I decided not to take on an individual backer because this vision is more than just money to me this is personal. I have lived the life of an amputee each and everyday for the last 20 years . So, I  find it necessary to establish good hands on customer service, and a good reputation. These funds will allow me to properly develop and educated the amputee market.

My site will individualize each shoe where the customer can click on a left or right shoe in their size. This will allow amputees that has a Prothesis to purchase from our site at a discount rate(reward for using a Prothesis). We will also allow amputees with unused shoes to sell or get a credit on their purchase from the website. If I received the total fund in I am asking for I can rent a climate control storage, buy storage shelves, advertise with Amputee Coalition. Currently, my website is basically completed and need the shoes to place on the website for purchase.With the total funds I will hire a marketing company to build and drive amputees to my website by means of the social media (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and etc.).

On my site we will have a running campaign to bring awareness to amputees. The campaign is similar to the Breast Cancer Campaign Awareness but instead of people where pink ribbons, they take a selfie with a pair of shoes around their neck.  Just like the Breast  Cancer Campaign Awareness we recognized those amputees who have fought their condition each and everyday despite their amputation. This campaign has already start amongst my friends and family who are not amputees but admire my tenacity to go on living. The picture will be highlight on the website as a slideshow. 

We are asking everyone to send a selfie or a picture to 1foot2shoes@gmail.com with their name and location. I also would ask that people get out my email address to amputees with information like their shoes size, their shoe brands and their favorite shoe colors.

story:
Hello my name is Beverly Smith. I created a unique fashion accessory line. The all in one headwrap. I have always wanted to be an entrepreneur. When the concept came to me for the all in one headwrap, I was actually sitting down wearing a large scarf made into a headwrap with the knot in the back. When I pulled it off and held it in my hand, I thought to myself how cool would it be if you can buy something like this in the stores. Then I thought how cool would it be if I create it myself. I knew it was time to put some action to my ideas. The vision of the all in one headwrap was so clear to me. I start writing down my ideas and sketching that day. I knew what I wanted it to look like. I came up with several concepts but I couldn't stop thinking about this one. I was so excited. After sketching without any sewing background I bought a sewing machine, worked on the headwrap for a while, but the headwrap needed a finishing touch. My next step was to look into sourcing for a prototype to be made. After researching on my own on how to bring an idea to the market, I learned about logos, tag lines, patents and prototypes. I also designed my own logo and made my first prototype. Later on I was introduced to a great production company who help me make a polished and markable product. I am very passionate about my product and having a great learning experience. Although I know there is a lot more to learn. Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf is always on my mind. I created a vision board of inspiring head wraps, I'm constantly thinking of what can I do to make people love my product. It's amazing how many ideas I came up with for the all in one head wrap. Just the thought of the concept to the market and sharing it with the world makes me work harder and committed to making it happen. It's such an amazing feeling when people can see my vision. The feed back makes my heart smile. With this working prototype, I would love for you to go on this amazing journey with me. Bringing Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf to reality.

 

Overview

From the 1700's to the present head-wraps have been worn in different cultures for a variety of reasons. Women would wrap a large piece of fabric or scarf and wear it out to an event. As long as I can remember  it has been a fashion trend on the street. You have seen women and men rock them. This is something of the past that is still very much present.  It's been called the new hat the new scarf reinvented. The all in one head wrap. It is comfortable and convenient, machine washable and it also comes with a lining to prevent breakage. There will be variety of colors, prints and fabrics.  It can be worn in three different styles, top knot, side knot, back knot. Just slide it on, it conforms to the shape of the head, insert your hair into the knot in the back and pull down the drawstring for a secure fit. No more tucking, tying or twisting. IT' S A WRAP!

When the concept came to me for Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf, I wanted to create a great quality product for the fast pace lifestyle needs of my customers with passion and integrity. The trend setters that is always discovering something new and unique to express themselves. My goal is to promote individuality while maintaining a long term ongoing relationship considering my customers needs. A innovative brand that is fashionable, functional, convenient and comfortable. I am focused on committing  my core value of excellent customer service. With the support of the Indiegogo community making Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf into a reality, I can start production. All pledges 100% will go towards.

* Production cost, 
* Sourcing fabrics, trims, brand tags, labling
* Manufactures, cut & sew, packaging
* Web design, marketing
* Rewards 
* Indiegogo fee

FUTURE DESIGN HEADWRAPS AWAITING......,

Baby wraps

Bridal wraps

Couture wraps

Dreads wraps

Eco friendly wraps

Leather wraps

Sports w/wireless Bluetooth wraps

Suede wraps

 

 VISION           
 
My vision five years from now or sooner is to run a multi-million dollar Internet business. Future planning for a grand opening of a specialty store, with a workshop, warehouse manufacturing company. Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf will create local job opportunities, while starting foundations that I strongly believe is necessary and well deserved while proudly serving my community. 

 

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

It is a challenge to work a full time job that requires my attention, taking care of my elderly mom and I lack the capital for my start up. I'm committed to making Knot a Hat Knot a Scarf come to reality.

story:
BRACELETS THAT DO GOOD

The name Journé is derived from the" journey" we are all on. Please join Alexa & I along our journey with our Journé awareness bracelets in trying to make a difference-

Each color represents a cause along with a supporting charity.

With your new Journé bangle you can share and show the cause that you have chosen to support. The more people wearing the Journés; the more we can support the causes. The time is now and together we can make a difference.

Perhaps you are a survivor; know someone in the healing process, or you have suffered the loss of someone dear to you. Maybe you want to make the world more environmentally friendly, make a statement against violence, help children in need or you want to support our four-legged friends. With your Journé bracelet you can bring awareness to the cause that you would like to support, or wear the bangle to honor someone special. 

The Journé bracelets are suitable for every occasion and make a great statement accessory while doing good.

Join us on our Journé in making a difference!

 

 

 

 

 

Here are just a few that have joined our new trend and campaign "THUMBS UP- To making a Difference" !

Each color has one or two causes. We currently have 8 colors representing 12 causes and with your help we can produce more colors and add more causes to choose from.

 

 

 

Charlie is our mascot and supports animal abuse and animal shelters. 

 

EXAMPLES OF SOME OF OUR CAUSES:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE PRODUCT

The Journés  are hand made in Florence from triplets in a family operated business. Each bracelet must travel through 5 stations before  it becomes a finished product. We wanted a unique bangle for both him and her. Six months and 7 samples later, we finally had Journé. Inside the bracelet is an inscription inscribed stating "your journé makes a difference". They cost 129€ (including the 19% tax ) and 10% of the revenue is donated to the selected organization.

 

 

This is an example of a workshop we support. The Organization is called DKMS LIFE- look good feel better which does amazing work world-wide providing seminars for cancer patients to boost their self esteem during this trying time period. 

 

PRODUCT ROADMAP

 

We introduced the bracelets at the end of the quarter of last 2016. After receiving positive feedback we would now like to promote the products. Also, we just finished the sample more affordable Journé bracelets. With your help we would be able to produce the bracelets which would expand our market and increase awareness. Quarter 3 of 2017 we would like to add 2 more colors and causes. In 2018 we would like to add more products and eventually make Journé a global brand for charity products.

 

 

                                         OUR TEAM

             

 ALEXA EGGERS                                         

  • 20 years old                                                                                       
  • German/English/Spanish                                         
  • International Management Student at                  
  • Warwick Business University                                                      

                                                                                                                 

VALUEABLE EXPERIENCE                                            

  • Idea Bringer, Design, IT, Social Media,                      
  • Very passionate about Journé                                      
  • Reliable, Intuitive, and a Team Player                         

 

DIANA ASHAL-EGGERS

  • American living in Germany
  • Studied International Business at      
  • Southern Illinois University, Edwardsville
  • Kodak US Government Accounts & NATO

 

VALUEABLE EXPERIENCE

  • Entrepreneurial Experience
  • Finance, Marketing, Logistics & Sales
  • Flexibel, International, Social & Loyal

 

It took over a year to get the product, organizations, and online shop in place. Now that we have everything we just need your support so that we can begin promoting the products and help those in need. With the profits that Alexa & I receive, we would like to eventually start our own Journé project where we can physically help others and support a local community.

 

IMPACT

Examples of what kind of impact your contribution could have: With your support we really can make a difference in the world.

A journey of a thousand miles begins with one step-

 

 

 

 

BRACELETS THAT LOOK GOOD AND FEEL GOOD

With your new Journé bangle you can share and show the cause that you have chosen to support. The more people wearing the Journés; the more we can support the causes. The time is now and together we can make a difference.

Perhaps you are a survivor; know someone in the healing process, or you have suffered the loss of someone dear to you. Maybe you want to make the world more environmentally friendly, make a statement against violence, help children in need or you want to support our four-legged friends. With your Journé bracelet you can bring awareness to the cause that you would like to support, or wear the bangle to honor someone special. 

The Journé bracelets are suitable for every occasion and make a great statement accessory while doing good.

Join us on our Journé in making a difference!

 

What We Need & What You Get

After putting together a business and financial plan it is clear to us that we need to crowdfund for at least 75,000$ to promote Journé. Should we not reach our goal we will still fulfill our perks. With your help we would use the money for:

  • marketing presence (to gain brand awareness)
  • IT expert to help us with our Online-Shop (bringing more traffic to our sight)
  • media presence- promotion (editorials, advertisement, social media presence, bloggers)
  • manufacture and produce more bracelet colors which will enable us to offer more causes to choose from
  • decrease our current production costs through higher minimums
  • produce from the samples of our more affordable bracelets
  • provide packaging
  • attend Events with a Journé Stand
  • cover our prototype-production costs
  • make Journé a global brand for charity products

 

PERKS

We have some awesome PERKS for you so please have a look. Especially for those of you who have always wanted something directly from Italy. 

THANK YOU FOR BELIEVING IN US- HERE ARE THE PERKS....

  

 

 

FOR THE PERKS: 15$, 25$, 89$,175$ ,260$,445$, 700$, 1000$                                                                                                            

SWEETIES FROM GERMANY

 

FOR THE FOLLOWING PERKS: (1) 15$ (2) 25$ (2) 175$ MAKE A WISH

FOR THE PERK: 25$ & 260$ - YOUR JOURNÉ MAKES A DIFFERENCE

 

 

BACKERS HERE WE HAVE OUR UNIQUE JOURNÈ BRACELETS                                           MADE IN ITALY- The normal retail is 128$

FOR THE FOLLOWING PERKS: (1)89$,(2)175$,(3)260$,(5)445$, ALL (8) OF OUR UNIQUE JOURNÈ BRACELETS FOR 700$                                      

BE ONE OF THE FIRST TO HAVE THIS VERY SPECIAL HIGH-QUALITY                        CHARITY BRACELETS  FOR HIM & HER

 

 

FOR THE ULTIMATE PERK: 1,000$ RETAIL PRICE- (1,500$)

 

(8) UNIQUE JOURNÉ BRACELETS

(2) SATIN BRAID BRACELETS WITH JOURNÉ CHARM

These beautiful Journé bracelets are for him & her and can be adjusted by sliding the knots. We have 10 colors of satin braid bracelets to choose from.                                                                                                                                     

 

 (2)  OF OUR BRAND NEW COLORFUL  NECKLACES WITH A JOURNÈ CHARM

These beautiful Journé satin necklaces come in 10 different colors.  The charm Journé will guide you on your journey in trying to make a difference. We will send you a survey when the campaign is over so that you can let us know which color you would like to have.

 

(4) LEATHER TWISTED BRACELETS FOR HIM & HER

     

This universal charity bracelet is made from fine leather with a twist. The bracelet is attached through a black or silver magnet with JOURNÈ inscribed and comes in 2 sizes. There are 10 colors to choose from.

                             

(1) Leather Journé Charm Necklace and (1) Leather Journé Bracelet

Lovely leather JOURNÉ Charm Necklace and matching leather JOURNÈ adjustable charm bracelet. They both come in 8 colors.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk that we currently foresee would be if the family operated production site closes down and we can not produce the bracelets. If that should come to play we will find other resources as to not allow it to affect the production of the Journé bracelets. There might be a delay in the production of the bracelets but that is always a potential risk. Currently, we are not experiencing this problem. The team could fall out but we made it through puberty so I dont see that as being a risk either.

We have spoken with a number of editors, magazines, medical institutions who are all very interested in our story and what we are trying to achieve. The downside has always been our budget (or lack of one). To receive a featured article with advertisement is expensive and we just could not afford it. So with your help i think we can overcome this challenge and could receive the needed awareness for this project.

Ultimately our goal is to make Journé a global brand for charity products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please tell everyone you know about our campaign. Spread the word-
  • You can donate or purchase our products here on Indiegogo by clicking the pink button close to the top of the right page that says "Back it" and donate, or choose the "Perk" box you would like to purchase products from.
  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Please promote us on social media- you can follow and share our posts on Instagram under #journeofficial or Facebook under (Journé Bracelet) and like our stuff-
  • You can read about us under www.journeofficial.com
  • THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ANYTHING YOU CAN DO FOR US!!!!

Very passionate about Journé                                      
Reliable, Intuitive, and a Team Player                         

 
DIANA ASHAL-EGGERS

American living in Germany
Studied International Business at      
Southern Illinois University, Edwardsville
Kodak US Government Accounts & NATO

 
VALUEABLE EXPERIENCE

Entrepreneurial Experience
Finance, Marketing, Logistics & Sales
Flexibel, International, Social & Loyal

 
It took over a year to get the product, organizations, and online shop in place. Now that we have everything we just need your support so that we can begin promoting the products and help those in need. With the profits that Alexa & I receive, we would like to eventually start our own Journé project where we can physically help others and support a local community.
 
IMPACT
Examples of what kind of impact your contribution could have: With your support we really can make a difference in the world.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with one step-

 
 

 


 
BRACELETS THAT LOOK GOOD AND FEEL GOOD
With your new Journé bangle you can share and show the cause that you have chosen to support. The more people wearing the Journés; the more we can support the causes. The time is now and together we can make a difference.
Perhaps you are a survivor; know someone in the healing process, or you have suffered the loss of someone dear to you. Maybe you want to make the world more environmentally friendly, make a statement against violence, help children in need or you want to support our four-legged friends. With your Journé bracelet you can bring awareness to the cause that you would like to support, or wear the bangle to honor someone special. 
The Journé bracelets are suitable for every occasion and make a great statement accessory while doing good.
Join us on our Journé in making a difference!
 
What We Need & What You Get

After putting together a business and financial plan it is clear to us that we need to crowdfund for at least 75,000$ to promote Journé. Should we not reach our goal we will still fulfill our perks. With your help we would use the money for:

marketing presence (to gain brand awareness)
IT expert to help us with our Online-Shop (bringing more traffic to our sight)
media presence- promotion (editorials, advertisement, social media presence, bloggers)
manufacture and produce more bracelet colors which will enable us to offer more causes to choose from
decrease our current production costs through higher minimums
produce from the samples of our more affordable bracelets
provide packaging
attend Events with a Journé Stand
cover our prototype-production costs
make Journé a global brand for charity products

 
PERKS
We have some awesome PERKS for you so please have a look. Especially for those of you who have always wanted something directly from Italy. 
THANK YOU FOR BELIEVING IN US- HERE ARE THE PERKS....
  

 

 
FOR THE PERKS: 15$, 25$, 89$,175$ ,260$,445$, 700$, 1000$                                                                                                            
SWEETIES FROM GERMANY

 
FOR THE FOLLOWING PERKS: (1) 15$ (2) 25$ (2) 175$ MAKE A WISH


FOR THE PERK: 25$ & 260$ - YOUR JOURNÉ MAKES A DIFFERENCE

 
 
BACKERS HERE WE HAVE OUR UNIQUE JOURNÈ BRACELETS                                           MADE IN ITALY- The normal retail is 128$
FOR THE FOLLOWING PERKS: (1)89$,(2)175$,(3)260$,(5)445$, ALL (8) OF OUR UNIQUE JOURNÈ BRACELETS FOR 700$                                      
BE ONE OF THE FIRST TO HAVE THIS VERY SPECIAL HIGH-QUALITY                        CHARITY BRACELETS  FOR HIM & HER
 



 
FOR THE ULTIMATE PERK: 1,000$ RETAIL PRICE- (1,500$)
 
(8) UNIQUE JOURNÉ BRACELETS


(2) SATIN BRAID BRACELETS WITH JOURNÉ CHARM

These beautiful Journé bracelets are for him & her and can be adjusted by sliding the knots. We have 10 colors of satin braid bracelets to choose from.                                                                                                                                     
 
 (2)  OF OUR BRAND NEW COLORFUL  NECKLACES WITH A JOURNÈ CHARM

These beautiful Journé satin necklaces come in 10 different colors.  The charm Journé will guide you on your journey in trying to make a difference. We will send you a survey when the campaign is over so that you can let us know which color you would like to have.
 
(4) LEATHER TWISTED BRACELETS FOR HIM & HER

     
This universal charity bracelet is made from fine leather with a twist. The bracelet is attached through a black or silver magnet with JOURNÈ inscribed and comes in 2 sizes. There are 10 colors to choose from.
                             
(1) Leather Journé Charm Necklace and (1) Leather Journé Bracelet

Lovely leather JOURNÉ Charm Necklace and matching leather JOURNÈ adjustable charm bracelet. They both come in 8 colors.
 

 
Risks & Challenges

The only risk that we currently foresee would be if the family operated production site closes down and we can not produce the bracelets. If that should come to play we will find other resources as to not allow it to affect the production of the Journé bracelets. There might be a delay in the production of the bracelets but that is always a potential risk. Currently, we are not experiencing this problem. The team could fall out but we made it through puberty so I dont see that as being a risk either.
We have spoken with a number of editors, magazines, medical institutions who are all very interested in our story and what we are trying to achieve. The downside has always been our budget (or lack of one). To receive a featured article with advertisement is expensive and we just could not afford it. So with your help i think we can overcome this challenge and could receive the needed awareness for this project.
Ultimately our goal is to make Journé a global brand for charity products.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please tell everyone you know about our campaign. Spread the word-
You can donate or purchase our products here on Indiegogo by clicking the pink button close to the top of the right page that says "Back it" and donate, or choose the "Perk" box you would like to purchase products from.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
Please promote us on social media- you can follow and share our posts on Instagram under #journeofficial or Facebook under (Journé Bracelet) and like our stuff-
You can read about us under www.journeofficial.com

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR ANYTHING YOU CAN DO FOR US!!!!

story:
Short Summary

We are a collective of designers creating comedically controversial and politically charged merch that expresses our deep, and real, frustrations with the Trump administration. Our mission is to work with organizations whose important work counters the disastrous effects of 45’s “ideas” all while helping other’s publicly express their own dissatisfaction with the current White House occupant. The lowly t-shirt and poster have been used as an outward expression of our identity for decades. Whether it's your favorite band’s tour tee or a kitten reminding you to hang in there, our clothes say something about ourselves.

As designers, our days consist of developing brands, building websites, and designing some of the products you might already own. When well executed, our work can strike up a conversation with folks on the street or your Trump lovin’ Uncle at your next family gathering. He’s gonna love these items and we hope you do too. You’ll have so much to chat about.

All of the items sold through our online store will donate to organizations whose work help those affected by the policies that have been put into place since the Trump Administration has taken office.

While we await Trump’s inevitable exit from office, we will continue to produce new designs throughout the upcoming months, adding new designers to our roster of collaborators. Looking to work with us? Drop us a line.

 

Our Launch

To launch our first round of designs we have this IndieGoGo Campaign for the next few weeks. If you can purchase an item or two for yourself or a friend. This will help us get this brand off the ground and launched at PutinAmericaFirst.com.

Over the next few months, while we await Trump inevitably leaving office, we will keep producing new designs and be adding new designers to our roster of collaborators. 

Looking to work with us? Please drop us a line.

 

Giving Back

50% of all profits will be donated to organizations working on the Environment, Education, Healthcare and Civil Rights.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate you can help spread the word.

Post this campaign link in a message, email or social post and send to your family members who either (a) Have the good taste and an appreciation of well made funny shirts or (b) Seem to be a Trump cultist and will go bananas with the link and share it in disgust to thousands of other people.

 

SINCERELY,

Your friendly, neighborhood snowflakes and trouble-making creative types.

....

Here are a few of the designs in Round One of the collection. Our model is expensive but he is worth every ruble.

 

The Putin America First and Hindsight is 2020 shirts.


TRE45ON and Trump Shirts


Butter Emails and Trump Steaks Shirts.


The Putin Jersey and Obama Lama Ding Dong Shirt.


Get a 18" x 24" inch screen printed poster.

 

Help us buy a billboard in Washington DC and Maralago.

story:
Introducing Nuorikko

See the Spring 2018 Collection

 

The Bridal Landscape

Last year, there were 2.2 million weddings in the U.S. which is an average of over 6000 weddings every day! The bridal industry is a growing market, but, like other traditional retailers, many bridal gown manufacturers are struggling or even going out of business. The modern bride is more interested in individuality than tradition, and there is too much importance assigned to a wedding gown for her to compromise on an experience or a product she doesn’t feel is right for her.
 

Nuorikko is empowering the millennial bride.

We are bringing some of the best elements of the custom design process to the mass market, creating an experience that is simpler, faster, less expensive, and more personal.

 

Not every bride has the option of going custom, or the vision to create a gown from scratch. Most brides simply want better options for a style they feel beautiful and comfortable in. 

 

The Benefit to the Bride

Nuorikko is the first brand in the bridal market to combine a unique, customizable product, technology-focused manufacturing, and interactive sales tools.

 

We deliver a customized product in less than half the time it takes our competitors to deliver a standard gown.

 

Its the bridal gown, evolved. The millennial bride is a savvy and discerning customer, and she wants this type of hands-on shopping experience.

 

Customizable Separates + Powerful Technologies = Empowered Brides

 

The Evolution of the Bridal Gown

Nuorikko’s unique product is not a custom gown, neither is it a traditional made-to-order bridal gown. Its better than either of these models. Our line of mix & match separates, with customizations on every piece, gives you the ability to choose your silhouette, style, and options such as neckline, sleeve, train, and fabric. With only 15 pieces, there are more than 8000 potential combinations.

Nuorikko does not use traditional made-to-order manufacturing. The line features bespoke, premium materials and trims, and our standard, variable option system creates a gown that is unique and quick to produce, otherwise known as mass customization.

 

All of our products are exclusively manufactured in the U.S.

Custom designed lasercut lace being cut to order in Denver, CO

 

We are actively promoting technology based, sustainable manufacturing, and employing talented artisans and craftsmen in Denver and Los Angeles to make our products.


Modern, technology-focused apparel production in L.A.'s fashion district

 

The Product: A Customized Gown

 

How it works:

Our line of mix & match separates is designed to be far more than just tops + bottoms. Its a unique mix of silhouettes, fabrics, and options that can be styled together in just about any combination a Nuorikko bride can imagine.

 

Each piece has its own specific set of standard variations, giving even more flexibility and individuality to the finished look. Depending on the piece, you can choose to add or remove a train, sleeves, or embellishments, or change a neckline or hem length to suit your body and your style.

We are the first bridal brand to give the bride the freedom to create her own gown without burying her in decisions and options. Its not a true custom gown, its better. Our U.S. made, mass customization model means that you will have your unique, finished look delivered in only 8-11 weeks.

 

Using Technology to Enhance the
Shopping Experience

Retail is on the cusp of a very important evolution. The modern consumer is demanding an experience that gives them a connection to their purchase, which for many millennials equates to technology and social media. There are many, varied examples of this trend:

“Technology has advanced to the point where the ability for brands to reach consumers directly is not only possible, it’s preferable.”

- Business of Fashion

 

“Customisation as the original fashion and beauty strategy has recently been put on steroids by technology, and we can expect that this AI- and data-fuelled trend is only going to continue.”

- Fashion & Mash

 

 “The choice no longer needs a ‘bridal label,’ It should just be cool clothes.”

- New York Times

 

Nuorikko’s technology-based customization is not only the future of retail, and a perfect fit for a modern bride’s needs, it's a sustainable, responsible method of production that reduces overhead and waste, while allowing our customers to have more input into what they’re buying.

It's a win-win.

We have designed a build your own gown tool that will be used on our website, mobile apps, and in interactive large-scale touchscreens at trunk shows and events, giving the bride control over her look and connecting her with our product.

 

A New Way to Shop for Your Bridal Gown

Nuorikko’s technology takes guesswork out of bridal shopping by showing you how your gown will look on your body, in your size. We’re combining customizable product with augmented reality so you can virtually try-on the pieces you design.

       
Nuorikko's online Build Your Own Gown Tool lets you style your look in a one-page, interactive experience. You see exactly how your gown will look with the customizations you choose, on your body. The tool then tells you which sizes to buy based on your intended fit.


Responsive Mobile Integration of BYOG Tool, including fit & sizing suggestions

       

The mobile app is also used in Large-Scale Interactive Touch Screens

 

Meet the Founder

My name is Kaitlyn, and I am not only the CEO & Founder of Nuorikko, I am a former frustrated bride. 10 years ago, I made my own wedding gown because I couldn’t find any options on the market that even came close to suiting my personal style. Then, as my 10th anniversary and vow renewal approached, I found myself even more frustrated with the lack of options on the market that allowed for individuality, or for that matter, a positive shopping experience. I decided it was past time someone set to work updating the stagnant niche that is the bridal gown market, and Nuorikko’s concept was born.


Custom Nuorikko Design, 2017

With over 13 years’ experience in design & line creation for a variety of custom, couture and ready-to-wear products and brands, I know the ins-and-outs of the apparel manufacturing industry, and my knowledge, background, and contacts are perfectly suited to bringing a customizable product to the mass market. 

 

Why are we on Indiegogo?

We need your backing to help us build our first version of sales technologies, launching a platform that we will leverage to not only enhance the bride’s shopping experience, but build a more efficient and sustainable production model. By supporting our development of this first version of our technologies, you are supporting the evolution of the bridal industry into an experience that better serves our brides, connecting them to their purchase, and helping to scale the mass customization model to deliver our modern product through increasingly efficient and sustainable U.S. production.

 


Our product is newly launched, available for purchase, and gaining traction in the marketplace.

Nuorikko's concept is literally going to revolutionize the bridal industry as we know it!

Help us create the experience and technology to empower the millennial bride. Nuorikko is the first brand of its kind with the solution to the bridal market’s stagnation. This is the future. Support the crowdfunding campaign, and you not only become part of revolutionizing the bridal industry, you get access to exclusive, custom designed products that are not sold anywhere else.

 

Unique Perks Handmade in the U.S.

Our business is focused on U.S.-based craftsmen and modern production. This means that our products are carefully crafted, high quality goods, and that our overhead remains low. But our commitment to U.S. artisans doesn't stop with the production of our gowns. 

 

We are offering you a line of laser cut, custom-designed accessories that is exclusive to this campaign!

 

With prices ranging from 30-70% off the valued retail, they are the perfect way to own a piece of the Nuorikko brand. Each piece is crafted by Denver, CO artisans and made to order from premium leather or lasercut lace.

 


Nuorikko Leather Bundle, created in collaboration with iCaro Designs, includes makeup bag that is only available with purchase of this perk


Our collaboration with iCaro Designs features raw leather, artisan designs, and details including genuine suede lacing & lasercut logos.


Quality construction & detailing. Metal hardware and carefully crafted closures.

 


Our exclusive, handmade Lasercut Lace Headpiece is a great addition to your bridal style, and only available on Indiegogo!


One-of-a-kind lasercut lace veil. Take your bridal style to the next level! Only available on Indiegogo!

 

FAQs

Q: How are the funds from the campaign going to be used?

A: We have already contracted a developer to create and implement our Build Your Own Gown tool, and we will immediately begin working on the development of technology once the campaign funds are received. Our first focus will be to implement this technology on our website, then we will build a custom app that also integrates smart fit recommendations. In addition to making it easy to shop Nuorikko from your mobile phone, we will utilize this app as a sales tool in interactive touch screens for trunk shows and other events.  

Q: I want to support Nuorikko, but I can't buy any of your products right now. What else can I do?

A: Thanks for your support! We need enthusiastic advocates to help spread the word on Nuorikko as much as we need funding to develop our technologies. Your help to share us on Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, among your friends, family or customers, and across any other platforms you use is also incredibly valuable to us! 

Q: How long after the campaign ends until I receive my products?

A: Production for our custom designed accessories will be complete within  100 days after the campaign ends. These are handmade, artisan goods, and it takes time to make sure they are created with the quality we expect. 

Q: What shipping method will you use?

A: Orders will be shipped using the most efficient ground carrier for your location. If you prefer a faster method, please contact us and we are happy to arrange the carrier and method of your choice at your cost.

Q: What is your return policy?

A: Every Nuorikko product is made-to-order specifically for you, so we cannot accept returns. We do guarantee our quality and construction, so if there is a verified quality issue or defect, we will replace or repair it at no charge to you. If your garment doesn't fit, that is not considered a defect, so make sure you're ordering the size that suits you best (try booking a consultation with a personal stylist to make sure)!

Q: Does this apply to the custom-made leather bags for the campaign?

A: Yes it does. We are confident in our partners and artisans, and stand behind our promotional products the same way we stand behind our gowns.

Q: There is a quality issue. What do I do?

A: You must contact us within 10 days of receiving your order with any quality concerns or issues. A personal stylist will walk you through submitting photos and details of your concerns, and determine if there is cause for a repair or replacement. Then we will work with you to get the issue corrected as quickly as we possibly can

Your help to share us on Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, among your friends, family or customers, and across any other platforms you use is also incredibly valuable to us! 
Q: How long after the campaign ends until I receive my products?
A: Production for our custom designed accessories will be complete within  100 days after the campaign ends. These are handmade, artisan goods, and it takes time to make sure they are created with the quality we expect. 
Q: What shipping method will you use?
A: Orders will be shipped using the most efficient ground carrier for your location. If you prefer a faster method, please contact us and we are happy to arrange the carrier and method of your choice at your cost.
Q: What is your return policy?
A: Every Nuorikko product is made-to-order specifically for you, so we cannot accept returns. We do guarantee our quality and construction, so if there is a verified quality issue or defect, we will replace or repair it at no charge to you. If your garment doesn't fit, that is not considered a defect, so make sure you're ordering the size that suits you best (try booking a consultation with a personal stylist to make sure)!
Q: Does this apply to the custom-made leather bags for the campaign?
A: Yes it does. We are confident in our partners and artisans, and stand behind our promotional products the same way we stand behind our gowns.
Q: There is a quality issue. What do I do?
A: You must contact us within 10 days of receiving your order with any quality concerns or issues. A personal stylist will walk you through submitting photos and details of your concerns, and determine if there is cause for a repair or replacement. Then we will work with you to get the issue corrected as quickly as we possibly can

story:
Short Summary

According to the U.S. Department of Justice September 2013 Special Report, “Police Behavior during Traffic and Street Stops, 2011,” in 2011, over 62.9 million U.S. residents age 16 or older, or 26% of the population, had one or more contacts with police during the prior 12 months. For about half (49%) of persons experiencing contact with police, the most recent contact was involuntary or police-initiated. 1 in 10 believed the police had not behaved properly. Regardless of the reason for the stop, less than 5% of persons who believed the police had not behaved properly filed a complaint.

In a world of increasing potential dangers, Global Justice seeks to increase personal security for the everyday drive to work, the grocery store, and the road trip. The Company also seeks to protect ordinary citizens from the public safety issues that arise during common traffic stops. Global Justice was birthed to help increase both public and officer safety by documenting traffic stops as thoroughly as possible. The goal is to minimize potential dangers by improving human behavior (both officer and vehicle occupants) and preventing situation escalation. Well-documented scientific research has found that human behavior is improved when people realize that they are being observed or are otherwise under surveillance. Global Justice will utilize this knowledge combined with the latest technological advancements to design products that promote peaceful encounters between law enforcement and civilians while protecting customers from other potentially dangerous situations, including theft and kidnapping. 

Large and Growing Market Opportunity

· 16.5 million new vehicles were sold in the U.S. in 2014

· There are 210 million licensed drivers in the U.S.

· One in every 10 American drivers was pulled over for a traffic violation in 2011

· There were 699,594 vehicles stolen in the U.S. in 2013

Competitive Advantages

· Pending patent

· Native platform installment with global auto manufacturers

· Wireless device integration

· Voice command and automated capabilities

· Comprehensive customer service and link to legal counsel

· Addressing growing public safety and civil justice concerns

Protect Your Liberties with Global Justice!


The Impact

This will impact traffic stops and forever change them as we know them. This is a disruptive technology to the police force, the justice system, and society as a whole. 

Global Justice will Secure Your Liberties with safe and clear video footage that will no longer suddenly disappear (prevents destroying evidence).

Global Justice will provide legal counsel as needed during traffic stops.

Global Justice will provide clear video footage for insurance claims.

Global Justice will probably result in new traffic laws.

Global Justice will help create thousands of much needed jobs.

How many times have you been in a dire situation and needed an extra set of eyes to watch your back? How many times have you walked to your car with great concern for your safety? Perhaps you or a loved one has been pulled over for unknown reasons (The inventors of Global Justice have and it was quite concerning for them). At times unlawful or questionable orders are given-What do you do? Because you are under duress and in fear of the repercussions for not complying or "Disorderly Conduct", you comply and give up your rights and liberties as a free American. 

Global Justice will be there for you and your loved ones. 

Secure Your Liberties with Global Justice!

Risks & Challenges

The risks with Global Justice will be ensuring we don't overstep our boundaries. Once we hire our Chief Legal Officer and legal team, we will ensure the laws of our land are not ignored.  This includes Global Justice staff as well as police officers and our clients, we believe no one is above the law. 

Just as we witness police "abuse of power" we also witness bad elements of society fatally injure our good and innocent police officers during traffic stops. We cannot prevent every bad outcome but we will assess and reassess what is working, and what is not working and implement the proper necessary changes.

What we mean by that is, we plan to employ psychologists to study events and help bring a safe answer to implementing new, and future policies. We will make our studies available to the Department of Justice so that police departments throughout the country can have evidence-based data. Right now, much of their data regarding police abuse and traffic stops are collected via surveys. This is a subjective-type data collection. With our clear video footage we will provide clear objective data.

As a military veteran, electrician, Navy Corpsman, Lab tech and Nurse, Tom's practice has always included assessing and reassessing. These same traits have been long instilled within his daughter Samantha. This same practice of assessing and reassessing to stay ahead of the curve will be implemented throughout Global Justice to ensure we stay sharp while we forge through these exciting times of Securing Your Liberties. 

Secure Your Liberties with Global Justice!   

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times are tough for so many out there. Even if you cannot afford to donate, please take the time to call the corporate offices of the auto manufactures and request our Global Justice technology in their new vehicles. 

With your emails and calls, the CEO's and board members will take notice. Remember, they too want sales, and more importantly, they want their vehicles to be a safe place for you, their consumers. Recently, many of the auto manufactures were named in a major lawsuit regarding carbon monoxide poisoning. Our Global Justice patent pending system and service properly and safely addresses that issue as well.

So please take the time to share our link, as well as email and call the auto manufactures to request our Global Justice technology. 

Secure Your Liberties with Global Justice!

story:
Meet Mu

And the Mu Family

Mu ( [Moo] ) lets anyone create REAL autonomous robots, not those dumb bots that have to be hand-controlled remotely. A toy with Mu installed can see with its eye and do many intelligent things:

Tracking lines


Recognizing Faces

Detecting Color and Shapes

Tracking Balls

Following People

  • For parents, Mu is the head of a robot that your kids can design and put together.
  • For Lego EV3 users, Mu is the missing vision sensor that Lego NEVER releases.
  • For hobbyists, Mu is the smart eye and brain that can be embedded in any robotic projects.
Priced at almost half of an original Lego EV3 sensor, Mu delivers great technology in a very affordable package.


Mu was launched in CES 2016!

During CES, the Mu LIVE demo attracted thousands of visitors each day from both media and industry. The Morpx team also presented a Mu live demo at the New York Toy Fair in Feb 2016.

“Mu smart toy, a sensor add-on that acts as a smart eye and brain for your existing remote controlled toys” -- CES 2016 official Press Release

“How does the Internet of Things see? Through modules like the Mu.” -- PCWorld

“Morpx's Mu for Toys gives your favorite toys the gift of sight”  -- IDG.TV

“…smartest, most innovative projects that caught our attention” — Atmel Blog

Mu has been featured in:


Benefits and Features

How to play with Mu?

There are different ways to pair Mu with a toy body (most of which can be sourced easily online or in your local stores).

1. Mu action figures （for 5+)

You can create bodies for Mu using lego pieces or wood blocks. Mu makes a great action figure that can see and talk. You can even record your own voice. We will publish building instructions of different action figures when Mu ships.

2. Mu autonomous toy robots (for 7+)

You can install Mu on remote controlled toys such as the Hexbug remote controlled series (Spider, Tarantula, or Fire ant). Mu's Infra-Red transmitter can talk to any IR controlled toy to move them around as an autonomous robot.

3. Mu on Lego Mindstorms EV3 (for 9+)

You can build more advanced robots using Lego Mindstorms EV3. Mu can talk to EV3 through its IR sensor. Just set the EV3 to the IR control mode and Mu will take over the control.
4. Mu with its own body (New!)

We have designed a customized body based on the open source robot zowi (with 4 servo motors on the legs for many dance moves). Check our newly added perk!

Once Mu is installed on a robotic body, it can perform a number of detection & tracking tasks as shown previously. You will use the mode button on the back of Mu to switch between these tasks. Have more awesome ideas of using Mu? Share with us at mu@morpx.com. You could be chosen to win a free Mu developer's package.

Select your perk

Our mission is to make robot building a fun experience for everyone. Your contribution is very important for us to reach that goal. As a reward, you will be among the first to experience the cutting edge technology embedded in Mu. Grab that early bird price before it's gone!


Toys that are compatible with Mu

Mu is compatible with any toy that uses infra-red remote control. Mu can control a toy as long as the IR codes of the toy are known.

Here is a list of well-known IR controlled toys (where earlier items are easier to integrate with Mu). And we are working hard to add new toys to the list.

  1. Lego Mindstorms EV3:  LEGO, Amazon

  2. Hexbug Remote Controlled bugs: Spider, Tarantula, Fire ant

  3. Lego Technic Sets with Power Functions and IR receiver: LEGO, Amazon

  4.  Remote controlled Robot by ThinkGizmos: Amazon

  5.  Zoomer Dino: Amazon

  6. Disney Cars Lightning McQueen: Amazon

  7. Other IR toys: Amazon


What's inside a Mu package?

1. Fully assembled Mu. (For those who choose the no battery early bird version, your Mu has to draw power from the USB or other sources. LEGO Mindstorms EV3 has a USB port that you could use for power.)

2. Universal mount for Mu.

3. Double-sided foam stickers.

4. Micro-USB cable for charging and data transfer.

5. Cardboard for creating a stationary body for Mu.

6. Instruction manual.

Who We Are

Morpx, the company behind Mu, is a technology & design startup born in Silicon Valley and grown up in Hangzhou, China. Our mission is to give vision, arguably the most important human sense, to any ordinary object through hardware and software innovations. 

Morpx was founded in July 2013 by former Google researcher Dr. Tianli Yu and Dr. Frank Ran. Both founders are parents of school-aged kids and they know first hand the importance of kids playing in the real world rather than on the smartphone.

Technical Details

Inside a MU

Small, versatile, yet easy to use, Mu is an engineering marvel that delivers state-of-the-art computer vision hardware and software in a tiny, self-contained package.

It has:

  • A camera to see colors, lines, balls, faces, and human contours.

  • A universal IR transmitter to control LEGO EV3, Hexbugs, etc.

  • An internal speaker for voice and music.

  • A set of color LEDs as blinking eyes.

  • An internal rechargeable battery that runs continuously for up to 8 hours.

Mu has already gone through 4 iterations of PCB design.


For DIYers

The Mu PCB includes two sets of the 3-wire servo connectors. It also has SPI/I2C pins to interface with Arduino or Raspberry Pi. We will release a community version of the Mu software for people who like to write their own control program.

Hardware specs

The Software

M-Eye OS, the software platform running on Mu, is specifically optimized for interactive robots that rely primarily on visual sensors. It has a very compact memory footprint and can even run entirely in the cache of modern processors. 

M-Eye OS can boot up in 1 second, while other Linux based solutions take 30 - 60 seconds to boot.

On top of the M-Eye OS is our cutting-edge computer vision library that includes algorithms such as:

  • Line / shape / color tracking
  • Face detection / recognition
  • Human body tracking
  • Morpx Deep Learning Runtime Engine

The Mu4Toys App

You can use the Mu4Toys app to customize the Mu's behavior on different toys, set event triggering or record voice response. Once it is customized, you don't need smartphone again to play with your Mu robot.

Timeline

Fun Facts

  • Mu means eye in ancient Chinese. Its Chinese character is 目.
  • Mu was launched at CES 2016 in Las Vegas. There was a story floating around that Mu is the head of an alien robot, who was rescued by the Morpx team out of the Nevada desert.

Frequently Asked Questions

1.How do I put the MU on a LEGO EV3 set?

You can use a small, round, double-sided foam tape (included) and stick it near the IR sensor of EV3. For more details please check our youtube instruction video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4pHRQrpQok

2. Could I use a Mu to control LEGO® Power Functions IR Receiver(8884)?

Lego Power Functions IR receiver uses the same IR code as the the EV3. So Mu can control both. For details please see this discussion.

3. Where will you ship and what's the shipping cost?

We ship worldwide. Free shipping is available for 5 Mu, 10 Mu, and 20 Mu orders. The shipping fee is between $4-$10. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

4. How do I upgrade my perk to a better one?

If you'd like to upgrade your perk to a higher-priced perk, you can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. For example, if you originally claimed a $10 perk but now you want to upgrade to a $98 perk, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk" next to your $10 perk. This will direct you back to the contribution flow. You can then select the new higher-priced perk you'd like to claim.

When you complete the transaction, your original contribution will be automatically refunded. Read about how to upgrade your perk. 

5. How do I choose more than one perk?

The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to initiate a separate process for each pre-order. If you encounter difficulties, please email mu@morpx.com  and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.

6. I preordered MU but I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?

Please see the article on How to Know if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com.

7. There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve them: Common Contribution Errors.

8. Why am I checking out through Indiegogo?

We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real. We want you to know that we have the full support of the crowdfunding community to help keep us accountable.

9. Can I get a refund?

Indiegogo does process refunds during the campaign. If you would like a refund, we're sorry to see you go. Please see here for How To Request a Refund. 

10. If I have other questions, whom should I contact?

We are receiving a lot of inquiries, and are responding as fast as possible. Please contact mu@morpx.com  with any other questions you may have.

story:
Hi guys! My name is Thelma Gonzalez, and I am the owner of Hospital Buddies. This is a new line of totes that feature hospital necessities. My line includes pre-packaged maternity bags for new mommies, pre-packaged bags for patients receiving treatments such as chemo-therapy and dialysis, and patients planning for surgeries. My fashionable bags include a robe, slippers, all natural toiletries, headphones, and a few more items that would make your hospital stay more comfortable.

I first came up with this idea when I was pregnant with my daughter. Like most physicians, my doctor advised me to have a pre-packed bag for my delivery. I did not know exactly what I needed because it was my first child. This idea grew as I witnessed family and friends receive weekly or monthly treatments. I knew they would have appreciated a pre-packaged bag that they could carry to the hospital each time without packing or unpacking.

I am very passionate about this line. I believe that not only is this line fashionable and trendy, but it will take some stress away from patients and their family members. It will allow patients and family members to focus on more important things during their stay.

 

What We Need 

Currently, I am in the beginning stages of this project. I am in the process of launching my site to make my bags available for everyone. Not only am I trying to spread the word to patients, I would like to have insurance companies take a look at these bags. I would like to make it available for all patients that are spending time in a hospital. 

Here is how your contribution would help:

  • Allow me to purchase supplies for the line (where the bulk of the money would go)
  • Allow me to create a website for orders and customer feedback
  • Allow me to market my line to customers and insurance companies

The Impact

I believe this line will really make a difference in hospital stays. Patients will not have to worry about packing and unpacking their bags (if they are receiving multiple treatment. It wil allow patients to order a pre-packaged bag with their fashionable necessities and focus on their hospital stay. My line will also include all natural products that are great for the body and environment.

Risks & Challenges

I am excited and enthusiast about Hospital Buddies. I have many creative ideas, and I know exactly what direction I want this company to go. I would love to share my fashionable bags with everyone that spends time in a hospital. 
There are a few challenges that I would like to overcome. I would like to keep pricing down to insure that Hospital Buddies prices stay affordable for my customers. This can be done by buying more products in bulk. For examples, my distributor is able to deprease the cost of each robe and bag if the quantity is increased. I also would like to make a strong presence with marketing. This can successful by presenting strong social media pages and an informative and interactive website. 
  • Every bit of your support helps!

Other Ways You Can Help

THANK YOU for visiting my page, and I hope all your questions about Hospital Buddies have been answered. I will be working on the company's Facebook and Instagram page very soon! Any suggestions about what customer's are looking for in these bags would be great. Please email me directly hospitalbud@gmail.com.
story_txt:
Hi guys! My name is Thelma Gonzalez, and I am the owner of Hospital Buddies. This is a new line of totes that feature hospital necessities. My line includes pre-packaged maternity bags for new mommies, pre-packaged bags for patients receiving treatments such as chemo-therapy and dialysis, and patients planning for surgeries. My fashionable bags include a robe, slippers, all natural toiletries, headphones, and a few more items that would make your hospital stay more comfortable. I first came up with this idea when I was pregnant with my daughter. Like most physicians, my doctor advised me to have a pre-packed bag for my delivery. I did not know exactly what I needed because it was my first child. This idea grew as I witnessed family and friends receive weekly or monthly treatments. I knew they would have appreciated a pre-packaged bag that they could carry to the hospital each time without packing or unpacking. I am very passionate about this line. I believe that not only is this line fashionable and trendy, but it will take some stress away from patients and their family members. It will allow patients and family members to focus on more important things during their stay.     What We Need  Currently, I am in the beginning stages of this project. I am in the process of launching my site to make my bags available for everyone. Not only am I trying to spread the word to patients, I would like to have insurance companies take a look at these bags. I would like to make it available for all patients that are spending time in a hospital. Here is how your contribution would help:  Allow me to purchase supplies for the line (where the bulk of the money would go)
Allow me to create a website for orders and customer feedback Allow me to market my line to customers and insurance companies
    The Impact I believe this line will really make a difference in hospital stays. Patients will not have to worry about packing and unpacking their bags (if they are receiving multiple treatment. It wil allow patients to order a pre-packaged bag with their fashionable necessities and focus on their hospital stay. My line will also include all natural products that are great for the body and environment.   Risks & Challenges
I am excited and enthusiast about Hospital Buddies. I have many creative ideas, and I know exactly what direction I want this company to go. I would love to share my fashionable bags with everyone that spends time in a hospital. 
There are a few challenges that I would like to overcome. I would like to keep pricing down to insure that Hospital Buddies prices stay affordable for my customers. This can be done by buying more products in bulk. For examples, my distributor is able to deprease the cost of each robe and bag if the quantity is increased. I also would like to make a strong presence with marketing. This can successful by presenting strong social media pages and an informative and interactive website.   Every bit of your support helps! Please email me directly hospitalbud@gmail.com.

story:
What Makes Tracker Now Different?

The current consumer tracking devices on the market use a BLE (Bluetooth low energy) module that doesn't cover more than 150 feet. Therefore, in case of theft, your items would be lost forever. However, with the implementation of an advanced GPS and BLE module, Tracker Now gives you the ability to track your belongings across the entire globe assuring you never lose anything again. 

Why nothing compares to Tracker Now.

(logos above each) Coming ..... 


                                                Some of the Numbers and Facts

               (missing children, pets, luggage) Look for facts or videos to support most current facts) ..... IN WORKS

(Change back to kickstarter and redate)  ..... IN WORKS
story_txt:
Some of the facts

Travel 
Missing children 
Find some others

                        
Add the best pics from Twitter
Change calendar of events

Fix the wording under maps

____________
Fix wording above map
Add social links


                               
Our mission is to make finding missing assets easy, fast & painless. While at the same time changing the fate of the ones that go lost or stolen.
Tracker Now is the smallest GPS tracking device that acts as a bridge between technology and personal items. Always know belongings are secure, loved ones are safe, and pets are where they should be!
The Tracker Now device is the first its kind to apply BLE, GPS, GSM, and Wifi. Leveraging all of these technologies Ensures Worldwide Tracking  Putting the control of finding lost items at your fingertips no matter where they may be at anytime 



Through the use of BLE, GPS, GSM, and Wifi for Global Worldwide Tracking, Tracker Now is just a ping a from making sure nothing gets lost again. 



This function is especially useful for children or pets. Example: A user can set parameters by drawing a fence around his or her property. If tracked child or pet leaves the house or yard user is notified. Fences can be drawn anywhere worldwide.



 The embedded speaker makes it easier to find a tracked item.  The chirping will lead you directly to it.

Always know where your belongings are while vacationing or working away from home. 
*Language barrier? speaking or reading? No problem, you will precisely know where a tracked item is if it goes missing, even in unfamiliar surroundings.
*On the other hand while leaving your world behind it is beneficial to be able to receive notifications if important possessions aren't where they are supposed to be. Or if you just want to check in on them.
Are you a business?  Tracker Now supports business needs for both small and large size companies. Tracker Now was built off the experience of losing very important personal and business documents, so we understand the urgency of real time tracking and asset awareness. That is why we we want to team up with large and small businesses to cater to demands, deadlines and asset tracking.  Keeping everyone at ease with reliable safe and secure service. 


                                                                                                          Where is your item?

What Makes Tracker Now Different?
The current consumer tracking devices on the market use a BLE (Bluetooth low energy) module that doesn't cover more than 150 feet. Therefore, in case of theft, your items would be lost forever. However, with the implementation of an advanced GPS and BLE module, Tracker Now gives you the ability to track your belongings across the entire globe assuring you never lose anything again. Why nothing compares to Tracker Now.(logos above each) Coming ..... 


We have a lot of things planned for the future. We'd love to be able to raise enough money to include the features below. Our goal is to be able to create the greatest possible product, so reaching these stretch goals would allow us to add some amazing features that are unseen on the market today.  (In Works)
                                                Some of the Numbers and Facts               (missing children, pets, luggage) Look for facts or videos to support most current facts) ..... IN WORKS(Change back to kickstarter and redate)  ..... IN WORKS

                             

Here is our Story!





A 35 year old Entrepreneur and Technology enthusiast from Orange County, California. Joe holds an M.B.A. from Texas A&M University - Commerce and has been an adjunct Professor for many Colleges and Universities sharing his passion for Entrepreneurship, Business, and Marketing. Joe likes to find ways that technology can be integrated into our everyday lives and assist us with things that technology can help solve many problems by simply strategically thinking outside the box.

FAQ?

What is the cost after initial purchase if any? 

Your Tracker Now will come with a set of 10 free Worldwide Pings.  After that depending on how often you need to ping your Tracker Now`s location you will be able to purchase in app or through web packages of 100, 50 , 5, or a single find, for less then a $1.00 per ping. No contracts! no bills! If you are not using it you will not be charged for anything and have full features of the BLE, WiFi/Hotspot features and functions.



What is the current state of your battery life? 

If you are to send a global ping to our units 24 times a day for 6 months straight you would need to recharge the battery for another 6 months cycle. That`s right. If you lost your keys on the hour every hour every day for 8 months straight it would take to drain our battery. The average use we say will be 1 year before needing another 8 hour charge to last another year per Tracker Now Device.

How is there no monthly fee? 


Technology and companies have no come together to offer cutting edge technology with M2M embedded sims that allow for global coverage switching from carrier to carrier to band and frequency no mater where you are in the world. Basically you have full roaming rights Worldwide without the extra bill. An example is if you are in a T-Mobile area that uses GSM Technology you will receive the gsm service through their towers yet if you move to another state you may end up on a Verizon tower which uses CDMA and will connect to the nearest tower. Same goes if you travel overseas, Tracker Now`s embedded GSM will automatically pick up any signal possible not matter what frequency or carrier area you are in giving you the peace of mind Globally! 


What will you do with use of funds? 


Upscale our operation
Get tooling to create Tracker Now local in the USA. This will create jobs as well as a safe and secure environment in order to provide a fast response to anything from fulfillment to post purchase service
Buy parts in bulk, assembly of the full boards and 
Apply for and receive federal, state, international, and waterproof testing certifications 
The ability to program the rest of the app development across all platforms
Top notch security encryption and safe servers
Further research and development 
Anything else we can do to make Tracker Now a success all the way around from concept to in hand customer satisfaction



Contact Us!
Garden Grove 
Orange County, CA 92845 
Website: www.trackernow.com
E-mail: Info@trackernow.com 
Phone: 714-471-8282Risks and Challenges:

Here at Tracker Now we embrace challenges. In order to present you with the best available product on the market, we have worked hard to provide you with key features such as global coverage, geo fencing, wireless leash, easy to use app and web tracking feature. Tracker Now puts the power of finding lost loved ones or stolen valuables at your fingertips.

story:
Introduction.

A three-dimensional object wouldn't be as it seems without some meaning instilled in it. A three-dimensional object wouldn't mean nothing but empty construction without a cerebration injected into it. An art requires a deeper understanding to unveil the mystifying artistry within itself, gradually transitioning from something abstract into something tangible. Here we introduce to you.

 
Our Premium Case.

An objectivation of human artistic spirit with its own simplistic yet beautiful intricacies. To stand the test of time, each Case essentially made to capture aesthetic sophistication and reliable construction all at once so the attractive nature of this Case won't fade. We came to a realization that every matter needs to be contained, every little thing needs a space to hold on to, a space for storage.

An elegant storage

to protect and organize your small valuables

with style

Getting organized.

An elegant Case to store your essentials like headphones, a small USB charging cables and a slim battery pack, or some keys, precious cards, coins and some cash. An embodiment of a well-ordered and exclusive storage. No more time-consuming searching. No more clutter. No more untidy mass. A way of getting organized while displaying a good sense of style.

Classy, elegant and sophisticated.

It's a great way to accessorize, protect your small valuables and make a statement for yourself at the same time. Subtle and sharp finishing touches make the Case an embodiment of faultless appearance, a nod to intrinsic details without neglecting its sense of functionalism. 

Classic Case Dimensions

 

 

 

Classic Case Color Choices

• A Case crafted with robust material dressed in Black, perfect match to emit boldness.

• Constructed out of sturdy aluminum painted in Brown to signify stability.

• Grey is the faultless color that never goes wrong to be combined with anything.

• Display the inner elegance in you with a supreme look in White color.

Signature Case Dimensions

 

 

 

Signature Case Color Choices

• Sleek, sophisticated and in Black. Suitable for the ones who have a fast-changing life.

• Protect your precious small valuables with the reliable Gold Case to maintain its value.

• Store your small valuables in the Blue Case for the ones that symbolize calmness.

• Express your fierceness with the Red fine-made Case to support your daily activities.

• The White Case will protect your small valuables, with style.

A convergence between modern day distinctive patterns and vintage elements to form as a whole piece of art.

____

BACKERS REWARDS

DISTRIBUTOR PACKAGE

About us.

Started off in 2015, Inhasle enters the market as a lifestyle brand, providing daily essentials with a vast range of Premium Cases for contemporary people by displaying craftsmanship and skillful taste. Ever since Inhasle continues to diversify into creating notable products without leaving its ideal character. With the acclaimed Classic and Signature Case, Inhasle was starting to gain recognition and appreciative feedback from the market, and that is the sole motivation for Inhasle to continue innovating its collections.

Embark on a journey with Inhasle.

Inhasle has the vision to bring to life, and to realize the vision we need every supporting arm to help us lie the foundation of what we are going to achieve. Be a part of this project, spread the campaign across the universe, to transform simplistic ideas into unimaginable things.

PRESS CONTACT

hendrix@inhasle.com

Download Our Media Kit Below

SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN

Spread the Word!

DISCOVER MORE ABOUT US

Follow us on Social Media!

____

Risks and Challenges

Our most threatening risk is running late due to time-consuming production which would require extra effort to perfecting overall construction. Besides running late of production we might encounter some problems with quality check and packaging.

We need to make sure everything will be shipped with the highest quality possible and better than what you see in this article. Our goal is to reach the high standards of our production team and most importantly, our Indiegogo backers.

Regardless of the recognizable potential risks, we consider these as challenges to overcome, which is possible with strenuous physical and mental exertion to achieve our goals. We will stick with our commitment to making the best products we possibly can because we give life to superior things, made for fine minds.

____

Frequently Asked Questions

How many colors are there to choose?

We currently have 4 colors for Classic Case (Black, Brown, Grey, White) and 5 colors for Signature Case (Black, Gold, Blue, Red, White).

What makes the Classic and Signature Case different?

Both models have differences in how they function. The Classic Case is equipped with a flip mechanism to open the spring-loaded lid, while the Signature Case uses a slide mechanism to open the lid.

What items can this Case accommodate?

The Classic and Signature Case can fit headphones, a small USB charging cables and a slim battery pack, or some keys, precious cards, coins and some cash.

What are the specifications for Classic and Signature Case?

The specifications are as below:

Classic Case

Height: 9.2 cm (3.62 inches)

Width: 2.6 cm (1.02 inches)

Length: 5.8 cm (2.28 inches)

Signature Case

Height: 9 cm (3.54 inches)

Width: 2.6 cm (1.02 inches)

Length: 5.8 cm (2.28 inches)"

What are the Classic and Signature Case made of?

The Classic and Signature Case are constructed out of high-quality aluminum offering a robust yet lightweight material.
