story:
"... your style is the game changer." - Dexter Woo of the Simple Style Manual



The Genesis


I am the editor of a men's style advice website, the Simple Style Manual. Since 2014, I have been sharing simple and practical style advice with the goal to help my readers look their best. During this process, I began questioning the limited accessories provided for men in the market place. There are not enough retailers that offer bold and exquisite statement pieces. As someone who uses accessories to transform an outfit from ordinary to dapper, this was a constant obstacle. Hence I took matters into my own hands and the first line of striking men's accessories by the Simple Style Manual was created.



The Purpose


I want to share my passion for style and fashion with the world. I truly believe presenting your best self to the world is the easiest step we can take in getting what we want in life.  First impression sets the tone in every relationship and your style is the game changer.  I am proud to be in the position to introduce alternative designs in pocket squares and accessories. 

My mission is to equip every man with an arsenal of striking accessories to make a statement in all situations. The accessories being offered is for men who dares to be different.  For men who does not want to settle for mass produced accessories with ordinary designs.  Defy the standard and look exceptional for every occasion.  

This campaign will raise the capital required to assemble the first line of men's accessories, set up the infrastructure for an online store, and build an inventory of high quality products.  With your support, the Simple Style Manual will thrive to become a respected source of unique lifestyle and fashion products for men internationally.


Photos of me wearing the accessories on Instagram, @simplestylemanual



Simple Style Manual Presents: Striking Suit Accessories for the Brave


Are you tired of the basic colours and patterns for pocket squares offered online and in stores? Would you like to add a personal touch to your pocket square? Do you want a pocket square that is carefully handcrafted in North America in limited quantity? The pocket squares offered to supporters of this campaign is the solution. Using high quality materials and timeless designs I sourced locally, each pocket square is carefully handcrafted in a small batch production process in North America. This means only a limited quantity is produced of each design, making your pocket square rare and unique. The best part is—it's customizable! 


Looking over the shoulder of my seamstress.


Sample of color borders, (left to right): orange, black, and red.



Certain designs look best without added colors hence we recommend a borderless design. 


Along with the pocket squares, backers can purchase bracelets and lapel pins. These exquisite accessories add interest to an outfit and makes a man look modern and polished. Included below are photos of me wearing my prized accessories for your reference.


Black lava stone bracelet with gold accent


White dragon eye bracelet with vintage gold accent


Blue and green dragon eye bracelet with silver accent


Bracelets in action:

Clockwise: Black Lava Stone, White Dragon Eye, Blue and Green Dragon Eye



"... exquisite accessories add interest to an outfit and makes a man look modern and polished." 

Antler lapel pin in gold or silver;  see exhibit


The King lapel pin, gold; see exhibit


Royal lapel pin, silver; see exhibit


Majestic lapel pin, silver; see exhibit


The Laurel lapel pin, gold; see exhibit


Lapel pins in action:

Left to Right: Antlers (gold), The Laurel, Majestic, Royal, The King



How to Order Handcrafted Pocket Squares:


The fabric used for the current collection of pocket squares are made of 100% cotton and approximately 10 x 10 inches in dimension as each one is uniquely handcrafted. The designs are of a limited quantity hence the orders will be filled in a first come first serve basis.  After your order, we will confirm your selection via email. The best color combinations are made available to ensure optimal results. Unflattering color options are therefore excluded. If your design is sold out, then you will receive a voucher that is redeemable for a different style of the same product. A list of the available styles will be emailed to you. The voucher can also be used to purchase the same product in the upcoming online store. 



"... each pocket square is carefully handcrafted in a small batch production process in North America. The best part is—it's customizable! 


The Samurai, border options: black, red, orange, blue, green, pink, borderless


Blue Wave, border options: black, red, orange, green, pink, borderless


Dark Roses, border options: borderless


Lost Souls, border options: black, red, orange, blue, green, pink, borderless


Pocket Squares in Action:

Left to Right: Blue Waves, The Samurai, Dark Roses, Lost Souls



".... only a limited quantity is produced of each design, making your pocket square rare and unique. The best part is—it's customizable! "



Gothic, border options: black, borderless


Blossom, border options: borderless


Prince, border options: red, orange, green, pink, borderless


Emerald, border options: borderless


Pocket squares in action:

Left to Right: Gothic, Blossom, Prince, Emerald



"... presenting your best self to the world is the easiest step we can take in getting what we want in life." 



Charlie: border options: black, borderless


Arrowhead, border options: black, red, orange, blue, green, pink, borderless


The Wild, border options: borderless


Utility, border options: red, orange, pink, borderless


The Country, border options: red, orange, pink, borderless


Pocket squares in action:

Left to Right: Charlie, Arrowhead, The Wild, Utility, The Country, Utility




If Funded, How Will We Fulfill the Orders:


At the end of the campaign, we will begin production of the accessories.  This will take approximately 10-20 days and the products will be ready for shipping. For backers who plan to use the products as a holiday gift, please order before December 1st and send a request for early delivery. We will do our best to have it to you before the 24th. The estimated shipping time will be 5 to 20 business days, depending on your location.  




We Need Your Help!!!


In order to turn this dream into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome products, but also sharing this campaign with your friends and family.


"My mission is to equip every man with an arsenal of striking accessories to make a statement in all situations."


We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  An act as simple as tweeting about the campaign or liking our Facebook page can go a long way.  Please help spread the word and support this startup!
story_txt:
"... your style is the game changer." - Dexter Woo of the Simple Style Manual
The Genesis
I am the editor of a men's style advice website, the Simple
Style Manual. Since 2014, I have been sharing simple and practical style advice with the goal to
help my readers look their best.
During this process, I began questioning the limited accessories provided for men in the market place. There are not enough retailers
that offer bold and exquisite statement pieces. As someone who uses accessories to transform an outfit from ordinary to dapper, this was a constant obstacle. Hence I
took matters into my own hands and the first line of striking men's accessories by the Simple Style Manual was created.The Purpose
I want to share my passion for style and fashion with the world.
I truly believe presenting your best self to the world is the easiest step we can take in getting what we want in life.  First impression sets the tone in every relationship and your style is the game changer.  I am proud to be in the position to introduce alternative designs in pocket squares and accessories. 
My mission is to equip every man with an arsenal of striking accessories to make a statement in all situations. The accessories being offered is for men who dares to be different.  For men who does not want to settle for mass produced accessories with ordinary designs.  Defy the standard and look exceptional for every occasion.  
This campaign will raise the capital required to assemble the first line of men's accessories, set up the infrastructure for an online store, and build an inventory of high quality products.  With your support, the Simple Style Manual will thrive to become a respected source of unique lifestyle and fashion products for men internationally.



Photos of me wearing the accessories on Instagram, @simplestylemanual


Simple Style Manual Presents: Striking Suit Accessories for the Brave


Are you tired of the basic colours and patterns for pocket
squares offered online and in stores? Would you like to add a personal touch
to your pocket square? Do you want a pocket square that is carefully handcrafted in North America in limited quantity? The pocket squares offered to supporters of
this campaign is the solution. Using high quality materials and timeless designs I sourced locally, each pocket square is carefully handcrafted in a small batch production process in North America. This means only a limited quantity is produced of each design, making your pocket square rare and unique. The best part is—it's customizable! 


Looking over the shoulder of my seamstress.





Sample of color borders, (left to right): orange, black, and red.





Certain designs look best without added colors hence we recommend a borderless design. 


Along with the pocket squares, backers can purchase
bracelets and lapel pins. These exquisite accessories add interest to an outfit and makes a man look modern and polished. Included below are photos of me wearing my prized accessories for your reference.




Black lava stone bracelet with gold accent


White dragon eye bracelet with vintage gold accent


Blue and green dragon eye bracelet with silver accent

story:
SEEKING ADVENTURERS WITH A HEART



Thanks for taking interest in our project. If you're here it's because you love watches and want to help others...  So lets get started.

The GRAN MARE (Gran Ma-Re) watch is Human Time Project's first Swiss made model.

For those who don't know us HUMAN TIME PROJECT was founded 3 years ago by Gustavo Sainz and Ben Rodriguez to design rugged/fun affordable watches while donating a watch for every one sold to healthcare workers in developing countries. We've been featured in the past on prestigious men's blogs like BLESS THIS STUFF, COOL MATERIAL, GEAR PATROL and HOODINKEE.

After 5 successful model launches we've been able to donate over 740 watches. All this with simple organic and social media support while not spending one cent in advertizing, and that's maybe why you've never heard of us : ) .  During this time many have asked us to design a Swiss model and now we think the perfect moment has come. After meeting with the right manufacturer and 7 months of studies and designs we have reached what we think is not only the most cool looking and affordable Swiss watch out there, but also the only model behind a 'Buy One Give Another' program. With your support for every watch ordered another will be donated to a healthcare worker in a developing country.

Of course the cost of manufacturing a Swiss watch is not inexpensive and we need to order hundreds to keep the price point accessible so we're asking you guys for your support in not only bringing a great design to life but to also help others in the process. 

For your support you get a 40% SAVINGS on the final retail price  of the watch -

A     GREAT    DEAL  !!

We know that there are a lot of start-up watch companies asking for your support but we'd like to assure you that we are not new to watch design and manufacturing having developed 5 models to market and one previous Swiss model with our partner SAINZ Watch Co.

WHAT DO YOU GET ?

A great Swiss made watch at an amazing price from an experienced watch company while helping others

WHAT DO WE GET  ?

Our design to come to life and be able to give watches to healthcare workers around the world who need them to practice medicine.

WHAT DO OTHERS GET ?

More watches in medical workers hands that one day will probably save a life.

So are you ready to get started? ...  Let's go !


THE 'GRAN MARE' SWISS WATCH


Truthfully the world really doesn't need another watch... But more people helping others? - Well, that's exactly what the world needs! 

And if you happen to get a watch in the process...  Even better.

There has been a great explosion in Asian made watches with quartz and automatic movements and while they are great timepieces there is a reason why Switzerland is still the pinnacle of watch making. There is strict quality controls and pride in craftsmanship that are unique to the region. Not to mention fair working and trade conditions. But all this comes at a price and since we are required a certain production number of units we are asking for your support in making this happen.

Our initial goal is to fund the manufacturing of the watches along with it's accessories and packaging.

THE GRAN MARE - DESIGN and SPECS



When we set out to create the GRAN MARE we asked... What is the most versatile design out there used by most active lifestyle people ?

Two models came to mind : 

1) The classic DIVER  

2) The classic CHRONOGRAPH...

So we decided why don't we use both functions into a watch that looks cool and inspiring but isn't too over designed and big. Watch sizes are also an issue these days. On one side we have the classic 'Rolex' case size of 40mm that although fashionable is a bit small for men in active lifestyles, but on the other hand of the spectrum a 50 mm  case seems too large and cumbersome. So we decided middle ground was the best and opted for a 44/45 mm case size that is not too big nor too small... Like 'Goldilocks' would say : Just right.

We wanted the watch to be resistant to use so we requested the use of 316L stainless steel case with a mirror polish and extra hard mineral glass. All this with a high quality RONDA Swiss quartz movement with long life battery that doesn't need resetting every time you take off the watch.

The movement was a hard choice to decide as price points will always dictate the outcome. We wanted Swiss manufacture and quality but Swiss automatics where pricey. Quality Swiss quartz movements where the next best thing. Also we wanted the watch to be affordable and good but didn't want to ask $1,000.00  either. We could have gone with a more inexpensive Japanese automatic movement but then it would have defeated the purpose of Swiss Made.

So we chose the quartz chronograph movement to give you the best deal you'll ever see on a exclusively designed Swiss made watch,

S P E C S  :

Manufacture : 100 % Swiss Made

Case : 45 mm 316L Stainless Steel/ Mirror polish

Movement : Ronda high rotation quartz chronograph movement

Bezel :  Red Marked 15 min. Point / fixed for lifelong water resistance

Strap Option # 1 :  High end Italian rubber/silicon with basket weave pattern

Strap Option # 2 :  Solid Stainless Steel

Water Resistant :  100 Meters

Back Case :  Engraved Triton Gran Mare logo

Large Luxury box

P E R K S  :

Our perks are very easy to explain :

THEY ARE A GREAT DEAL !

You'll be getting a once a lifetime opportunity to buy the watch at a 40% discount from the MSRP of $360 that will be asked once the watch goes on sale to the regular public.

And a EXCLUSIVE Navy Blue luxury box - Only available to our INDIGOGO supporters.

And if you want to load on the savings get our AWESOME Christmas Pack with 2 watches and an incredible discount ! !


NOTE : We extremely value your support and in the eventual case we do not reach our funding goal we will evaluate if we can deliver on what was promised and if not all monies will be promptly refunded.


    WHAT YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL DO ...



    Aside from having the most  amazing deal in an exclusively designed Swiss made watch you will be helping donate watches to healthcare workers in developing countries.

    We are the ONLY Watch company in the world that donates a watch for every one sold. So when you're supporting us you're not making a company, shareholder or individual rich you're contributing to a cause - something much BIGGER. 

    Our model works because we don't heavily markup our products since we sell directly to you through our web model, we have no middle man, huge advertising costs or large inventories that burden you with a $400- $800 price point for a Swiss Made watch.



    Our Donation Watch with Swiss Movement.


    For many a watch is a simple luxury item or fashion piece but in the medical world a working watch is so much more. From first-aid, responding to a trauma, checking vital signs, treating a cardiac arrest or administering anti-venom a working watch can mean life or death to many people if the practitioner doesn't have a proper timepiece as a tool.

    In our last 3 years we have been able to donate over 740 watches to healthcare workers in developing countries such as Guatemala, Honduras and other regions of Central America. With more donations programmed for winter 2015 to other locations.

    We use the help of many NPO's and NGO's such as HELPS International and other smaller partners in the region to distribute our watches to those in need in the medical field.


    Here is the real testimonial describing a person after receiving one of our watches :

    "... Mrs. Omarez, a nurse at the regional mountain clinic,  was in tears when she received her watch. She mentioned that she had never received anything so nice for her work "

    The people we donate to are real people, with real challenges but a love for others that makes their work be respected and cherished. These are the kind of people you will be helping - not faceless high-fashion corporations or celebrities that receive endorsement money.

    You WILL be able to make a REAL difference.

    RISKS  &  CHALLENGES




    Being operational these past years has given us a real world lessons on design, outsourcing, logistics, packaging and fulfillment. There are a lot of new companies who think funding is the only requisite to make a product but in reality it's so much more.

    We faced from watch hands not fitting to last minute fabrication problems, Lumos paint not sticking, international shipping company strikes, over-traffic delays from holiday production to having the wrong color leather strap sent to us. If you can imagine it - we've been through it - and we've overcome.

    We have the knowledge and know-how to design, source, ship and distribute these watches on a reasonable time frame. Also we have a good relationship with our factory in Switzerland, which is ready to start production once funding is reached,  that will ensure we have a good product delivered on time. So happily we don't have to scramble to find a manufacturer once we get funded or hope they do a good job.

    But of course with all ventures there is still a risk and if there is (God forbid) a major disaster, raw material source problem or unseen manufacturing issue we will keep you well informed through our weekly updates.

    You've chosen to help us, so rest assured we won't leave you hanging.

    Again for what ever reason if we cannot fulfill your orders we will issue a prompt refund.


    ALREADY HAVE TOO MANY WATCHES ???


    Who ever said that to you, please stop speaking to him/her... You don't need that kind of negativity in your life!   : ). 

    For many of us watch fanatics there is no such thing, but we totally understand if you can't contribute at this time...

    But if you like our cause and wish to help us out you don't need any money to do so.

    Everything helps from mentioning our campaign through your social media, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, KIK - or what ever you like to have fun and communicate with others.

    One person CAN make a DIFFERENCE and one VOICE is all that MATTERS.

    Simply use Indigogo 'share tools' and we'll be eternally grateful to you.

    Don't have social media? Tell your friends, family, coworkers, or maybe walk around with a sandwich sign, climb up a hill with a megaphone, be creative  : ).

    But what ever you do just know that we'll thank you from the bottom of your heart, and the people who will receive the donations will do so too !

    Thanks again for your time in checking us out : )



    People Help People,  It's what makes us Human.

    Jacques Cousteau.

story:
"Someone needed to design something to keep kids safer...so I did"   Dean Corrigan,  Inventor of Loc8er:Mobile App, 2014 Wall-Street.com

 

 

 

    • Finally we're ready to launch Loc8er Mobile App! In just a few clicks you will be connecting with your children while they play or walk home from school.  We're here to help you keep an eye on your children and loved ones; we all want them out playing, and pushing for more independence!
    • We've brought you the original watch-based concept of Loc8er Mobile (and more!) in an app, instead.  More importantly - we've decided to give you it all for FREE! 
    • Get started now by downloading the Parent App:

     

     

     

     

     

    • Download one App per phone,  sync the PARENTS APP to the KIDS APP using an authorisation code, and get planning!  If you've got more than one child, or are looking after your friend's kids for the day; we've got you covered - you can sync an unlimited number of Kids Apps to the Parents App, and create 'Groups' so that you can track and message them collectively.  Safety First!
    •   The App includes FREE text messaging so you can keep in touch with each other, and oversee the kid's 'real-time' location via Google Maps (and eventually, free calls! That's why we're on here!)
    • Loc8er Mobile App gives you PEACE OF MIND!
    • Plan routes for the kids with the 'Journey Planner' with optional 'Safe Zones' of 100m radius - if your child wanders out of the 'safe zone' you'll immediately receive an alert to let you know!
    • In close proximity, you can easily find your kids in a busy crowded area.
    • You'll also receive an alert when your child 'checks-in' at their destination, so you can rest assured that they've arrived safely.
    • Whether they're walking to school, playing in the park or in a busy crowd, you'll always know exactly where your loved ones are, at the touch of a button.

     

    • We believe every child should have the opportunity to go out and play safely and worry-free in their community, so giving children back some of their independence whilst quietly overseeing their location, is high on our priority list, and we're pretty sure it's high on yours.  Our data and GPS services are stored and run over an SSL-certified, secure Amazon web server.  
    • We've added in a 'hidden' 4-digit-security-code function, so that there's no chance of their personal email addresses or passwords being on display when kids are logging in.
    • And as if that wasn't secure enough, we've added a special encryption function on all passwords and  in-app messages!
    • Check out the distance tracker; it's a cool pedometer which counts kids' steps, gauges their distance traveled every day and encourages them to live more active lifestyles!
    • There's also fun Loc8ion-based-games, where they can earn Explorer Badges, and be rewarded for their efforts.
    • You can download both of the Kid apps from the App Store and Google Play Store using the links below:

     

     

     

    • By donating you'll be showing your support for global child safety, and helping us create worldwide awareness of this amazing app!
    • We want to reach as many mums, dads and guardians as possible through the power of advertising.  Not only that, but there is potential for us to reach many other 'target markets' such as older-teens/young twenty-somethings who eg. spend hours trying to find each other at festivals (we've all been there before...!) and of course, older family members (who can wander off indiscriminately) so this app can be utilised in various ways.

     

       

      We're already grateful that you're showing your support by taking the time to read our campaign, and we'll be even MORE grateful when we hit our £10,000 target and see all of your donations flooding in!  

      Here's where your donations will be going:

      •  FREE in-app calls are going to be included in the new build - we want to make it even EASIER and CHEAPER for you to stay in touch.
      • The free messaging service will be updated using an 'XMPP Services chat facility' - think 'Whatsapp' - to give users a better experience.
      • There will be even more games for the kids, motivating them to get out there and enjoy the great outdoors!
      • You'll be able to view multiple Kid Apps at once, rather than just one at a time.
      • We want to make sure Loc8er Mobile App is accessible for everybody, including non-English speakers; so with that in mind, we'll be translating the app in to as many languages as we can!
      • We want to continue making ongoing updates and improvements to the User Interface (UI) -  YOUR FEEDBACK IS INVALUABLE TO US!  
        • Even more importantly, we'll constantly be ensuring that our web security system is the most current and up to date
        • Our aim is to reach as many people as we possibly can, so a large percentage of the donations will go towards a larger-scale advertising campaign, helping us create worldwide awareness.

       

       

      • If you're anything like us, you're passionate about the safety of our children.  Unfortunately, child safety issues are prevalent in today's society.  Our goal is to affect change. 
      • The natural urge for humans and animals is to protect their young, but at times this can lead to over protection.  The desire to 'wrap them up in cotton wool' can halt social skill development, self-reliance and their thirst for adventure. Loc8er Mobile App aims to encourage independence!
      • How do we help change this? Our app will allow children the freedom to walk to and from school, play in parks and the great outdoors, go exploring in nature, whilst allowing YOU to see their location live, in real-time, and remotely, without any interference.
      • As a parent, how do you know when your child has arrived safe and sound?  Loc8er Mobile App sends you a notification when your child reaches their destination, i.e. 'checks-in' somewhere, eg. at school or their friend's house, or any pre-determined location, AND you'll also get a notification if they wander out of a 'safe-zone'.  So you get a lot more peace of mind with Loc8er Mobile App, than without it!  And for no cost, it's a no-brainer, really!

        Keep Your Kids Safer With Loc8er!

         

         

         

             

            The risks and challenges are quite simple:

            • Spreading the word through advertisement as fast, far and wide as we can is very costly! 
            • We're hoping to raise enough funds and for people to download the app NOW, so that as Loc8er Mobile App starts to become financially viable we can get more and more kids and their parents connected safely.  As time moves on, so will the technology.
            • As with any project and campaign, without funding it's very difficult to spread the word far and wide about Loc8er Mobile App...but not impossible!
            • We've already built and made the app, so there's no real risk, other than people not knowing about it and not downloading it! Who wouldn't want to keep their kids safer through their mobile phone, for FREE!
            • Many crowd funding campaigns ask for donations first, and then create their 'invention'.  What we felt was better, was to create as much of Loc8er Mobile App as we could by ourselves first, and give it away for free.

             

               

              We understand that not everyone can help out financially, but we very much appreciate anything you can put towards making this a success.  There are other ways you can help us out, too:

              • Good old fashioned word of mouth!
              • Follow us on social media! Don't forget to #LikeItLoveItShareIt

               

                 

               

              Loc8er Mobile App - Stay Safe, Have Fun!
story_txt:
"Someone needed to design something to keep kids safer...so I did"   Dean Corrigan,  Inventor of Loc8er:Mobile App, 2014 Wall-Street.com
 

 

 


Finally we're ready to launch Loc8er Mobile App! In just a few clicks you will be connecting with your children while they play or walk home from school.  We're here to help you keep an eye on your children and loved ones; we all want them out playing, and pushing for more independence!
We've brought you the original watch-based concept of Loc8er Mobile (and more!) in an app, instead.  More importantly - we've decided to give you it all for FREE! 

Get started now by downloading the Parent App:

 
 
 
 

 

Download one App per phone,  sync the PARENTS APP to the KIDS APP using an authorisation code, and get planning!  If you've got more than one child, or are looking after your friend's kids for the day; we've got you covered - you can sync an unlimited number of Kids Apps to the Parents App, and create 'Groups' so that you can track and message them collectively.  Safety First!
  The App includes FREE text messaging so you can keep in touch with each other, and oversee the kid's 'real-time' location via Google Maps (and eventually, free calls! That's why we're on here!)
Loc8er Mobile App gives you PEACE OF MIND!

Plan routes for the kids with the 'Journey Planner' with optional 'Safe Zones' of 100m radius - if your child wanders out of the 'safe zone' you'll immediately receive an alert to let you know!
In close proximity, you can easily find your kids in a busy crowded area.
You'll also receive an alert when your child 'checks-in' at their destination, so you can rest assured that they've arrived safely.
Whether they're walking to school, playing in the park or in a busy crowd, you'll always know exactly where your loved ones are, at the touch of a button.



 

We believe every child should have the opportunity to go out and play safely and worry-free in their community, so giving children back some of their independence whilst quietly overseeing their location, is high on our priority list, and we're pretty sure it's high on yours.  Our data and GPS services are stored and run over an SSL-certified, secure Amazon web server.  
We've added in a 'hidden' 4-digit-security-code function, so that there's no chance of their personal email addresses or passwords being on display when kids are logging in.
And as if that wasn't secure enough, we've added a special encryption function on all passwords and  in-app messages!
Check out the distance tracker; it's a cool pedometer which counts kids' steps, gauges their distance traveled every day and encourages them to live more active lifestyles!
There's also fun Loc8ion-based-games, where they can earn Explorer Badges, and be rewarded for their efforts.
You can download both of the Kid apps from the App Store and Google Play Store using the links below:

 

 

 

By donating you'll be showing your support for global child safety, and helping us create worldwide awareness of this amazing app!
We want to reach as many mums, dads and guardians as possible through the power of advertising.  Not only that, but there is potential for us to reach many other 'target markets' such as older-teens/young twenty-somethings who eg. spend hours trying to find each other at festivals (we've all been there before...!) and of course, older family members (who can wander off indiscriminately) so this app can be utilised in various ways.

 



 
We're already grateful that you're showing your support by taking the time to read our campaign, and we'll be even MORE grateful when we hit our £10,000 target and see all of your donations flooding in!  
Here's where your donations will be going:

 FREE in-app calls are going to be included in the new build - we want to make it even EASIER and CHEAPER for you to stay in touch.
The free messaging service will be updated using an 'XMPP Services chat facility' - think 'Whatsapp' - to give users a better experience.
There will be even more games for the kids, motivating them to get out there and enjoy the great outdoors!
You'll be able to view multiple Kid Apps at once, rather than just one at a time.
We want to make sure Loc8er Mobile App is accessible for everybody, including non-English speakers; so with that in mind, we'll be translating the app in to as many languages as we can!
We want to continue making ongoing updates and improvements to the User Interface (UI) -  YOUR FEEDBACK IS INVALUABLE TO US!  
Even more importantly, we'll constantly be ensuring that our web security system is the most current and up to date
Our aim is to reach as many people as we possibly can, so a large percentage of the donations will go towards a larger-scale advertising campaign, helping us create worldwide awareness.




 

 

If you're anything like us, you're passionate about the safety of our children.  Unfortunately, child safety issues are prevalent in today's society.  Our goal is to affect change. 
The natural urge for humans and animals is to protect their young, but at times this can lead to over protection.  The desire to 'wrap them up in cotton wool' can halt social skill development, self-reliance and their thirst for adventure. Loc8er Mobile App aims to encourage independence!

How do we help change this? Our app will allow children the freedom to walk to and from school, play in parks and the great outdoors, go exploring in nature, whilst allowing YOU to see their location live, in real-time, and remotely, without any interference.
As a parent, how do you know when your child has arrived safe and sound?  Loc8er Mobile App sends you a notification when your child reaches their destination, i.e. 'checks-in' somewhere, eg. at school or their friend's house, or any pre-determined location, AND you'll also get a notification if they wander out of a 'safe-zone'.  So you get a lot more peace of mind with Loc8er Mobile App, than without it!  And for no cost, it's a no-brainer, really!



Keep Your Kids Safer With Loc8er!
 

 
 




 
The risks and challenges are quite simple:

Spreading the word through advertisement as fast, far and wide as we can is very costly! 
We're hoping to raise enough funds and for people to download the app NOW, so that as Loc8er Mobile App starts to become financially viable we can get more and more kids and their parents connected safely.  As time moves on, so will the technology.
As with any project and campaign, without funding it's very difficult to spread the word far and wide about Loc8er Mobile App...but not impossible!

We've already built and made the app, so there's no real risk, other than people not knowing about it and not downloading it! Who wouldn't want to keep their kids safer through their mobile phone, for FREE!
Many crowd funding campaigns ask for donations first, and then create their 'invention'.  What we felt was better, was to create as much of Loc8er Mobile App as we could by ourselves first, and give it away for free.

 



 
We understand that not everyone can help out financially, but we very much appreciate anything you can put towards making this a success.  There are other ways you can help us out, too:
Good old fashioned word of mouth!

Follow us on social media! Don't forget to #LikeItLoveItShareIt

 
   
 
Loc8er Mobile App - Stay Safe, Have Fun!

story:
Bono fide 400 year old Ming Dynasty Blue & White Porcelain Art.Legally excavated and restored from the Wanli Shipwreck and prized Ming Porcelain Cargo circa 1625 

    The 17th centuary Wanli Shipwreck treasure, reveals a masterclass of Chinese art history. A wide range of rare Ming porcelain wares and art. From an era when ming porcelain was a valuable commodity to trade, converted by royal courts and high society across western world. And remains unchanged till this day.

Tears of Ming  Porcelain Jewellery, handmade from Genuine Ming Dynasty porcelain shards, exclusive sourced from the Wanli shipwreck circa 1625. Importantly, guarantees provenance and authenticity.

Transformation journey begins with restoration of Ming porcelain artefact (shard), to almost mint conditions. Rehabilitate for prized Ming Blue and White porcelain ceramic art


Strategy built on renewed aesthetics of 'form and function' while preserving the integrity of Ming Blue and white porcelain art.   Reinvented and hand forged as
Artisan Jewellery and Accessories

Showcases rare and complex Ming porcelain art themes, miniature medallions, single, double and triple art motif designs, reflecting the philosophies of the time.
Inherent cultural belief systems and iconic representation, including sanskrit symbolism of an ancient Asian legacy, long before western civilisation. 

Featuring portraits and landscape of nature, the insect and animal kingdom, heavenly and supernatural creatures, including mythical folklore.                            

Design and reframed with space and balance, capturing the essence of rare Ming Dynasty porcelain art. Utilizing natural, vintage and modern/geometric design principles to formalize a renewed art perspective and value. 

Not just to be appreciated aesthetically as exotic works of art, but for their symbolic representation and associated emotive values. In essence, resonate values that form real connection with customers. Individual personality with a story to share. 

DRAMATICALLY DIFFERENCES OUR-SELF FROM THE REST

Furthermore, its natural ergonomic form compliments the beauty of physical body. Attributed to contoured shape and function of a past existence.   


Displayed as works of art, not in the traditional sense, but evolved, handcrafted position. To flourish as personal jewellery. Admired, cherish and loved - as its preordain destiny, in the first place.      

Initial Tears of Ming Jewellery collection, includes necklace pendants, rings, bracelet and cufflink.

Soon, expanding our range with new designs for belts, charm bracelet and earnings (currently, developing prototypes for internal review)

New handcrafted 925 Sterling Sliver jewellery setting adds prestige and uplifts the elegance of the piece  


Tears of Ming embodies the spirit Ming ceramic artisan. Uncovering insights, the hidden significance, motives or Ming art history symbolism of Ming Dynasty era.

True stories (untold stories), and secrets. Not widely known facts, associated to myriad of ancient Ming art symbolism and motifs, 

Discover a hidden world of Ming art, romantically embedded within its core design, emanating confidence and goodwill to its owner.

Lotus flower is a symbol of purity, and enlightenment. Considered a sacred Buddhist symbol (one of Eight Auspicious Symbols)

Representing purity and detachment from worldly cares. Emblem of redemption and purity: it grows out of mud but its blossom is undefiled.

 

Featuring Core Designs of  Ming Dynasty theme inspired art, motifs of nature and all living creature- plant life and flowers, birds and insets, animals, including mythical & heavenly creatures of legends.

Symbolic Icons, ancient motifs, reveal inherent Chinese cultural beliefs and behavior, including revered symbolism, auspicious greeting, omens and hidden messages 

Ming Porcelain art is valued, judged by the painting quality and craftsmanship, condition of the porcelain and importantly, the rarity of painted motif or design are determining factors of value and price 


For example, the rare double motif design of a grasshopper and Cicada can be traced to only one intact ming porcelain ware from the Wanli Porcelain Cargo circa 1625

The ruyi considered one of the Eight Treasures, scepter of power. The ruyi head motif represented power and authority. An important art motif, sharing designs with a host of connected symbolism

BELOVED PEONY FLOWER

Interestingly, reveals the other side of her personality. her true nature, emotional values - her inner beauty and grace. Represented through the Ming Art reverse peony  design theme

While painted peony subject reflects Wealth and Nobility. See at the Imperial Court gardens. Known as the 'King of Flowers. The most exquisite flower to the Chinese. A symbol of spring. 



"Squirrel in grapes foliage" Ming art  theme. Fruit of the wealthy & entitled. Squirrels are known home-makers and motivated providers. Collectively, it means happiness for many generations and many grandchildren


Butterfly. Much loved art subject by poet and painters alike. with stories and tales  

 

                   

(where there is absolute proof on the origin of where the artifacts came from)

We have gone to great lengths to substantiate our claim beyond reproach,which i believe are key building blocks of the business - stature, trust and expertise 

Documentary, actual video footage. Embedded at top of the page.  ie. Wanli shipwreck and Ming porcelain cargo, the discovery, underwater excavation.   

If it has perked your interest. Watch 4-part History Channel mini documentaries. "Treasures of Nanhai" Hosted by the maverick shipwreck .

Each and every piece of Ming porcelain shards are carefully selected and researched,cross reference  to trace its origins. Identified through the published Wanli shipwreck and ming porcelain artifacts                                                                                          I prefer to address this issue upfront, with the aim to build trust and transparence. Reassuring customers the authenticity of our 17th century Ming porcelain jewellery
 

1. Flip over reverse side of the piece and you will see a distinctive worn-out effect, inner ceramic design or foot ring

2. Furthermore, the off white clay constitution and color are key indicators of its 400 year old heritage vs. the pristine white, glossy finish of reproduction/fakes. 

These traits are distinctive signatures, attributed to only shipwreck artefacts

3. Reproduction/fake Ming porcelain ware are mint intact pieces, covering a couple of popular Ming Blue & white designs which are priced ridiculously high  

4. Our collection features range of ming art paintings and motifs which you will not find anywhere else in the world, except from The Wanli shipwreck or in museums/private collection exhibits.                           

                                                                                                   


Journey of discovery and renewal, rather than, a process. Commences with the conservation led restoration regiment, as shipwreck ceramics requires rigorous desalination and deep cleaning baths.



A low impact process to dissolve and remove 400 years of marine growth, embedded sand and foreign matter from the monsoon infested south china sea.
Finally, revealing its beauty of Ming Blue & White ceramic art 

This is probably the most rewarding part of the process.

The pre-production phase comprises of two key tasks ie. Design prep and research to determine origins and symbolism it represents of its ceramic art



Only hand mechanised tools are used to gradually shaping each and very piece. Painstakingly, slow to account for the different porcelain shard texture and dimensions, working along the natural shard contour and fault lines.

The journey doesn't end here. In collaboration, a balinese handmade sterling sliver workshop exceeded expectations and quality finish

The immediate need for skill manpower and retooling of the workshop which will double productivity and produce a better finish product 

Importantly, the funds to solidify our position through volume acquisition of quality ming Dynasty porcelain shards. Including, a comprehensive range of rare ming porcelain centre medallion 

A key business resource of rare Ming Art and designs which i believe has potential to seed growth and long-term sustainability

Ultimately, your support and contributions are important to us, not just monetarily but, the opportunity to engage and involve to help improve our brand and products.

In turn, my gratitude and fortitude can only be demonstrate through contributor perks which are exclusive, rare, limited volume rewards, custom-made for you. A treasured value way beyond it price position. 


60 USD PERK: MING ART TREASURE PENDENT

90 USD PERK


100 USD PERK: RARE 'LINGHZI' MING ART

115 USD PERK


130 USD PERK: ANCIENT TREASURE SYMBOLS

150 USD PERK: STERLING SLIVER STATEMENT RINGS

150 USD PERK

190 USD PERK: TREASURE STERLING SLIVER CUFFLINKS

235 USD PERK: MING THEME ART SERIES

250 USD PERK

story:
Short Summary

Hello. My name is Marian Molocea. I am living in Romania, and I am student at a master program in International Business. Since from my childhood i worked for having my business and succeed. Now i have this chance with a little help from you.
I have this passion for fashion and design for a long time, and now I have this idea who can let my passion to get a shape in something real.
This idea came to me when I saw this models of bracelets that i wanted to wear. I looked for this models on different stores and in online store and what i found was at a high price, more than a student can afford to pay. So, I looked for all I need for making my own bracelets. When some of my friends saw what i did encouraged me to sell some of them and i did that with success.
You can place an order at fabramo.sale@gmail.com.
All the bracelets you earn from you contribution will be send in 1-3 business days and you will receive by normal mail in 5-7 business day.
Now i want to extend this little business and try to offer my work to worldwide. And i hope i will manage to do this with your help.

What We Need & What You Get

For starting this project i need a total amount of  2150 EUR. This money will be used like this:
  1. 300 EUR - Online store ( This business is new and it need a place where the accessories can be sold. I will do this site by myself using Wix platform. I came up with this amount counting the price of a month pass multiply with 12 months).
  2. 1000 EUR - Production materials  ( Here are included beads, wires and strings, links, adhesive, packing box and other accessories. I already have a local distributor for all of this). This amount will be also used like this:

          - 550 Eur for the normal beads collection;

          - 200 Eur for a new collection from leather strings in different combinations;

           - 250 for designing a LUXURY collection.
  3. 500 EUR - Marketing (This money will be used for promoting the site by google ads, facebook ads, offering some samples to other fashion pages owners for promoting, participation to some events, etc.)
  4. 250 EUR - Opening Firm (For selling in legal forms i need to open a firm so i can offer bils and have contracts with different firms such as distribution.)
The difference of 100 Eur is a risk margin for other unexpected costs i will have.
A great business man said that after calculating all costs you need to double the amount so you have a real imagine of costs. I didn't do this because i think all this amount will be enough for all i need.

For your contribution, because i appreciate so much your help, you will receive more that you give to me. As you can see i offer for the first 3 perks a voucher with a higher value than perk. That voucher you can use it to buy any accessories from all my collections.
For the 50 Eur and 75 Eur perk you will receive a voucher and bracelets for an unbelievable look.
For the higher perk i also offer voucher 4 normal bracelets and 3 personalised. this means you will receive 3 unic bracelets that won't appear in my collection, maybe with some ideas from you.
If i won't reach the entire goal, money raised will be used to fulfil the points described up in the same order. First i will open the online store so i have where to put my work and after i will use the rest of money to buy materials and so on.
If you will help me even more and i will get over the goal, the extra money will be used to develop my collection as much i can.

The Impact

As I told you already, starting this business will be a dream came true for me. I have the chance to earn some money using my imagination and my creativity and doing what i really enjoy. I am very passionate when i am working at my dream and this is a big dream that i want to fulfil.

The bracelets are made from semi precious beads, such as: tiger eye, lava stone, matt onix, etc. I already have 8 models of bracelets and you can see all of them on the Facebook page i have and where you can order by email.

I am the only person is working at this business, designing and making the bracelets, doing and editing the photos, maintain the online pages, finding customers.
I want to say that i already had some customers that were very happy with my models and I was very happy to see that someone is wearing with a great pleasure my piece of work.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge is to make my bracelets known by others. Are similar online stores with same products like mine, but are at a higher price, and i think this is one of my advantage.
For this i will start do some collaboration with notorious person here in Romania and not just here, so they will promote my little business instead of products and other benefits.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help by making this campaign know, sharing telling your friends about. But not just this campaign is important to be known by others, also Fabramo Facebook page where you can find all the models and news from me.
Thank you very much for your support and for your contribution. You will make a dream came true in the end of this campaign.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hello. My name is Marian Molocea. I am living in Romania, and I am student at a master program in International Business. Since from my childhood i worked for having my business and succeed. Now i have this chance with a little help from you.
I have this passion for fashion and design for a long time, and now I have this idea who can let my passion to get a shape in something real.
This idea came to me when I saw this models of bracelets that i wanted to wear. I looked for this models on different stores and in online store and what i found was at a high price, more than a student can afford to pay. So, I looked for all I need for making my own bracelets. When some of my friends saw what i did encouraged me to sell some of them and i did that with success.
You can place an order at fabramo.sale@gmail.com.
All the bracelets you earn from you contribution will be send in 1-3 business days and you will receive by normal mail in 5-7 business day.
Now i want to extend this little business and try to offer my work to worldwide. And i hope i will manage to do this with your help.

story:
Hello Everyone! 
Proudli is a very important project to all entrepreneurs, business owners and want to be entrepreneurs in the African diaspora all over the world. Our project means your business will always have support.

We are a patented B2B, B2C Platform designed to boost and support black owned business like nothing else ever seen on the face of the planet. Our Business Plan

We not only offer Black Owned Businesses trade with the  African continent, The Caribbean and the Diaspora worldwide,  but also trade with  the fastest growing economy outside the US, China! 

Our proven strategies boost business exposure and trade exponentially in a way that no other technology entity has designed to date. 

Our development is not only for black owned businesses, but also for businesses whose main customer is the African consumer, wherever he calls home. 
We have made several moon leaps and bounds in the past year as a technology entity existing in the social- commerce-mobile- app space but all this has not been easy. 
We have successfully launched in the Apple and Google play stores, registered in 2 countries, featured in several global media outlets , traveled to Amman Jordan to attend bootcamp at Oasis500.  We have also spoken at Marcus Garvey's UNIA Proudli at UNIA in Kingston Jamaica, and featured in IDG Connect. Proudli Featured in IDG Connect

Most recently we have returned from China, where we were featured as  a favorite company at the Zhengzhou International Investment Forum. Proudli goes to China

While in China, we also pitched as a favorite at Camp Unicorn, an invitation only investors event  in Beijing China for Plug and Play- the investors behind Paypal and Drop Box
We were also invited to a closed door private investor session in Suzhou  and escalated to Plug and Play Suzhou China for  October, 2015 Session. 

Outside of the investors sessions, we also also made significant contacts and won a contract worth 5million USD in Henan province.

 This particular relationship would be established using China to Africa trade infrastructure and  we were also offered office space in the China to Mozambique business bridge offices to work our relationship in east Africa more effectively.  

Yes our strides have been phenomenal, but we are a 1 woman show operated solely by our developer who also acts as, Chief Executive Officer, Financial Manager and Business Development Manager. 

We have 3 volunteers across China, 2 in the Caribbean and 3 in the United States and 2 on the African Continent  but  and we are completely out of resources and support to continue to our work. 

China was an extremely expensive and rigorous undertaking and it has left us exhausted in every way possible. 


We are in need of your assistance to redeploy our updated platform, upkeep with business operations, return to China and to work our recently won contracts. 
We are very grateful to the contributors who have allowed us to get this far, however we are at a point where we urgently need funds to keep moving forward.


Please make your contributions , tell your friends and share this indiegogo  as soon as possible.

story:
Short Summary

Are you tired of the broken or the yellowing linkage between your fob and key blank? 

We believe we've got the perfect solution for you! 
Introducing the UniLink. 
The UniLink is the perfect solution to the common problem that the majority of the Lotus owners have. 

The UniLink is made from 7075 Aluminum Alloy also known as the aircraft grade aluminum. Its high fatigue strength and durability are exactly what we need to build a long lasting linkage between your fob and key. 

No More broken key fob on your track day!  
No More ugly looking rubber strap on your exotic car key!
No More worry about pulling your key out of your pocket fast when you need to!

The design inspiration came from the popular Lotus wheel, the Forged LSS wheel. The UniLink itself is just like a mini version of the LSS wheel spoke and we believe it's a great way to make it look like an OEM product. 

Not very long ago we raised $17,000 for the Lotus UniKey project. The campaign was a huge success and the products were fully delivered. We have received many compliments from happy customers around the world. This time, we hope to bring another quality and functional product to the Lotus community. We need your support to reach $2,500 in order to make this product come to life. Please take advantage of the early bird pricing. All early bird items are limited, so make sure to act fast before they run out! 

Thank you! 
Terry



What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to raise $2,500 to start the production, and here are the perks we offer:

ALL Early Bird customers get FREE cobra fobs

A. [Early Bird] UniLink x1 +FREE cobra fob ->$55 (10 available)

A. [Early Bird] UniLink Black x1 +FREE cobra fob ->$65 (10 available)

B. [Early Bird] UniLink x2 +FREE cobra fobs ->$99 (15 available)

C. [Early Bird] UniLink Chrome +FREE cobra fob ->$90 (2 available)

D. [Early Bird] UniLink Gold +FREE cobra fob ->$90 (2 available)

D. [Early Bird] The Collector Edition +FREE cobra fobs ->$270 (2 available)

D. UniLink x1 $67

D. UniLink Black x1 $70

E. UniLink x2 $125


Expected Shipping Date

October 15 2015. 

Q&A

1. Will it work with my Lotus?
- As long as you have the cobra fob, this product will work! 

2. What is it made of? 
- 7075 AirCraft grade Aluminum

3. How do I contact you?
- sales@fubrication.com

4. How do I install this?
- Simply open your existing cobra fob, take the rubber strap out and replace it with the UniLink. The entire process should take about 30 seconds. 
more Q&A to come!
