story:
IN CASE YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS WE WOULD LOVE TO ANSWER THEM ASAP

- don't hesitate to contact us via:

hello@patrickgallas.com


If you are searching for a high quality timepiece that is able to adapt on many occasions of your life (whatever it is: school, job, dinner, gala, party...) THIS IS YOUR NEXT WATCH. We believe that a high quality timepiece including a swiss made movement don't has to break your bank. Further we wanted to combine our highest quality standard with the ability to design your time.

Our straps for the COMITARI watch are so easy to change, that you will love to switch them even during the day and adapt to your current outfit. For those of you that want a timepiece that separates from all the others (especially in quality) consider also our already configured ARDORI.

This will be the first fashion watch, with such a high quality state that you will give it from one generation to the next one.

We want to be the authority in individualization, most important in straps. Therefore we want to supply you with straps that are NOT on the market or very RARE to find (on very expensive watches e.g.). Read below what we would love to do next...(future ideas).


 

- 39mm Case diameter
- 8mm Case height
- DIAMOND ENGRAVING on the side and the back
- STRAP WIDTH 20mm

- SWISS MADE RONDA QUARTZ MOVEMENT

- ALL 316L STAINLESS STEEL  (case, caseback, buckle, ...)

- CRYSTAL SAPPHIRE GLASS

- GERMAN QUALITY CONTROL

- HANDMADE, GENUINE LEATHER SUEDE STRAP or

- MADE IN GERMANY MILANESE STRAP

- WOODEN WATCH BOX

- FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

- 2 YEAR WARRENTY

We are so confident with the durability and high quality of our watches, that if something happens within the first 2 years, please send it back to us.  Warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

THE WATCHES & Suede straps


(AFTER ALL ORDERS YOU WILL GET DIRECTLY A CONFIRMATION EMAIL WHERE WE ASK YOU ABOUT THE COLORS YOU WOULD LIKE TO CHOOSE - NO MATTER IF ITS THE STRAP, THE CASE, OR THE DIAL - Questions? - hello@patrickgallas.com)

The ARDORI watch is available in gold, silver, rosegold and black with a radial brushed dial and a stainless steel milanese strap:

The milanaise strap of the ARDORI is available with a fine defined pattern and a broadly defined pattern. 

 


The COMITARI is available in gold, silver and rosegold and as announced it allows you to express your personal style to the fullest:

The SUEDE STRAPS:

HOW TO CHANGE A STRAP (see video at top of the page):

  


Some COMITARI styles for your inspiration (more in Gallery):


INDIEGOGO SPECIALS & EARLY BIRD

- The Early Bird package of the COMITARI and the ARDORI includes a 10 USD discount (189 USD) - limited pieces only (regular on indiegogo will be 199 USD)

- Only on Indiegogo: Your Initials on your suede strap

- As an Indiegogo SPECIAL we offer you the  COMITARI for 399 USD 

   with YOUR NAME on the dial:

(of course available in gold, silver and rosegold with a black or white dial)


 




We would love to add those Saffiano leather straps to the Suede for the COMITARI watch mid/end of this year:

we also consider these harris tweed straps for our future collection:

other beautiful straps we think about: ;)


We also have many ideas for new dials (just a few examples :) )


 

OUR PLAN

The collection has taken almost one year to design and prototyping but now all the work is done, we have our prototypes and are ready to produce the watches for you! The timepieces should be ready to be shipped by June. 



 

The challenges of PG Watches will be to spread the news and convince IndieGogos and other future clients to participate. Currently there are so many great projects on IndieGogo to choose from, we are confident that ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are not only asking friends & families we are also in tight contact with various blogs and magazines. 

If you want to help us to spread the word (blogger, magazine ...)

- don't hesitate to contact us via:

hello@patrickgallas.com

From our prototyping production background we consider the challenge in producing on a large scale. But so far we have been dealing with several  manufacturers for months and have already set up a solid relationship, which result you can see in the great prototypes.


other ways to help us 

- talk about our campaign and our great idea 
- share it on your social media platform, of course dort hesitate to link us 

fb: FACEBOOK - PATRICK GALLAS WATCHES
IG: INSTAGRAM - PATRICK GALLAS WATCHES

hello@patrickgallas.com
From our prototyping production background we consider the challenge in producing on a large scale. But so far we have been dealing with several  manufacturers for months and have already set up a solid relationship, which result you can see in the great prototypes.



    
other ways to help us 

- talk about our campaign and our great idea - share it on your social media platform, of course dort hesitate to link us

story:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Where do you get your fabrics from, and are they certified?

We buy our fabrics from manufacturers in Portugal, Turkey and India.  All manufacturers abide to fair trade policy, and all of the fabrics we purchase are both GOTS- and OekoTex-certified.

  


Can I use more than one gift voucher for making one purchase?
Only one gift voucher can be used per purchase.
What garments can I choose from?
The garments you can choose from are either from the current Spring/Summer 2015 collection or the next Spring/Summer 2016 collection (the one we are now crowdfunding for).  The current collection may be viewed on www.dreamsanddoors.com.
When will I receive the garments?
The current collection is available right after the campaign ends.  The next collection will be available to preorder in July 2015.
When will I receive my share of the revenue profit?
You will be paid according to the half-year sales of the Spring/Summer 2016 collection once the invoices have been paid.

story:
Product Background

Hello,

My name is Mike Kasbohm, thanks for taking a moment to consider my campaign! 

The Scented Cinch is a simple but effective solution to an aggravating and messy problem most of us face everyday. We've actually been selling the original version of it for industrial use for several years where it's been widely accepted as the fastest, most effective way to keep a trash liner from falling into the can. In hospitals it pays for itself very quickly by eliminating the time it takes to tie knots in bags, and avoiding the clean-up left behind from bags that didn't stay in place.

If you've ever had that problem at home, you love this. It's perfect for your kitchen, bathroom, or anywhere you use trash bags.

Now, for home use, we tackled the other problem associated with trash by incorporating a replaceable scented disc into the design to freshen the air around the trash can too. We call it the Scented Cinch.

If you like the idea, please back our project. You'll get a couple for yourself, and maybe you can use some of the original Cinches at your workplace too. Pass this campaign information along to your friends and family, they'll thank you for saving them from the mess and hassle from trash bags that don't stay in place. 

A successful campaign would help us to keep our entrepreneurial dreams alive, and make the years of overcoming the many hurdles all worth it. More on that below.

Thank you so much for your time and consideration!

Mike 

Original Cinch

I invented the Original Version because a friend was fed up with the latest mess left behind in their garbage can from the trash bag slipping in. She solicited my help knowing I had a knack to fix problems like this. I showed her how I dealt with the problem while telling her about my days in high school working as a janitor. I explained that we were trained to tie knots in the top edge of the bag to make it smaller, and then stretch it over the rim. I had done this literally hundreds of times every day that I worked - so I got pretty proficient at it.    

The problem was my friend could not quite get it right (she did not have the extensive experience I did from doing it thousands of times - lucky her). She either made the bag too big or too small and just ended up more frustrated wasting more time. That's when it hit me - make something that "cinches" it up tight around the rim of the can for them! And the original Cinch was born...


New Scented Cinch

I've been selling the original Trash Bag Cinch for several years in the Janitorial Supplies markets mostly through industrial supply distributors. 

Many people I knew wanted them for their homes too, and we decided to improve it further by incorporating a replaceable Scented Disc to freshen the air around the trash too. We tested many fragrances (some of which we will release in the future). 

A Fresh Lemon scent quickly became the favorite because of its natural odor neutralizing properties, and the need for it the kitchen where we often have guests.

Since we started developing the scented version, many trash bag manufactures have come out with more expensive scented bags, and even ones that claim to "cling" to the rim. The problem with them is that you still need a trash can that the bag fits pretty closely. Plus the the drawstring that "stretches" doesn't draw closed as well.

Save your money. The Scented Trash Bag Cinch allows you to use any trash bag you'd like, keeps it from falling into any can, and freshens the air around the garbage storage.   

Product Testing

We did extensive functionality and fragrance testing. When we felt we had it right, we utilized the Cooking Club of America to test it and we received top ratings.

You can read some of the reviews here.

What We'll Do With the Funds & What You Get

We have already completed our high capacity production tooling needed to manufacture the parts right here in Minneapolis, MN. We need the funds to enable us order enough inventory to manufacture at a scale that affords a reasonable cost of goods. With a successful campaign we'll have the jump-start we need to scale production to the point that we can begin the necessary retail packaging too and selling at the retail level.

All orders (even if we don't meet our goal that allows us to scale enough to complete the retail packaging), will be fulfilled shortly after the campaign with completed production parts (in generic packaging suitable for shipping), 

We offer a number of Perks. You can get the first Scented Cinches that will be available for shipping (in April!). You can also get a free one by being one of the first 100 to select the (25) original Cinch perk. Make sure to check out the significant savings!

The Impact

Not only would a successful campaign help us to keep our entrepreneurial dreams alive, you'd be helping us bring this simple, but effective solution to many others thus helping make their lives a little easier and helping them save money too by being able to take advantage of the best value trash bags (because the Scented Cinch will make them fit any can).

Here are some other benefits:

  • Fastest, most effective way to secure trash bag
  • Freshens the Air around the trash can
  • Works on any size or shape can, fast easy peel'n stick installation
  • Reduces inventory requirements for bags
  • Reduces risk for exposure to germs and injury
  • Provides more bag purchasing options for savings
  • Improves appearance
  • Saves Time and Money

  • Works with any type of liner

  • Made In USA

The original Cinch has many other uses too - it holds just about anything, anywhere.


Risks & Challenges

The risks at this point are minimal as we have become proficient at product development over the years, and we have great relationships with our component vendors. The challenge however will be spreading the word on this. Let's face it, garbage isn't glamorous. It's not the next great electronic gizmo - but, it does solve a common problem. We think you'l love it, and we are going to need your help spreading the word.   

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute, we sure could use your help - Please:

  • help us get the word out and make some noise about the Scented Cinch.
  • Remember to  use your Indiegogo share tools!

Remember: Just Pinch-it and Cinch-it!

My Background

I'm an inventor and small business owner. I love creating simple solutions to everyday problems. I've been doing it for some time now. I started my business back in 1993 on the side while still working as a sales engineer for a large multi-national company. While I'm proud that I've managed to stay in business this long, it hasn't been easy. 


Many of the products I've invented have been for the companies I've worked for. I started my company in the first place to provide my customers with solutions that the last company I worked for at the time couldn't seem to figure out how to do (and that didn't exist elsewhere). So I invented the solution/products myself, managed the manufacturing, and sold them to the company. They then resold them with significant profits while greatly increasing their overall market share (because nobody else could provide the solution I had invented for them). It was a win/win/win.

With the profits I made, I began to slowly build up enough capital to start developing some of the many ideas I had been filing away. I've always invested my own money and have made all my product in the USA. Eventually I left that company to pursue my dreams full time, while working out of our home and sharing the responsibilities of raising our two children. 

Over the years we've had many ups and downs. Around 2008 with the downturn of the economy, we almost lost everything my wife and I had built up. We were facing possible bankruptcy. But I could not bring myself to going down that road. Maybe I was too too proud - some might even call me stupid, but it just didn't seem right. Instead, we liquidated all our assets including our cabin which was a life long dream of ours. We paid off all our vendors and credit card debt and started over.

Fast forward, and one of our kids is already in college, the other about to start next fall. And we are now back to the point where we are launching some new products. This Scented Cinch being one of them. 

We need your help to get to the volume scale we need to begin production in the USA and break into retail.

Thank you for your support!

Mike

story:
Stainless steel unit is in the back (mat finish look), Polycarbonite unit is in the front (shiny look). The units are laying on top of the velvet storage bag. 









VIEW ONLINE BROCHURE HERE.


We have a small inventory on hand.  However, in order to meet expected demand and to keep the prices as low as possible, we need to manufacture our product in larger volumes.  We expect to be able to ship all units in April. Packages will be shipped discreetly and the return address of the sender on the package and on the billing statement will be "HP Products".  


What will the money be used for?  Inventory and spreading the word.  Although we know we have made a world-class product, we need help re-stocking our inventory.  We also have to introduce the world to this brand new category of sex toy, unlike anything else on the market. We hope to spread the word organically but we will also be undertaking a few seperate marketing strategies.  The bottom line is we want everyone to have the opportunity to Go-Go...

How large is the Go-Go Glider? The entire product is 19.5 inches but the insertable portion is only about 6.5 inches, an average size for a sex toy. Most of the product consists of the handles and the glider pole which is the innovation behind the patent-pending double thrust design. 

What did the lucky testers think? One tester simply said "where have you been all my life?" Another described the Go-Go Glider as "an internal massage for my G-spot"! Yet another tester just responded "Wow, Wow, Wow!" We heard two very encouraging stories, the first being a woman in her 40s who claims to have never had an orgasm masturbating took our "solo play" challenge and using the Go-Go Glider and a hand held vibe reached orgasm in under a minute! Another tester told us she infrequently had orgasms but had orgasms on five consecutive attempts when she and her partner used the Go-Go Glider (she was not happy when it was time to return the test model). Finally, one lady told us she could not figure out the simultaneous "coming and going" feeling but all she knew is she never wanted it to stop!

Can the Go-Go Glider be used for solo play? Interestingly enough the overwhelming answer to that question is "yes".  Although the Go-Go Glider was originally designed with only couple use in mind, what we have learned in testing is a woman holding just the slider grip can easily use the product for solo play.  What happens is the tip is vaginally inserted along with the slider but when the slider is pulled out, the kegal muscles hold onto the tip.  The back and forth G-Spot stimulation along with the use of the kegal muscles enhances sensation and increases orgasmic intensity.

Can the Go-Go Glider be used with a vibrator? Absolutely.  That is one of the most thoughtful features of the design.  Since the servicing partner is operating both the tip and slider with the two handles, the receiving partner has both of her hands free to grab her favorite vibe and enjoy. Since solo play can be one handed, a favorite hand-vibe can also be used alone with the Go-Go Glider.

Is the Go-Go Glider patented?  Yes, we are patent-pending in the U.S., Canada, and 39 European countries; we have also trademarked our name.

Can lubricant be used with the Go-Go Glider? Of course, a water based lubricant can be used (and is encouraged).  Note, a silicone based lubricant will break down the silicone glider and therefore is not recommended.

story:
What's In The Bag?

 

What’s in it for you?

•Not only are you joining a Movement to demand our constitutional rights & protections be respected and protected…

•You’ll also receive a life saving card to explain your rights and share tips on what to do during police interaction in the car, at home, and on the street.

•The front also features quick links to find legal help.

•The back features space to take notes on any interaction you experience or witness.

This is in it --->

 

What’s in it for us?

•Your purchase of the Respect My Rights Backpacks helps fund the Get Jayne Productions/ POSitive Native Initiative documentary on the subject.

•The funds allow us to finish filming the history and the trajectory of the 14th. In other words, how can (will) this amendment our ancestors intended to save our lives protect us today?
 

About the Founder & Filmmaker

Jayne Marie Smith, socially conscious filmmaker (THUG, 2017, Cannes Courtyard Metrage) and award-winning short documentarian (Pink Noise, 2016; Black Like Us, 2010), found the inspiration for her next movie and this movement while digging through the history that didn't make it to the books. After having successfully co-founding two annual events in Detroit to address domestic and sexual violence with APUREMovement, Jayne Marie is set to spark a new nation-wide movement combating racial violence. Based part-time in her hometown of Detroit, MI, part-time in her adopted home of Oakland (CA), and  the remainder of the time in L.A. or on the road working, she's already on move, working full-time to get this film out to you.

These Amendment XIV / Respect My Rights Backpacks not only serve to spread awareness on a grassroots level, they also fund a the development and production of Get Jayne Productions' latest film exposing this subject.

 

About The Backpack

•Made Of 600D Polyester.
•One Large Zippered Compartment.
•Carrying Handle.
• Adjustable Straps.
•Spot Clean/Air Dry.
•Size (Approx.) 11" W x 16" H x 3 1/2" D
•Imprint Method Hand Stamped
•Location Front, 8" W x 12" H
•Production Time 21-Days + Transit Time
•Colors Black & White or Red & Black

story:
WHAT IS XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE?

XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE is the first HOODIE built in Gloves, Attached Neck Pillow, Facemask, Sleep Mask, Earplug, Earphone Holder, Passport/Ticket Pocket, Stand Drink Pocket, Tablet Pocket, Touch Phone Pocket, Pen Pocket,Glasses Pocket, Earplug Pocket, Long Wallet Pocket, Two Warm Side Pocket, YKK Zipper, Elastic/Ventilation/Pilling Resistance Well Cotton Made. Within these 17 function for your convenience travel and keep you far away from cold winter and Airplane trip.


What We Are Promise?

We've learned some experiences from the other brand. Delivery on time and size are more Loose and Comfortable are easy to put on for your travel. Customer service is our first aim. We have ready a service that must be respond on each customer message within 24 hours. 




WHAT IS XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE AIM FOR?

We believe going out for travel and airplane trip should not be inconvenience by your burdensome small things. It should be more lightweight, fashionable, practical for holidays.

Have you ever been so worried about what you going to wear while your Airplane Trip? 

Yes, probably this happens to Everyone. According to our Research, most of the PEOPLE confuses with their Departure’s Temperature and Destination’s Temperature and it affect what they going to wear. But our research has also told us that while Airplane take off and inside the airplane temperature are usually 18-25°, but it still quite cold for your airplane trip since when it take off to over 9000 ft it will be the coolest period. So if you taking from hot summer Thailand to Hong Kong, We believe most of the people will choose the normal T-shirt but the jacket or heavy one. So you might got cold while the flying.

Have you ever been so worried about your neck will destroy by many Airplane trip?

Have you ever been so worried about your trip will not silence for sleep anymore by noisy talk?

Have you ever been so worried about your trip has unexpected winter or snow to get you cold?

Have you ever been so worried about your trip has a burdensome package?

More than 20 different situation you will need this XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE to help you.

Yes, this XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE will totally solved all your problems.

Believe us, we have experiences.




How it works?

The magic happens inside the XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE.


TOUCH PHONE POCKET  

Smartphone Pocket provides transparent and effortless connection between your phone and earphones, from now you can touch and reply your message from your phone pocket.


NECK PILLOW  

ERGONOMIC BUILT-IN NECK PILLOW: Revel in comfortable, pain-free travel with this HOODIE’s inflatable neck pillow. You can blow it up in ONLY 2 seconds-and deflate it just as quickly.


WINDPROOF FACE MASK  

Adjustable Face Masks to help you sleep and keep your face protected and warm.


SLEEP MASK  

Adjustable Sleep Masks to help you sleep and keep your face protected /warm /keep your skin clear and free from irritation.

COLD-PROOF POCKET

Design for hand warming pocket with soft material.


EARPHONE HOLDERS  

Practical Earphone Holder beside the hood, so you can enjoy convenient walking while using your phone, as it keeps them untangled and ready for use.


GLOVES  

Features side hand gloves to protect your far away from cold.


TABLET POCKET  

Trouble FREE Tablet pocket. Fit most of the tablet size. ( More than 10 inch)


LONG WALLET POCKET

Long wallet pocket keep your important wallet with zipper.



PASSPORT POCKET  

Never go without your important travel documents passport and ticket, this pocket Safely store your passport.

 

STAND DRINK POCKET

Stand Drink Pocket that keeps your hands off the airplane tray, stores your favorite drinks and keeps them hot or cold and you’ll always be hydrated while traveling.


PEN POCKET  

Your pen will never loose because the Pen pocket is ready for yall.  

SUNGLASS POCKET  

From now you don't have to worries your sunglasses scratched. This pocket material is design for protect sunglasses.


EARPLUG POCKET  

Keep your earplugs ready for noisy crowd while travelling.  



YKK ZIPPER

HIGH QUALITY, Feature the world’s best zipper – YKK – making the process of wearing the HOODIE and taking it off a breeze!


QUALITY FABRIC

We test and each part of ourselves and select the finest materials to construct our travel HOODIE. They are made of a 95% Cotton and 5% Spandex blend .(ELASTIC/VENTILATION/PILLING RESISTANCE WELL COTTON MADE)





Referral rewards list

Invite your friends and family through your personal referral link to help grow XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE and receive rewards at the same time!

Referral {1} Receive a earplug

Referral {2} Receive a travel pillow set

Referral {3} Receive a $20 discount for XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE

Referral {5} Receive one XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE for any size.

Help us by sharing XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE with your friends and get the FREE GIFT.

If you share this link to your Facebook or Twitter and internet by your personal URL.

You will have your surprise gift from our team.

Copy your personal URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the link icon circled in red shown in the screenshot above. You can paste it anywhere and keep track on anyone that clicks it.


How To Track Your Band Members

1. Log into your Indiegogo account.

2. Click on your user name on the top right of the page.

3. Select the “My Profile” option.

4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of Referrals and Contributions.

Importand!!!! Please login your account before you share the link, otherwise it is useless for the Referral.






PURCHASING AND SHIPPING

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

Prices do not include importation taxes. The backer is responsible for them, please check your country's import duties before purchasing.


Where do you ship to?

 We will ship to anywhere in the world reachable by a carrier.


How much is shipping?

Shipping is not included for perks including XY37 TRAVEL HOODIE(Additional Earplug and Pillow is Free Shipping). Worldwide shipping is $10, regardless of your country. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country.








Our XY37 Team

TOMMY FUNG - FOUNDER

CICI XU - DESIGNER

We are the couple who spread love and creative ideas in the normal day. We love travel, we love food, we love all those cute convenience things in life. So we decide to start this program to let more people to travel with convenience and comfortable HOODIE.

Within these 17 function for your convenience travel and keep you far away from cold winter and Airplane trip.



What We Are Promise?
We've learned some experiences from the other brand. Delivery on time and size are more Loose and Comfortable are easy to put on for your travel. Customer service is our first aim. We have ready a service that must be respond on each customer message within 24 hours.

Have you ever been so worried about your trip has unexpected winter or snow to get you cold?

story:
Felts Health Shoes are luxuriously comfortable, super soft felted shoes.
Handcrafted in the Himalayan mountains of Nepal from the finest, sustainably sourced raw materials. Each pair is composed of 19-micron Merino wool, which is prized for its unmatched breathability and insulating properties, as well as nettle fabric, a hollow fibre that is as breathable as Merino wool. These plush and gently supportive form-fitting shoes are bacteria-free and designed to insulate feet & wick away all moisture.
Felts Health Shoes keeps you cool, dry and comfortable- no matter the season.





The Endorsement

Felts Health Shoes are certified for sensitive skin.
Felts Health Shoes Ltd. has been working together with
Finland's, Allergy, Skin & Asthma Federation for having such a product available.
We are very proud to be the first shoe to have reached the pinnacle in skin-friendliness.











Dear project follower. 

I can say with confidence that Felts Health Shoes 2.0 are the best possible in-house shoes ever and great for people with Diabetes or with other medical conditions.
We are making Felts 2.0 shoes, softer, more durable & luxurious with,
added insoles and stitched double-layer outsoles. Felts are machine washable.
Each 2.0 pair comes in a cotton shoe bag and with a pair of insoles.
With the ten principles of Fair Trade, Felts Health Shoes Ltd. works for a better world, as well as spreads the love by donating a pair of our much-loved BabyBoots to a maternity hospital with every pair sold. Over 500 pairs sold in crowdfunding.
Underneath the latest three feedbacks received from our before backers.
See www.healthshoes.co.uk for more info and for a guide of how to find your perfect fit.
I hope for you to experience Felts quality and comfort.
You can support our campaign by sharing it.
- Antti Kejonen
Founder/Managing director
Felts Health Shoes Ltd.
contact(a)felts.shoes
​www.healthshoes.co.uk


Hi Antti,<I just wanted to drop a note to say thanks for a great product. I'm on day 20 of a self-quarantine in Chongqing, China and your slippers keep me warm and comfortable during this trying time, helping to keep my immune system strong and healthy while I wait out the Coronavirus epidemic. Thanks again,
-Kai

Antti, I want to thank you for introducing such a slice of heaven to some of us who have not had an easy time finding the perfect solution due to Chronic Regional Pain Syndrome (CRPS) in our ?? Feet!
We LOVE YOUR FELTS!❤️
Warmest regards, ~ Rochelle ~

Antti and Ladies, I got my felts order this week!!!! Love these. These are so very cosy!!! Thank you, Ladies, for making these with care. They are my favourite purchase
for a long time. Well worth the wait!!! 
-Lori

story:
Short Summary

We are a small team of passionate horse people who want to democratize the way we buy clothes and equipment. We bring a diverse background of business acumen from time spent in Silicon Valley and community knowledge from work in 4-H, Cavalia, A-Circuit Shows and Therapeutic Riding Programs.

This service is incredibly near and dear to our hearts as we know it makes an impact on riders lives each and every day. To save an extra $50 or $100 on purchasing items you need to ride can make a difference in paying for all of the other services to support a horse. To be able to sell the things laying around your barn can give you the budget for an extra show or trailer ride. To receive an item we have donated to our 4-H and Pony Club partners can make a big difference in a child being able to enjoy their horse.

Our campaign is focused on allowing us to catch up on the demand for our kits to clean out items to sell as we currently have a waiting list of over 250 people that we just can't afford to pay the return shipping to receive their bags. We also want to reach as many people as possible nationwide to let them know that this is an option now - you can choose to save money.

Your contributions will allow you access to discounts, personal shopping services, free shipping and joining a community of people who truly believe in the power of riders helping other riders.

Achieving our capital goal will allow us to meet the demand for our service and help as many riders as possible at the speed we would like to with a more robust team. It would also allow us to build more communication tools for all of our customers so they have a better experience consigning and shopping with us.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise a total of $50,000 to achieve ALL of our goals for 2019. Here's a breakdown of what each part of the total would go to:

  • $10,000: Catch up on all clean out kit mailing, processing and product onboarding to the website. Extra budget to keep up with additional kit growth throughout 2019 (15% growth M/M) and to donate rejected items to more partners in need.
  • $25,000 Solidify current team with increased hours, add a bookkeeper to speed up consignment payments and hire an hourly extra person to speed up customer service, order shipment and item processing.
  • $15,000 Build a customer log in system that provides:
    • Consignment Customers: A visual detail page with all accepted items, status and payout information 
    • Sales Customers: A "Favorites" section, personal recommendations based on discipline and your size, price drop notifications

Since we can't offer a traditional stake in the company we see your contribution as a key to opening up benefits of a VIP customer. These can be anything from:

  • A Fun "Boss Mare" Tee  
  • A Set of Extra 20% Off Discounts
  • A Personal Shopper that Gives You First Dibs on Items Your Want As They Come In
  • An Extra 20% Off and Free Shipping For Life

If we can't gather the total amount, we will still use the funds available to focus on servicing all the customers we currently have by keeping up with clean out kits, getting product up as quickly as we can, sending orders quickly and providing prompt customer service and communication.

The Impact

Your contribution will allow riders from all over the US (and one day beyond) the opportunity to enjoy their time with horses.

From expanding the number of people getting money back for the items they purchased and no longer need, to helping parent afford the first riding outfit for their child, to allowing an expanded list of our donation partners a steady flow of items to help. We even recycle all of our fabrics that we can't donate to keep fabric waste out of the landfill!

The more money we can raise to expand what we do, the more we can perpetuate a better option for all riders allowing them to choose secondhand first.

Risks & Challenges

We face a number of risks and challenges on our way to bringing this service to a large audience but want to continue to focus on building trust with our customers, providing clear communication and speedy service.

  • We do have some competitors or other general platforms that people list this type of merchandise on, but I have always felt that the more opportunities to buy and sell the better. All of the services differ in the type of items and how they work. People should be able to find what works best for them!
  • The more people we open this up to the more likely we may experience fraudulent behavior. We are trying to get ahead of this with fraud protect software on our orders and insuring our packages.
  • As we take on more and more items we need to scale all of our shipping systems. Once we reach a certain threshold of clean out kits sent in per week, we can get into a lower cost bulk shipping program.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word! If you can't contribute maybe someone you know can. Share our story and our page - we would be so grateful.
  • Find us an investor! We are still actively looking for an Angel or Seed investor who gets what we are doing. We have a much bigger story to tell and a lot of things to accomplish.

All of the services differ in the type of items and how they work. People should be able to find what works best for them!

Spread the word! If you can't contribute maybe someone you know can. Share our story and our page - we would be so grateful.
Find us an investor! We are still actively looking for an Angel or Seed investor who gets what we are doing. We have a much bigger story to tell and a lot of things to accomplish.

story:
BENEFITS TO QUEENS

  • MORE THAN 25% OFF FUTURE PURCHASES
  • DIVERSITY
  • SOCIAL MEDIA SHOUT-OUTS
  • BRAND QUALITY
  • AFFORDABLE PRICE
  • FAST SHIPPING (2-3 ARRIVAL)
  • COMMUNITY SUPPORT
  • EDUCATION
  • UPLIFTMENT
  • EMPOWERMENT
  • (CATERING TO EVENT IN THE FUTURE AFTER THE CROWNING SHIRTS.)

OUR VISION 

Terrance Ramsey's passion for starting a clothing brand is he sees a strong need for a brand to serve the community not just to sell a quality product but also to provide a service to people who need to be catered to. Back in the early mid-2000's, his mother couldn't afford designer clothing from the mall because she was a single mother and had to pay bills. Terrance used to get picked on for not having those types of clothes. We have a vision of where my brand will be one of the top brands of the world but affordable to people who lack finance.

There is a need for a service to come with a clothing line. There are many designer brands out there that multi-million dollars brands, however, they don't give back to people. We have a farmer mindset meaning we want to plant some crowns back into the community. Over time when a plant receives proper water, gardening and sunlight it will give you a large harvest from the care that is given. We look to service the needs of others by having a future washing service/dry cleaning service, having a high-quality product, and having it at an affordable price.

GOALS AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS (Kings)

Ripe Brand Clothing needs $1,800 to get funded for our first Kingdom shirts. This order will take 30 days to mass produce overseas and orders will be fulfilled as soon as we receive the shipments. If you make a donation, you will get a shirt as well as a coupon code for a future purchase that never expires.  (This is continuation from foreign pineapple shocker). ($377raised)

MORE BENEFITS

  • The Seed of Royalty is to sow a seed with us and we are going to bless you with a future coupon code that never expires and each supporter will receive a crowning shirt to say thank you.
  • Each supporter is going to have their picture taken and we are going to put them in our secret Google+ culture community to where people can share their testimonies about our product and communicate how special we made them feel. People may not remember what you have done for them, they will always remember how you made them feel.
  • We are going to crown our queens that supports and serves the community around them.    

MARKET CHALLENGES 

The biggest challenge is building a brand from scratch and selling apparel solely online. The problem is people aren't going to know if the product is quality if it's just sold online. We also face possible production and shipping delays since our products are coming from overseas. The solution is we are going to have fashion shows in the local areas and across the state to get our name established through word of month. We are going to be shipping through DHL for promptness for our supporters to get their product as well as return the product if it doesn't fit correctly or its the wrong size. All you pay is shipping for your shirt.

 

WORD OF MOUTH GIFT 

Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.

The Seed of Royalty is to sow a seed with us and we are going to bless you with a future coupon code that never expires and each supporter will receive a crowning shirt to say thank you.
Each supporter is going to have their picture taken and we are going to put them in our secret Google+ culture community to where people can share their testimonies about our product and communicate how special we made them feel. People may not remember what you have done for them, they will always remember how you made them feel.
We are going to crown our queens that supports and serves the community around them.    
MARKET CHALLENGES The biggest challenge is building a brand from scratch and selling apparel solely online. The problem is people aren't going to know if the product is quality if it's just sold online. We also face possible production and shipping delays since our products are coming from overseas. The solution is we are going to have fashion shows in the local areas and across the state to get our name established through word of month. We are going to be shipping through DHL for promptness for our supporters to get their product as well as return the product if it doesn't fit correctly or its the wrong size. All you pay is shipping for your shirt. WORD OF MOUTH GIFT Let's say that you're not able to donate any money. That is perfectly fine. We still will need your help. We need your help by spreading the word as well through social media. If someone donates money from your network we will give you a shirt as well to say thank you. Please like us on Tumblr, Instagram, Facebook, and our website is www.ripebrandclothing.com Please also use Indiegogo Share tools as well.

story:
We are a group of young entrepreneurs having our own design studio based in Dallas, TX with a passion of bringing stylish and high-quality Watches at affordable prices.

Branded watches all cost way too much and no it's not the better quality materials being used. Most of the leading industry leaders use low-quality materials, the price is hiked up through various markups at different points in the sales channels. 

Our mantra of change is down to three simple details:

-We wanted a minimalist approach to a watch that could be worn in both casual and professional environment.

-We only use the highest quality materials. 

-We are going to offer our watch for a price that cut our competitors' prices in half.

 

STORY BEHIND "BRUCE ELEVANI"

 

Our watches are products of how we have decided to spend our time every single day behind the helm of our design; further refining prototypes, materials and custom features so in one day, you can wear a symbol of fashion that not only tells a story of who you are, but helps you tell the time as you navigate the earth on your own journey.

There was a time, however, when we were in search of a watch that reflected our sensibility and evoked a unique sense of style. We looked forever- but found nothing. We decided then to take things into our hands.

 

Clean Minimalist Design

Popular name brands have kept the retail markup insanely high for far too long, We wanted to make it easier to invest in things that last.

We strive to make a timepiece that would seamlessly flow into your daily wardrobe and support you in your every effort. A quality watch does not have to steal the spotlight, sometimes the best things are simple and classic.

No Matter The Outfit

"Bruce Elevani" a Stylish and affordable price watch that comes with Three interchangeable straps allowing you to alternate between Genuine leather, Nylon zulu Straps (army green, high qualityBlack) to fit your daily mood & style.

 

WE RESPECT YOU AS A CONSUMER AND CUSTOMER

 

A watch Needs to stand the test of time, right? That should be the whole idea behind any watch. If your BE watch encounters a problem within the first two years related to anything other than the battery, wear and tear, or user damage, send it back to us and we will send you a new one.

 

 

 

WATCH SPECIFICATION

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Case Material: Stainless Steel

Case Diameter: 40m

Width of Lug: 20

Case Thickness: 9.4

Lens: Hardened mineral glass

Battery Life: 2 years

Movement: Japanese Quartz

Water Resistance: 3 ATM

Finish Plating: Matte

Band 1: Zulu black genuine leather

Band 2: Zulu green nylon

Band 3: Zulu black nylon

Band Width: 24

 

WHERE ARE WE HEADED

 

Above all else, BE needs to stay affordable for everyone. Join us today, and with your donations, and your support of this campaign, we will not only create a bond between our brand and the watch market, but we will be able to keep these watches at a lower cost. You are turning our dream into a reality – and for that, you must always be respected.

Check back for updates – we will be informing everyone as we hit our milestones and begin this awesome journey for the BE watch line.

 

 

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

 

 

Thank you so much for your donations to our campaign and sharing our message with your family and friends. We have some fantastic goals, so our BE watch line can be yours in exchange for your donation today.

At the same time, we will be doing everything we can to grow our message. From social media to blogs and news outlets, we will drive traffic to this campaign alongside help from awesome people like you to reach up on the goal. Anything helps – Tweets, liking our Facebook page, sharing on Facebook and twitter; it will all go a long way. You can find our share links right below the video. We really appreciate it.

 

IF FUNDED, HOW WILL YOU FULFILL THE ORDERS?

 

Our prototype for the "BE" watch, as well as the model we intend to use have all been finalized. we have partnered with a spectacular manufacturer. The good news is that our company will receive the first 280 piece on First of June.our production time set for the next order is about 30-40 days depending on how many orders we take in. Our team is very knowledgeable when it comes to managing shipping. We are excited to begin, and can't wait to send you your very own "Bruce Elevani" watch.

Thank you for your support and sharing our message with your family and friends. Time is the most precious resource we have. Check back for updates – because one day soon you may be keeping track of your time with a BE watch.

 

WHY SO AFFORDABLE?

 

The other thing, rather than design, a lot of people love Bruce Elevani for, is its affordable price. Our primary goal is to bring our projects to life and make happy as much people as we can with our watches. That's why we offer such an attractive price on the BE watches, which starts from $79 USD for the first 280 backers! There are several factors that affect the price:

  • No retail margin at all! That’s right! You get your watches directly from the manufacturer, avoiding any middlemen with their commissions on the way to your wrists.

  • Production costs. We’re always transparent and honest about it. There’s a graph below showing how we could achieve such an affordable price with every stage of manufacturing and every piece of the watch itself priced accordingly as well as company profit.

 

 

 

 

Sophisticated 

 

Minimal

 

Versatile 

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

 

When it comes to crowdfunding, spreading your message and reaching as many people as possible is not only what it takes for our campaign to succeed, but for people to understand just how important the “BE” can be to their lives.

We are doing everything we can to make sure everyone we reach donates. We are asking friends, family, and anyone with a platform who wishes to take part in the progressive nature of style and forward fashion to help share this campaign with the Internet at large. We say this with genuine sincerity, for we have dedicated our lives to bringing elements of style and products just like the BE to life.

 

FAQs

 

Q: Does "Bruce Elevani" have Warranty? 

A: YES! "BE" offers a limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of two years following the original purchase date of your "BE" watch from an authorized dealer. This warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship with your "BE" watch. If you encounter either of these issues with your watch we will repair or replace it, subject to our inspection of the watch. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, glass, watch case, strap, bracelet, loss or theft. 

 

Q: Will the watch too big (or too small) for women (or men)?

A: We have designed the watch to be 40mm wide in diameter, which is perfect fit for both men and women. You can refer to our product photos on models to have an idea of how it looks like on hand.

 

Q: How water resistant are the watches?

A: The watches are resistant to 30 Meter. 

 

Q: Is it safe?

A: Indiegogo is a 100% safe and been funding since 2008.  They have now raised over 950million in funding projects.  All of the payments go through secured payment gateways via a credit merchant.  Your perk can be canceled if you wish, so shop worry free!

 

Q: Why I should buy Maven on Indiegogo

A: You can be involved in future product development and enjoy Indiegogo's discounted price. Most importantly, you can be the first to wear Maven Watches before we start selling online.

 

Q: What are the risks associated with backing the "Bruce Elevani" Watch?

A: None. Our watches have already gone through design, development, and production.
We have assembled and are ready to ship 280 watches a to our first 280 backers between June 2017-July2017

 

Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: Shipping is FREE in the US. Other add $10.

 

Q: Delivery time?

 A: The entire production is lined up and ready to go. Everything has been checked and tested in terms of technical drawings, waterproof testing, prototypes and so on. As soon as we reach our funding target, we will press the button and start production. We're confident that we will meet - and possibly beat - our delivery targets. In fact, we maxed our own credit to pre-book an ultra-express production that will allow us to produce and ship the first 280 watches directly after the campaign ends. Having said that, manufacturing always involves an element of risk and uncertainty. We will keep you updated and should anything occur that might affect delivery you will be the first to know.

 

Q: Why my Billing Postal Code is invalid on the checkout page?

A: Check your billing address - this billing postal code is the same as the postal code associated with your credit card. You can check the billing address online or in any of the recent statements.
If you still have trouble in this area, please send an email via hello@bruceelevani.com immediately.

 

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

 

All US orders will be shipped free (2-8 days).

Early Bird international orders will be shipped Via FedEx (2-7 days). All international orders will require $10 for shipping. 

If you would like to upgrade or make any changes to shipping you can let us know when you get your confirmation email. Processing time will be 1-2 business days.

Customs fees & duties:

All watches will be shipping from the US and any shipment outside of the US may be subject to Customs fees or taxes based on each country's tax regulations.The fee will be charged to you by the shipping company (FedEx, UPS, Postal Service, etc.). Sometimes these fees will be charged to you at the time you receive the items. Sometimes these fees will be charged to you at a later time and mailed to you from the shipping company for payment. You are 100% responsible for these fees at the time you are billed.

story:
The Problem

Most people want weight loss and fitness gain by low effort, cost & time. The Military wants something effective to ready kids and recruits (some even still use unhealthy ankle weights). The $2B/yr civilian demand for the discontinued "Tone Up" shoes was real, and can be recovered and surpassed if given an exercise shoe-machine, that truly works.  TrExS works!!!

            The Solution

Our True Exercise Shoes (TrExS) use an engineered hydraulic friction technology that works. It is embedded in the soles.  Hydraulic friction creates heat. To dissipate the heat the TrExS features transpiration panels and other means. TrExShoes feature adjustable workout effort (Workout Intensity), set at factory but changeable in store or by skilled customer having the tool. Instability, the principle of the discontinued "Tone-Up" shoes, has no place in what we do.

Appeal is to a) all civilians desiring trimness & fitness, b) military & security & sport training.

                  The Business

Licensing arrangements will be offered to a) shoe, and b) exercise equipment companies, globally.  To keep track of licensed product and work-in-progress (WIP), radio frequency identification  technology (RFID) supplied by us will be incorporated into every TrExShoe pair.   

                           The Funding

The seed funds of $40K have been expended.  To create the long lasting prototypes and initial pre-production pairs, NOW we need $15,000 by your contributions.  With these funds in hand we will make prototypes and pre-production pairs.  With those we'll seek partners, licensees, investors, to create the first production batch and bring it to market.

                                    The Expectation

Before being discontinued by dint of having been found to not work, the Instability based "Tone-Up" products were selling 20 Million pairs per year at ~$100 each a few years ago.   We can surpass the $2 Billion/yr retail business, and will do so by a strategy of licensing globally.

Who Are We?

We are a number of associated individuals led by Mr Harry Shamir, very experienced degreed professionals in Engineering, Polymer Chemistry, Medicine, Marketing, Legals, Government operations, and Management.

Mr Shamir is an M.E. (1967), with a Masters' in Engineering Management (1977), and 40 years' industry experience.

            Our Story

The concept behind TrExS was born before 2008 but took time to gel and overcome non working ideas (quite a few).   Eventually the pre-prototypes were created by modifying commercial sneakers, but their life in use was limited to 1/2 hour and was one time, but proved the principle.  In April 2016 we were issued a US Patent, and now need to create prototypes and a preproduction batch.  The prototypes will be used to convince partners, licensees, investors, that the technology works, by having test out TrExS on their own feet, one foot wearing TrEx, the other non-TrEx.  A 1/2 hour walk suffices.   To convince skeptics who have no opportunity to try the prototypes, we will invest $50K ASAP in an academic third party study similar to how the "Tone-Up" shoes were tested before discontinuance.

                        What We Need & What You Get

Our current need is $15K.  Prototypes will beget additional funding to create a first product batch, OR identify a first licensee.  For each $125 contribution, we promise a pair of TrExS to be retailed at $250, from first production batch.  Because your $125 is an investment of trust, not mere cold calculation, we will recognize the trust somehow, but appropriately, in addition to the TrExS pair.  Smaller contributions will receive discount certificates for TrExShoes.  We also hope to obtain testimonials from you with frank opinions of the TrExS product after wearing them.  With your permission we will publish them.

                                    Risks & Challenges

This is a business venture.  All ventures entail risk.  The largest is from the technology being appropriated and copies sold.  To overcome crooks we shall employ at least one strategy and one tactic.  The tactic is to build into every pair an electronic RFID chip enabling identification of source and other data.  This will help identify copies since their chips won't have compatible readability, or have no chips at all.  The strategy is to license production and sales at many places globally, each licensee responsible to keep crooks in check.  This will also reduce shipping costs.

Our income will be assured by the licensee buying the RFID chips from us, as well as the key element transforming human energy to heat, located inside the sole.

Third party testing and validation of TrExS claims will be done ASAP, to preempt any false-claims suits.   We will also warn people who suffer foot pain upon walking uphill, to not use TrExS without Podiatrist approval.

Recycling is important for more than environmental concerns.  Used but still good TrExS can be transferred to needy people.  Unusable TrExS can become resources of usable materials.  We will do our level best to make that happen.

Of course the biggest risk is will it sell at the retail price offered?   We will not price the TrExS product out of reach, though first batches will inevitably have price tags higher than later batches.   

We are confident, but too experienced to not be clear eyed about the future.

                                                            You Can Help

Folks:  please get the word out and check out what people (will) say about all this, if they'd buy the product, an honest to goodness good product for once!

story:
CEP One - The Evolution of the lacing system. 

- Imagine no need to tight laces anymore

- Imagine it can adjust the size ANYTIME with a simple lock and unlock.

- Imagine it can locate in front of the shoe or behind the tongue of the shoe.

 

- How easy we change from behind the tongue of the shoe to in front of the shoe?

- We have more than 10 COLORS for you to choose in the beginning!

What makes us different?

We have laser version which customer  is able to laser your NAME on the surface which makes the product unique and fashionable.

Laser Units Photo Review.

 

Order online coming soon: www.ceproducts.co

 

CEP One have TWO versions for selection.

Standard version – Unit surface have our company logo.
Laser version  – Unit surface can laser your own name / team name / company name and such as….

(Both versions you can select different colors.)

How Strong of the CEP One?

 

How to Installation?

How to operation?

Easy for Kids as well !!!

 

CEP One Shoelace Fasten Device includes:

1 Pair of CEP Units (Standard Version / Laser Version)

1 Paid of shoelaces

8 x 2.5mm dia. Heat Shrink Tube for adjustable shoelace length with the new head on

8 x 3.5mm dia. Heat Shrink Tube for adjustable shoelace length with the new head on

 

Suitable shoelace

CEP One suitable with most shoelaces in the market. But there are so many shoelaces it's impossible to test on all of them. Theoretically if your shoe shoelace is flat shoelace then it should work.

 

Let’s TRY it!

MOLD

After several prototypes test, we have sent the 3D drawing to the tool makers to complete the production molds.

 

 

PATENTS

Cutting Edge Products – CEP One has been applied Patents in USA / Internationally.

 

Disclaimer

Disclaimer: There were no endorsements by any Brands for this project. All shoes used in the pictures and videos were paid for and are my personal property.

Although our product is used in all of the shoes in these pictures and/or videos, the shoes work perfect in their natural state without CEP One Shoelace Fasten Device. Our product simply gives the user an optional way to keep their shoes secure.

Disclaimer: Just like any other shoelaces system, it is the responsibility of the end user to make sure your CEP One Shoelace Fasten Device has installed correctly.  It is also the end users responsibility to make sure unit close correctly to secure the shoelaces.

 

FAQ

Q: How do you come up with the name:

CEP One – CEP means our company short name (Cutting Edge Products) and One means (Model One)

Q: What are the differences of the standard version and laser version?

A: Standard version is unit has printed our company logo on the surface.

     Laser version is unit able to Laser YOUR OWN WORDS on the surface.

Q: How many words will be the best of laser version?

A: We suggest to laser 4-8 words are the best!

Q: Can I laser different words for the pairs units.

A: Pairs units laser must be the same. 

Q: How many words and how many lines you can have on the laser version?

A: It can accept max. Two line on the unit. Each line can laser approx 13 words. So totally you can have 26 words on the surface.

Q: Can I order custom words/graphic on standard version?

A: Yes this is possible but the order quantity needs to reach our MOQ, please contact us to discuss in detail.

Q: Can I laser different color on the unit?

A: Laser is kind of chemical reaction; it is not able to have different color.

Q: How to install?

A: Please watch our installation guide videos and photo for more details.

Q: Do CEP One hold securely?

A: Yes, unit can hold more than 18KG power.

Q: Do CEP One suitable for All different kind of shoelace?

A: CEP One can be suitable for most of the flat shoelace in the market. Round shoelace will not suitable for CEP ONE.

We do suggest you buy the shoelace from our side to ensure it work on your shoes.

Q: Does the CEP One work with “All” Shoes?

A: There are so many shoes it's impossible to test on all of them. Theoretically if your shoe shoelace is flat shoelace then it should work.

Q: Which types of sports can use CEP One?

A: Unit design suitable for running, Gym glass, Riding a bike, playing at the playground.

Also suitable playing sports like: Badminton, Squash, Table Tennis, Tennis. Basket Ball. Generally we do not recommended for hard –sole athletic cleats used for soccer, football, Track or any sport will impact on the shoes.

Q: How Big of CEP One

A: Unit size approx 55mm*20mm*6mm

Q: Are CEP One closures a shoe?

A: CEP One is not a shoe. It is a plastic unit that you attach on your own shoelaces.

Q: Can I use CEP one on multiple pairs of shoes?

A: Yes of course, you can un-install the unit of the old shoes then put it on the new pairs.

Q: What is heat shrink tube on the package?

A: Heat shrink tube is for adjust your shoelace length which makes the wearer more comfortable. After that you can have new the plastic head at the end just like the original one.

Q: How to use heat shrink tube?

A: Details please watch the shoelace adjustable video.

Q: Does CEP One have Patents?

A: Yes, CEP one has been applied Patents in USA / Internationally.

Q: Can you ship international?

A: Yes, we can ship anywhere in the world.

Q: Can I become a distributor?

A: Yes, please send us private message and we will get back to you.

Q: Do they work for kids shoes?

A: Yes, absolutely. My kid love the unit and not having worried to tight the shoelace again.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our 1st crowd funding project, for the product: We have spent nearly a year to improving and completing the design, several prototype tests and made many improvements to ensure the quality of the product. We have completed the mold and now ready for production. So that's really no risk of the products. And also to ensure the delivery on time, we have partner with an agency can handle goods from our factory direct to the destination through by “USPS” for USA market. It will take 3-15 business days depending on the shipping method.

We also accept international shipment, some countries may be slower but average will be same as above 3-15 business days.

So the only risk you are taking is whether you like the product or not. I can tell you after I use CEP One I won’t tight my shoelace again!

Biggest Challenges

I will say how to make a good video and how to make the crowd-funding page professional are our biggest challenges.
We have spend nearly a month to complete the video, during this we have revise a lot to ensure it is clear and easy to understanding.
We know that we still have much to improve.Please support us, we will get better and better in the future and bring you a New Products to make life easily.

Personal: CEP One is easy to operation compare with other products in the market.
I have my name on the unit which make me feel unique and fashionable XD.

I hope you love the products as I did.

Thank you for support us.
story_txt:
CEP One - The Evolution of the lacing system. - Imagine no need to tight laces anymore- Imagine it can adjust the size ANYTIME with a simple lock and unlock.- Imagine it can locate in front of the shoe or behind the tongue of the shoe. - How easy we change from behind the tongue of the shoe to in front of the shoe?- We have more than 10 COLORS for you to choose in the beginning!What makes us different?We have laser version which customer  is able to laser your NAME on the surface which makes the product unique and fashionable.Laser Units Photo Review. Order online coming soon: www.ceproducts.co CEP One have TWO versions for selection.Standard version – Unit surface have our company logo.Laser version  – Unit surface can laser your own name / team name / company name and such as….(Both versions you can select different colors.)How Strong of the CEP One? How to Installation?How to operation?Easy for Kids as well !!!

story:
CHOOSE THE MOSSEPIC COLLECTION THAT FITS YOUR STYLE BEST!

We've created 6 different collections, 3 for men and 3 for women. The collections were well thought-out in order to offer you the diversity you need to make the Mossepic watch a staple in your everyday style.

Each collection comes with: 

  • 2 genuine leather straps in black and in brown,
  • a stainless steel mesh strap
  • & 2 high-quality nato straps.

All five straps are equipped with the quick release system which gives you the opportunity and freedom to change the strap on your Mossepic watch within seconds.

That means you can adapt your watch to any style, occasion or mood you are in.

The colour combinations in every collection were thoughtfully matched to fit every lifestyle, you only have to choose which one suits you best. 

Think of the colours at sunrise on a beautiful spring day. These colours were used in the Sunrise collection for stylish and outgoing individuals. 


Midnight is the perfect combination of mystery and opportunity. This collection is meant for elegant and bold men with an epic touch of style.  


The sunset is not just the end of the day, it's also the start of new adventures. If you are feeling adventurous and ready for a challenge, the Sunset collection is the one for you. 

The Dawn collection offers a light colour palette, like waking up right before sunrise on a cold winter morning and is the perfect choice for elegant and classy women.

Aurora offers you a splash of daring red with dark and edgy colours. This collection is perfect for the fashion-forward and sensual. 

The colours in the Dusk collection present the partial darkness before nightfall - perfect for mysterious women on the search for their new adventure.


You will be able to purchase additional straps on our website after the end of our Indiegogo campaign at a very affordable price. We want you to have the freedom to transform your watch at any given moment and match it to every situation.

New straps will be added regularly so your Mossepic watch will be able to continue transforming constantly. 


 

The idea behind the Mossepic Watch Collection developed because of the hectic world we live in that is constantly changing. If you want to keep up, you have to change with it and you have to change fast. 

We found it very hard to fit just one watch to our style, that changes daily. And if we wanted to buy additional straps, the cost just wasn't worth it. A similar watch and an additional strap could easily add up to 250$!

So we decided to create the Mossepic Collection - an affordable and beautiful watch collection that will adapt to your ever-changing style.

Your style transforms daily, you are constantly trying to reinvent yourself, so we wanted to develop a watch that would transform with you. 
 

With the Mossepic Watch Collection, we wanted to give you the opportunity to own a watch that can meet your every desire. 

When you purchase our collection, you receive ONE PREMIUM WATCH and FIVE EASILY INTERCHANGEABLE STRAPS that allow you to change your style within seconds. 

Everytime your style changes, your watch can change with it in a matter of seconds.

 

You can start the day with a classy leather strap for work, change it to a more casual nato strap for your afternoon errands and charm your dinner date with an elegant mesh strap.

Why spend your money on 5 different watches that would suit different occasions when you can buy 1 Mossepic Watch Collection that can be transformed into any watch you need.


It took us over a year to develop the Mossepic concept and define the collections that will meet all your style requirements while still ensuring the highest quality of all materials used. 

We wanted to give you premium quality at an affordable price. 

It took us a while to develop the Mossepic Collection since had two things in mind: not to settle for lower quality and obtain an affordable price.

That is why the Mossepic Collection is THE FIRST PREMIUM 5 in 1 WATCH COLLECTION.

The name Mossepic was defined at an early stage. It was simple and presented right what we wanted to create - the most epic watch collection ever.

Our watch collection will give you “Your Touch Of Epic” every day.


The design was inspired by simplicity infused with luxurious elegance. We wanted to create an eternal style that would never go out of fashion but was still edgy enough to always be on trend.

 Our designers came up with numerous concepts but it was the last design, the one now used for the Mossepic watch, that stood out since it satisfied all of our requests.

We believe we managed to create a classy, elegant and contemporary timepiece with exceptional attention to detail and its versatility.


Using the best materials was always a priority while developing the concept of our watch. We believed that having the highest quality in mind allows us to create a watch collection that will last for decades.


SAPPHIRE GLASS

The glass used in the Mossepic watch is sapphire glass, the second toughest material in the world (only the diamond is higher on the hardness scale). This means that it is extremely resistant to scratches and the least prone to shattering.

Cutting and shaping the sapphire glass requires expensive tools, which is why we are glad we were able to give you both an affordable and top quality materials.

 
QUARTZ MOVEMENT

The watch movement is the head and the heart of the watch and the quartz movement is considered to be one of the most reliable movements. We used the Miyota GL20 Quartz movement, which is extremely precise and efficient when it comes to keeping time -a virtue we believe is crucial for a quality watch.


QUICK RELEASE SYSTEM

Each strap is equipped with the quick release system, which makes changing the strap on your watch very easy and fast. You can completely change the style of your watch within a matter of seconds without additional tools required. 

 
5 YEAR BATTERY LIFE

Our battery is made to last 5 years, that is more than double compared to similar watches on the market, that offer a battery lifespan of 2-3 years.


WATER RESISTANT

The Mossepic watch is 3ATM water resistant, which means you are able to wear it daily without worrying it might get damaged.


ALL STAINLESS STEEL & IP PLATING

Our Mossepic watch is made of stainless steel, a very strong material which is resistant to rust or stain. 

We used IP plating for achieving the precise colour of the watches we wanted. Tests have shown that this process is up to 8 times more durable than other conventional techniques.

DIAMETER DIMENSIONS

The DIAMETER of the men's watch is 40 mm and the women's is 36 mm.


When developing the Mossepic box, we had functionality, prestige and minimalism in mind. 

We believe we designed a box that you will be glad to keep on display and will offer you the perfect place to store your Mossepic Collection.


 If you wanted to buy a similar watch with additional 4 straps, you would have to spend up to $ 356!

Buying the Mossepic Collection will save you an astonishing 75% if you catch our SUPER EARLY BIRD PRICE! 

We are extremely happy we were able to create a premium watch collection with amazing materials, mechanism, 4 additional straps, while still maintaining a very reasonable price.

We were able to achieve this by cooperating with many different companies, finding which were the best at what they do and can guarantee a fair price.

The result is our MOSSEPIC COLLECTION. 


We would love you to become part of our Mossepic family! Make sure you like our social media profiles and help us grow our most epic community! 

 

 


Realised you have questions that have gone unanswered? Don't worry! We are here to answer anything you wish to ask us. You can write us an email or chat with us here:



 

Risks and challenges

Our project is very complex due to the number of items you will be receiving in your collection. Although we have planned for all potential risks and do not anticipate any challenges there can always be unforeseen issues, which we will address and fix instantly since we are working closely with the manufacturer to ensure production runs smoothly. We are working with a well-respected manufacturer with a positive history of meeting even the highest demands. 
The whole Mossepic team will make it our priority to deliver our product to you on time and at the highest quality.

story:
Our new waistband is guaranteed to be more comfortable and less constricting than any other pair in your drawer. It eliminates redness, grip marks, irritation & rashes at the waistline. Despite the amazing soft feel of our garments, they are made with high durability and easy washability in mind, to ensure long lasting use.

  • Not so tight that you cannot put your underwear on
  • Not so loose, that your underwear does not stay in place
  • Eliminates redness, grip marks, irritation & rashes at the waistline

At Tani, we strive to set a new standard in Men's and Women's underwear. We do this through innovation in every aspect of the garment. From newly developed and patented fabrics, to developing a better waistband re-designed and reimagined to significantly reduce the irritation and redness around the waist that is associated with most traditional elastic waistbands.

Using a patented technology that blends the soft stretch and recovery of natural rubber with the durability & lightness of Japanese micro elastane, we've created a completely new waistband that simply feels better and fits unlike any other.

So why are we crowdfunding? We’re crowdfunding because this is a great way support production and bring our new waistband to market.  It also gives existing and new customers a way to be involved in the development of our latest innovations.

The funds raised will go to support production costs associated with the new waistband.  And by backing this project, you’ll gain access to some great rewards, including our most popular SilkCut Underwear made with Micro Modal® Air and our new waistband.

At Tani, we’ll provide you with “the best pair you will ever wear.”
