At Tani, we strive to set a new standard in Men's and Women's underwear. We do this through innovation in every aspect of the garment. From newly developed and patented fabrics, to developing a better waistband re-designed and reimagined to significantly reduce the irritation and redness around the waist that is associated with most traditional elastic waistbands.Using a patented technology that blends the soft stretch and recovery of natural rubber with the durability & lightness of Japanese micro elastane, we've created a completely new waistband that simply feels better and fits unlike any other.So why are we crowdfunding? We’re crowdfunding because this is a great way support production and bring our new waistband to market.  It also gives existing and new customers a way to be involved in the development of our latest innovations.The funds raised will go to support production costs associated with the new waistband.  And by backing this project, you’ll gain access to some great rewards, including our most popular SilkCut Underwear made with Micro Modal® Air and our new waistband.At Tani, we’ll provide you with “the best pair you will ever wear.”

story:
A New Tech-Based Cooling Solution - in a Bracelet!

 

 

Fria - The Story

 

Fria's Mission

   

 

We're asking for your support

What We Need

Hot flashes related to menopause (The Pause) affects all women across the globe.  Heat challenges affect other populations like pregnant women, people in chemotherapy and sports athletes, that's why we set our ultimate goal which is to get 1 million women to join the Fria community and support "The Pause" by donating a minimum of $5.  

Why we need your support?

Fria was created to address the problem of hot flashes experienced by more than 1 billion menopausal women around the world each year. Our goal is to be a real solution to manage this perpetual problem and with your help, we can bring this smart, fashion tech product to market. 

    Here's what we'll do with the money

    The first $250,000 will be used for research, prototype development, testing and early stage marketing.  

    Ultimately, we are going to need $5,000,000 to bring the Fria product to market. With 1,000,000 supporters donating a minimum of $5, we can do it sooner than later!

    Testimonials

     

    Help us make some noise!

    Every post and share helps. Every conversation and social media mention helps Fria get that much closer to getting 1 million women and men to join the Fria community and closer to helping us build the first fashionable tech solution to deliver effective cooling relief while seamlessly complimenting the wearer’s lifestyle.

    Please like and share our Facebook  page and follow us on Instagram  and use hashtags #keepyourcool and #magnificentmillion and visit our website at myfria.com

    We can't do this without you... THANK YOU! 

    Sheilisa and Karen 

    Fria Team

       

     Sheilisa McNeal - CEO, Co-Founder - Sheilisa is the brainchild behind Fria. Tired of being hot all the time as a result of constant flashes, she literally woke up one morning with an idea to create “cool jewels” - cooling technology inside jewelry. Knowing her friend Karen had a lengthy background in the jewelry business, she asked her to go into partnership on this idea and Fria was born.  Sheilisa's professional experience spans 25 years in the fields of Public Relations, Marketing/Corporate Communications, Professional Writing and teaching at the collegiate level. She has developed innovative communications practices and branding campaigns for Fortune 100 & 500 companies.  She has authored speeches and drafted remarks for:  Former President, Bill Clinton; American Express CEO, Ken Chenault; Humanitarian, Martin Luther King III and other notable figures. 

      

    Karen Webster - President & Co-Founder - In 1990 Karen began her career in the fashion jewelry industry, a journey that would encompass multiple aspects of design, development, marketing and sales and take her around the world working with clients in Asia and Europe.  In 2005 Karen co-founded GLITTERRINGS Inc., developing successful fashion jewelry brands for leading department stores such as Nordstrom’s, Lord and Taylor and HSN on which she appeared in 2010.  In 2015, after 25 years in the fashion jewelry industry, Karen made the decision to employ her personal experience, learnings and critical insights into a career as a transformational coach and expand her journey as an entrepreneur with businesses focused on health, wellness, beauty and self-care.  At the core of all her work is her passion for helping people solve their problems and live more fulfilling lives.  Karen immediately recognized the game-changing potential of Fria and is excited to be a part of bringing it to that marketplace and leading the new narrative about menopause and the empowerment that it truly represents.

    Karen’s businesses include:  DivineLife – The Attractive MindSet for Love, Life and Wealth and COCOTIQUE – CFO/Co-Owner

    Dr. Nenad Miljkovic, Advisor, Cooling Technology. Dr. Miljkovic is an Assistant Professor of Mechanical Science and Engineering at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, where he leads the Energy Transport Research Laboratory. His group’s research intersects the multi-disciplinary fields of thermo-fluid science, interfacial phenomena, and renewable energy and focuses on bringing about efficiency enhancements in various industries including energy, water, and electronics cooling, by fundamentally altering thermal-fluid-surface interactions. In 2012, he received the ASME Micro/Nano Heat Transfer Heat and Mass Transfer International Conference Best Paper Award, and in 2013 received the Wunsch Foundation Silent Hoist and Crane Award for outstanding graduate research during his PhD. He is a recipient of the National Science Foundation CAREER award, the Office of Naval Research Young Investigator Award, a Distinguished Visiting Fellowship from the United Kingdom Royal Academy of Engineering, and a U.S. National Academy of Sciences Arab-American Frontiers Fellowship.

    Dr. Joe Bradley, Advisor, Cooling Technology - Dr. Bradley is a Lecturer and Researcher at the College of Engineering and the College of Business at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. He develops and designs project-based-learning courses to engage first-year engineering students. He has worked in a variety industries that include consumer products, software, and government research. He has taught courses in engineering design, new product development, IP and Innovation management strategy. He has published on the topics of product development & design, organizational design, corporate innovation, and entrepreneurship in peer-reviewed journals and at conferences. Joe has also collaborated with private companies, state governments, and the federal government to develop intellectual property management  guidelines for U.S State and Federal transportation practitioners. He is a co-founder of Sun Buckets, Inc. that develops energy solutions to address the global cooking crisis for emerging market consumers with cooking fuel insecurity.

    Sharon Higgins, Administration - Sharon's professional expertise in financial analysis, commercial financing, risk management, implementation processes, reporting and business development. With over ten years of commercial lending and underwriting experience with micro loans financing and with the Small Business Administration (SBA) 504 Loan programs. She contributed to the implementation and facilitation of several multi-million dollar federal, state, and city economic development small business expansion projects. She holds a Master of Public Administration, Master of Science in Higher Education Administration, Bachelor in Accounting, and Associate of Applied Science in Business Administration.

        

    Bloopers - Click to Watch

story:
BEHIND CONCEPCION MIRANDA!

Concepción Miranda is created with the vision of being able to be an international reference of quality, beauty and artisanal luxury, we want to be a promoter of the local economy in Costa Rica, provide work and opportunities for women entrepreneurs and microentrepreneurs.

The name of the brand is a tribute to my father and mother, my parents are two exceptional beings, who under the most difficult situations, taught us to have a will of steel and not to feel sorry for our economic situation, I was born in a neighborhood surrounded by a lot of poverty, without luxuries but with many dreams, I decided to hold on to them and struggle to achieve them, I have worked since I was 14 years old, I have been a demonstrator in supermarkets, a saleswoman, I have worked doing surveys, I have been an international sales agent and many more.

My name is Nathalia Concepción Miranda, I am 30 years old, I am Panamanian, I live in Costa Rica since 10 years ago, I am a mother of two wonderful children, wife, sister, designer, entrepreneur. Many times they ask me what I want in life? My answer is that I want to give inspiration, that the story of my life and Concepción Miranda, is a story that tells us, that each obstacle is only a step with which you can build a ladder to success.  I want to create an impact on you, who are part of this campaign, who understand the essence of the brand and  is committed to our DNA,  I want to create awareness and demonstrate how we can be agents of change and drivers of growth.

Through much effort and passion we have achieved that Concepción Miranda is a brand with a very strong image, we have participated in prestigious fashion shows in Latin America and  with countless editorials in international magazines such as Vanidades Mexico, Magazine L 'Officiel Italia, Nylon Magazine in Spanish and many more.

BECAUSE SUPPORT US!

Because we need to cover all the growth that the brand is having at this moment, we have lots of calls and messages from international fashion experts interested in the brand, invitations to fashion shows, retails, who want to expose our work and we can not take advantage of it, because we need capital, we need to create an inventory, and be able to market a line in sizes, expand and have our collections in different points of sale, we need access to better raw materials, we need investors, since Concepción Miranda is ready to grow, we have prepared, we have studied markets, conducted workshops, seminars, courses, we have approached professionals and we know the path we must travel to achieve all our goals.  

THIS CAMPAIGN IS FOR YOU!

A person who understands that this is not just a matter of solidarity or social conscience, is for you that you understand that when you buy a garment created with fair trade you are benefiting your environment, you know that with your purchases you will create opportunities.

HELP US TO PROMOTE! #concepcionmiranda

We can not do it without you. Join the mission! If you like this project, support us, share it, spread the news of our campaign, it is important not only to share the link, but also to write something about it. Apparently, not many people click on a link that is not entered, and if you want to show us how you gave us your support, send us a message in our email info@concepcionmiranda.com

THANK YOU SO MUCH, FOR BEING PART OF OUR HISTORY AND BUILDING WITH US!

¡DETRAS DE CONCEPCION MIRANDA!

Concepción Miranda se crea con la visión de poder ser referencia internacional de calidad, belleza y lujo artesanal, deseamos ser impulsor de la economía local en Costa Rica, brindar trabajo y oportunidades a mujeres emprendedoras y pequeños microempresarios.

 El nombre de la marca es un homenaje a mi papá y mi mamá,  mis padres son dos seres excepcionales, que bajo las situaciones más difíciles, nos enseñaron a tener una voluntad de acero y a no compadecernos por nuestra situación económica, yo nací en un barrio rodeado de mucha pobreza, sin lujos pero con muchos sueños, decidí aferrarme a ellos y batallar hasta lograrlos, he trabajado desde los 14 años, he sido demostradora de refrescos en los supermercados, vendedora de programas,he trabajado realizando encuentas, he sido agente de venta internacional  y muchos más. 

Mi nombre es Nathalia Concepción Miranda, tengo 30 años, soy panameña, vivo en Costa Rica hace casi 10 años, soy mamá de dos hijos maravillosos, esposa, ama de casa, hermana, diseñadora, emprendedora.

Muchas veces me preguntan ¿Qué deseo en la vida? Mi respuesta es que deseo dar inspiración, que la historia de mi vida y de Concepción Miranda, sea un relato que nos cuente, que cada obstáculo es solo un peldaño con el cual se puede construir una escalera hacia el éxito. Deseamos crear un impacto en ustedes, que son parte de esta campaña, que entiendan la esencia de la marca y logren comprometerse con nuestro ADN, queremos crear conciencia y demostrar cómo podemos ser entes de cambios e impulsores del crecimiento.

 

 

Mediante mucho esfuerzo y pasión hemos logrado que Concepción Miranda sea una marca con una imagen muy fuerte, hemos participado en prestigiosos desfiles y eventos en América latina, contamos con innumerables editoriales en revistas internacionales como Vanidades México, Revista L’ Officiel Italia, Revista Nylon en español y muchas más.

¡PORQUE APOYARNOS!

Porque necesitamos abarcar todo el crecimiento que la marca está teniendo en este momento, tenemos cantidades de llamadas y mensajes de expertos en moda internacional interesados en la marca, invitaciones a desfiles, retails, que desean exponer nuestro trabajo y que no podemos aprovechar, porque necesitamos capital, necesitamos crear un inventario, y poder comercializar una línea en tallas, expandirnos y tener nuestras colecciones en diferentes puntos de ventas, necesitamos acceder a mejores materias primas, necesitamos inversionistas, ya que Concepción Miranda está lista para crecer, nos hemos preparado, hemos estudiado mercados, llevado talleres, seminarios, cursos, nos hemos acercado a profesionales y sabemos el camino que debemos recorrer  para alcanzar todas nuestras metas.

¡ESTA CAMPAÑA ES PARA TI!

Una persona que entiende que esto no es solo cuestión de solidaridad o conciencia social, es para ti que entiendes que cuando compras una prenda creada con comercio justo estás beneficiando tu entorno, sabes que con tus compras va a crear oportunidades.

¡AYÚDENOS A PROMOVER! #concepcionmiranda

 No podemos hacerlo sin ti. ¡Únete a la misión! Si te gusta este proyecto, apóyanos, compártelo, difunde la noticia de nuestra campaña, es importante no solo compartir el enlace, sino también escribir algo al respecto. Aparentemente, no muchas personas hacen clic en un enlace que no se introduce,  y si deseas mostrarnos cómo nos diste tu apoyo, envíenos un mensaje en nuestro correo electrónico info@concepcionmiranda.com 

¡GRACIAS POR TANTO AMOR, POR SER PARTE DE NUESTRA HISTORIA Y CONSTRUIR CON NOSOTROS!

story:
Who Am I?

My name is Candice Padro and I am a jewelry designer from Queens New York.  I have been training in the arts for my whole life and I have degrees in fine arts, metal smithing and jewelry design.  

When I was 13 I fell in love with fashion and my dream was to become the next Betsey Johnson.  I wanted to provide unique products for the creative human who lives to stand out.  Three years ago I took the plunge and started to pursue my childhood dream of owning my own business.

As of right now I have been using my own money to fund the set up and production for Abstracted Reverie.  This campaign will give me the opportunity to invest in my business in a bigger way and help me reach my goals quicker.

What We Need & What You Get

Now let's get down to the brass tacks.

I am asking for $20,000 and this is what I am going to use it for.

  • Inventory!  This has been a huge pain point for me.  I have only been able to invest in small amounts of inventory at a time, leaving some customers to wait a long time to receive their orders.  My priority is customer satisfaction and the first step for this in my mind is to invest in inventory.
  • Website!  I currently have a functioning website but it's limited.  I would like to hire a professional to upgrade it and make it more user friendly.
  • Marketing! I have a lot of ideas for social media and e-mail marketing campaigns which will require photographers/videographers. I also have a list of stylists and influencers that I would like to work with that will require an investment in more product.
  • Future Collections!  My ideas for new pieces are never ending.  The problem with this is that starting a new collection requires the most monetary investment.  Having a cushion to develop new product will give me the opportunity to expand my line and attract new customers.
  • Emergency Fund!  I have encountered many road blocks the last three years, especially this last year.  These road blocks has required me to spend money when I wasn't expecting to.  I want to create a safety net for myself just in case I have more road blocks in the future.

What will you get when you contribute?

  • A huge thank you!  Any help that I am given will be received with immense gratitude
  • Product! If you donate within certain price brackets I will send you some of my existing designs and maybe some new items that aren't being sold yet

What if I don't reach my goal?

If I don't reach the $20,000 my first priority are my customers. 

I would take whatever money I do get and invest in inventory. 

If I have money left over I will throw everything into marketing, getting influencers on my team and produce more campaigns to attract a larger customer base that will translate to more sales.

My Intent

Jewelry for me is a universal wearable art that any human can invest in.  It transcends gender, skin color, weight and ethnicity.  It is an investment product, something that you can have forever and possibly pass down to future generations.  What you wear is your 'Hello' to the world but your jewelry is what sets you apart from the masses.

In this world of fast fashion we have lost site of what style and quality products are.  We waste our money on cheap product that falls apart and eventually is thrown away.  

My intention with Abstracted Reverie is to change the narrative.  Provide a high quality, unique product that is affordable.  When we move away from shopping at conglomerates in the spirit of convenience and put our money towards companies that care about their product, their customers and our environment we will change the way the fashion industry functions. 

Risks & Challenges

Starting a business at all is a huge risk especially in fashion during a pandemic.  I believe my passion, experience and vision will set me apart and make this company a unique investment.  I am committed to making this my future and I am confident it will be successful.

For me as an artist I take challenges and use them as lessons.  I welcome them, the only way we learn is if we encounter these challenges and I have the right attitude and mind set to get through whatever is thrown my way.

Other Ways You Can Help

Money isn't everything!  Can't donate at the moment?

Spread the word!  Social media platforms are free marketing tools that everyone can use.  Probably the biggest help a small business can ask for besides buying product and donating money is supporting us through word of mouth.

So follow me on Facebook and Instagram, share my posts, share my campaign.  The more eyes I can get on this the greater chance I will have to succeed!
story_txt:
Who Am I?
My name is Candice Padro and I am a jewelry designer from Queens New York.  I have been training in the arts for my whole life and I have degrees in fine arts, metal smithing and jewelry design.  
When I was 13 I fell in love with fashion and my dream was to become the next Betsey Johnson.  I wanted to provide unique products for the creative human who lives to stand out.  Three years ago I took the plunge and started to pursue my childhood dream of owning my own business.
As of right now I have been using my own money to fund the set up and production for Abstracted Reverie.  This campaign will give me the opportunity to invest in my business in a bigger way and help me reach my goals quicker.

What We Need & What You Get
Now let's get down to the brass tacks.
I am asking for $20,000 and this is what I am going to use it for.

Inventory!  This has been a huge pain point for me.  I have only been able to invest in small amounts of inventory at a time, leaving some customers to wait a long time to receive their orders.  My priority is customer satisfaction and the first step for this in my mind is to invest in inventory.
Website!  I currently have a functioning website but it's limited.  I would like to hire a professional to upgrade it and make it more user friendly.
Marketing! I have a lot of ideas for social media and e-mail marketing campaigns which will require photographers/videographers. I also have a list of stylists and influencers that I would like to work with that will require an investment in more product.
Future Collections!  My ideas for new pieces are never ending.  The problem with this is that starting a new collection requires the most monetary investment.  Having a cushion to develop new product will give me the opportunity to expand my line and attract new customers.
Emergency Fund!  I have encountered many road blocks the last three years, especially this last year.  These road blocks has required me to spend money when I wasn't expecting to.  I want to create a safety net for myself just in case I have more road blocks in the future.

What will you get when you contribute?

A huge thank you!  Any help that I am given will be received with immense gratitude
Product! If you donate within certain price brackets I will send you some of my existing designs and maybe some new items that aren't being sold yet

What if I don't reach my goal?
If I don't reach the $20,000 my first priority are my customers. 
I would take whatever money I do get and invest in inventory. 
If I have money left over I will throw everything into marketing, getting influencers on my team and produce more campaigns to attract a larger customer base that will translate to more sales.
My Intent
Jewelry for me is a universal wearable art that any human can invest in.  It transcends gender, skin color, weight and ethnicity.  It is an investment product, something that you can have forever and possibly pass down to future generations.  What you wear is your 'Hello' to the world but your jewelry is what sets you apart from the masses.
In this world of fast fashion we have lost site of what style and quality products are.  We waste our money on cheap product that falls apart and eventually is thrown away.  
My intention with Abstracted Reverie is to change the narrative.  Provide a high quality, unique product that is affordable.  When we move away from shopping at conglomerates in the spirit of convenience and put our money towards companies that care about their product, their customers and our environment we will change the way the fashion industry functions. 

Risks & Challenges
Starting a business at all is a huge risk especially in fashion during a pandemic.  I believe my passion, experience and vision will set me apart and make this company a unique investment.  I am committed to making this my future and I am confident it will be successful.
For me as an artist I take challenges and use them as lessons.  I welcome them, the only way we learn is if we encounter these challenges and I have the right attitude and mind set to get through whatever is thrown my way.

Other Ways You Can Help
Money isn't everything!  Can't donate at the moment?
Spread the word!  Social media platforms are free marketing tools that everyone can use.  Probably the biggest help a small business can ask for besides buying product and donating money is supporting us through word of mouth.
So follow me on Facebook and Instagram, share my posts, share my campaign.  The more eyes I can get on this the greater chance I will have to succeed!

story:
moxie+verve:

moxie and verve is a sensible luxury travel & organization essentials company. We make products that enable and empower women to relentlessly pursue their life's passions. This campaign is to help fund the production of our luxury leather functional backpack, Francisco, and its coordinating accessories. Follow us on instagram.com/moxie.verve or Facebook!

francisco:

Francisco's thoughtful design details include:

  • Premium top-grain leather exterior
  • Deluxe water-resistant nylon interior
  • A trolley sleeve for travelers
  • A padded sleeve for laptops/technology
  • A back pocket that fits a smart tablet, book, or changing pad
  • Comfortable straps
  • Plenty of pockets!
  • Side pockets that stretch to fit 32oz bottles
  • An insulated compartment at the bottom of the bag that fits shoes, snacks, your camera, or your breast pump; you name it!

the story:

I'm Kat, and I created moxie+verve after years of struggling to find my self-identity in the face of motherhood. Despite the chaos of life, I persist with moxie and verve, and I hope you will too!

  1. moxie: determination, grit. 
  2. verve: life, energy. 

I’ve been the student, young professional, the stay-at-home mom, and working mom. Through each stage of life, particularly motherhood, I found myself questioning why there wasn’t any bag on the market that helped me feel organized *and* stylish. I started using baby bags as my work bag long before I had kids because they had the best organizers, but I wanted a bag that didn’t scream “LOOK AT ME! I’M A MOM!” when I used it.

I needed 'the perfect everything bag' that could take me from weekends at Legoland, to the office, to lunch with friends in a snap. I needed a bag that was comfortable, durable, reliable, and made me feel like buying it was my own form of self-care. Necessity really is the mother of invention. I set out to create Francisco, designed with the working mother in mind. A bag to help any person using it feel beautiful, organized, and empowered to fearlessly take on life’s challenges.

I can’t wait to introduce you to the products and see what you think! Please join our newsletter at moxieverve.com for the latest updates, or feel free to shoot me an email at hello@moxieverve.com if you have more questions!

investment + reward:

In order to put Francisco and its accessories into production, I will need *your* help! By pitching in to the various perks I offer, I'll be able to produce and ship out your new leather bag to you and all other investors! Here are some of the options you have to contribute:

  • Francisco: The perfect everything bag leather backpack. You get to pick the color (Arequipe Brown or Whipped Pink) and get a killer discount!
  • Bulk Orders: Get some friends together and buy several at once for the best discount!
  • Accessories: Maybe you don't want or need the bag, but want to help. The leather changing pad and stroller straps are the way to go!
  • Donations: If you love a good underdog story and want to support my vision, I will accept any donation you are willing to give! 

If you'd like to make payments using PayPal Credit, you can always check out on my website moxieverve.com where I will reflect the same savings you get here!

no investment + reward:

Times are tough right now, so I understand if you can't contribute by buying a perk, but there are other ways you can help:

  • Post the link on your social media channels!
  • Comment, like, save, and share the moxie+verve social media!
  • Send the link to friends you think might be interested!
  • Ask your friends to get the word out!
  • Send me words of encouragement and support!

challenges:

Timing is everything with this campaign. Although I'd love to get your bag to you ASAP, I do need to wait for manufacturing to complete the pieces before I can ship them out. I will update you every step of the way to make sure you all know where your investments are! I appreciate your trust in my vision and hope to keep it with my transparency. If there are any unanticipated delays to the manufacturing process I will let you know immediately.

thank you so much! 

    Thank you so much for being here! You are amazing!

    xo,

    Kat

story:
DESIGN CONCEPT

Not everyone is striving for a breakthrough in the world of design. For words merely words; to breakthrough requires actions. You need not only 100% of hard work to breakthrough; But you need to devote much more of your time, your vitality, and your finance. Not everyone can accept products that are made outside of the box. But consider this: how can we human beings improve if “outside the box” designs had never existed?

I am JASON(Bios below), a designer who refuses to remain still. Our production line is incomparable with other normal brands; our’s costs money and time. Every part of every watch I designed are made unique, they are specially modelled and manufactured. For I used zero pre-made parts in my watch makings.

This is what innovation is about; this is art. And today, I wish to share my work with you all:

Introducing JW-EX - The Exaggeration

 

JW-EX is a new beginning; marks a new direction for JW. My first impression of this electronic world is dull; as if we’re missing the mechanics. We who love mechanical watches adore the sensation of metal; the sound of machines running; the excitement of wheels clashing with each other. And so, I thought of Steampunk. Yet you would ask: is this watch really representing steampunk? The answer is no; it is a representation of Future Steampunk. 

It may look ridiculous after infusing German’s simple steampunk into the watch, but please look at the result: Such a unique design! The straight lines bring steampunk a sense of futurism, a sense that breaks through the frame of the current generation of watches. It would feel like you’re wearing a robot from the future when you wear JW-EX on your wrist.

 

ABOUT JW WATCH

JW watch is a watch company founded by Jason Chan (myself) and William Shum from Hong Kong, aiming to create valuable innovative watches with excellent craftsmanship that can be savored by everyone, especially watch lovers. 

William has shareholdings in the watch factory and is one of the founders of JW watch. Our factory has more than 30 years of experience in producing mechanical watch movements for SWISS brands. All of our movements are supplied from our in-house factory which guarantees the best quality in movements, stability, and finishing.

*From our finished product JW-01, you can see our persistence in our work. You can also review the Backers' approval and enjoyment of JW-01. 

Feel free to click the LINK below for more details:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jasonwatch/jw-mechanical-designer-watch-jw-01

 

TIME-TELLING and all the sapphire crystal

It is always odd telling the time when it comes to JW watches. But when you look closer, the “red” on JW watches tells the time. I specifically placed the most important time telling part - the minutes - onto the top of the watch. Now you can tell the minutes at a glance, like the indication on an old steam engine. 

On the right side of the watch, there is a rectangular sapphire crystal. And within it there lies a red triangular pointer, indicated as “Hour". In this window, you can see the mainspring clearly. When you wind the watch, the mainspring will contract, storing up the energy of 80 hours power reserve.

On the left side of the watch, there is a circular sapphire crystal. And within it, there is a rotating circular plate; that is the “Second”. At the same time, you may see a heart-beating like balance wheel underneath the plate. This is possibly the most beloved part of the watch to many watch lovers. 

Underneath the watch lies an extra crown for winding the watch, which provides comfortability to users. This watch obtains an automatic winding; even if you leave your watch untouched the whole weekend, your 80 hours power reserve watch would be still ticking. 

 

IN-HOUSE MOVEMENT

As my co-founder William manages the factory, we can guarantee the best quality movements used in JW watch.

JW-EX watch is powered by an all-new skeleton developed movement called JW-7100, it is approved and loved by many JW-01 backers. JW-7100 functions with a frequency of 4Hz (28,800 A/h), 21 jewels, automatic winding, a sweep second movement, and “Caliber: 173” (173 parts). Functionally, the movement provides up to 80 hours (3 days+) of power-reserve via a single barrel system along with its effective bi-directional winding rotor. It will be difficult, if not impossible, to find a watch with such finely polished movement at this price.

 

CASE WITH MULTI-POLISHING

One of the attractions of this watch is the high-quality watch case.

As you can see, there are different cuttings and different polishing in this case: Including vertical brushed, horizontal brushed and mirror finished. Each cutting angle is a process; one after another process is what makes this case worth the money. Every process needs a special set of polishing tools and needs to change the polishing angle each time. Thus, the labor cost of this case is high.

Besides using the 316L stainless steel, we have decided to use gunmetal plating for the sides of the three windows. Although different process raises up the labor costs, it heightens up the quality of the watch. And this is what we persist on – bringing the best onto your wrist.

Besides, we have put some thoughts on designing the case’s back as well.  I have spent much time on designing the back of the case to make it looks less bulky; it is a challenging task for a designer. A good designer does not only take notice in the design, but also at every angle. You can see that every angle is attractive in these pictures.

 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Before our final production, we have gone through various trials: using 3D printers to create many prototypes and inviting different volunteers to try wearing the watch. Our goal is to provide a comfortable wearing experience for all of you.

What we need is your support for our MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity); for this production it is 200. Since our funding goal is set higher than before, we do not want to give our second best to you; instead, we want to give you the best. Thus, we persist to create the prototype and present it to you all. Please continually give out your support!

 

FINE CRAFTED ITALIAN CALF LEATHER STRAP

Having an extraordinary and high-quality strap is very important for a watch. It is difficult to make a high-quality strap while maintaining an affordable price. It is, however, my duty to provide the best material for JW-EX. It is our pleasure to have a company that specially produces straps for Swiss Brands to help upgrade our straps. Although their price is higher than before and the MOQ(Minimum Order Quantity) is set higher, I think it is worth it. 

Hence, I bring you the finely crafted Italian Calf Leather with an interchangeable catch which allows you to change your strap conveniently without any special tool. 

There will be more straps for you to unlock in our stretch goal. Remember to invite your friends and family to support us! 

 

HORWEEN LEATHER FOR THE WILD STYLE

We have already added a new style - the Wild - into our selection and it is from an American leather producer which has more than 100 years heritage in hand-craft manufacturer technique. With its signature softness and uniqueness, it is the best strap we can choose from for you all!

 

HONG KONG WATCH FACTORY AND WARRANTY

We own a Hong Kong watch factory with watch masters performing quality checks and maintenance for our watches. The quality of JW watch is highly controlled and guaranteed. We will also provide a 1-year international warranty. We are also hoping to unlock our 2-year international warranty goal; however, we need your support to help us to reach all of our stretch goals!

 

TIME LINE

 

THE MODEL

 

HANDS-ON

 

ABOUT ME (JASON CHAN) :

I live in Hong Kong. I am a watch designer, a graphic designer, a photographer, a musician, and a tutor of a design class.

My award: The Hong Kong Exporters’ Association Smart Gift Design Awards 2016.

My previously designed watches:

Stellar Series Imperial: 2017 Hero product of Memorigin

Grand Series: 2016 Hero product of Memorigin.

Stellar Series: 2015 Hero product of Memorigin.

Avengers 2 Series: Memorigin crossover project with MARVEL.

I love designing watches because they are daily products that can show your lifestyle and personality. Also, they reflect your aesthetic sense and ultimately your philosophy. My aim is to make DESIGNER watches with high aesthetic sense. My ideal watch is innovative, beautifully crafted, has great prestige, and is affordable for everyone. I will be applying high-end watch materials (both side sapphire crystal, Italian Calf Leather, stainless steel 316L) and a technology learnt during my 7 years at a watch industry on JW watches.

PROMOTED BY

promoted by FUND STARTERPACK

story:
Clarifying note on pledges: Final color choices and a flat rate worldwide shipping of CA$15 will be collected after your pledge in a separate survey.

 

 

KLIK is the world’s smartest beauty system. Wherever you are, KLIK has everything you need and more. 

Whether you are a professional, a busy mom, a traveler, or just someone who is ready for a smarter way to organize makeup and beauty tools on the go - KLIK is for you. For the beauty aficionados and three-steppers alike, KLIK gives you the best tools to do your makeup, and do it well, anywhere. 

And with 13+ features KLIK is packed with cutting edge beauty tools and tricks - all in one small case!

 

So get rid of that messy Mary Poppins makeup bag. Forget about forgetting that one brush you need for a perfect cut crease. Stop carrying around 3 palettes with only one or two usable shades in each. Enough is enough!  

It’s time to revolutionize beauty routines everywhere. Join us and support KLIK today! 

 

 

KLIK has everything you need to do your makeup anywhere you are. In a KLIK you can find: eight modular brushes with patent pending smart, weighted handles and premium hairs, a universal magnetic palette, a hygienic brush drying rack, magnetic makeup stickies set, and an ultra-thin unbreakable mirror. Portable, customizable, and hygienic - KLIK has it all.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

No longer do you need to carry around multiple palettes with only a few usable shades in each! Our universal palette system allows you to customize all your makeup into the perfect palette for you. And trade them out whenever you please! 

 

 

It wasn’t enough for us to develop a more hygienic way to deep clean brushes. We are all busy people - so what happens when you need to use different products with the same brush on the go? Introducing the Magic Brush Cleaner. Saving KLIK users from mixing contour and highlighter since 2019.  

 

 

At KLIK, we have one question: How can we make beauty better? 

From ergonomics, to quality, to functionality, to portability—we’ve examined every aspect to revolutionize how we experience our beauty routines.

Whether you have to fit your life in a carry-on or a diaper bag, KLIK is the smartest beauty solution for you. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At KLIK, we are an international team of innovators spanning 5 continents and 6 nationalities, with a united goal in mind: making the smartest beauty system for beauty lovers on the go.  

 

 

 

Our manufacturers have already been chosen and we’ve already mapped out our supply chain. All that is left is to press “go” — and your thumbs up in confirming that yes, beauty lovers of today’s world WANT KLIK!  

 

 

 

Detailed Specifications

Case

  • Size: 15cm x 9cm x 2.2cm (5.9” x 3.5” x 0.85”)
  • Big mirror on the lid
  • Magnetic customizable palette
  • Magic brush cleaner & palette protector
  • 10 rectangle and 10 circle metal stickies for your favourite makeup pods

Drying Rack

  • Fits inside the organizer
  • Accommodates all 8 brushes

Brush Heads

  • 8 hair shapes inspired by the world’s most loved brushes
  • Premium synthetic bristles that mimic natural hairs
  • Aluminum magnetic ferrules

Brush Handle

  • High-quality ABS composite
  • 1 small handle
  • 1 big handle

story:
After more than 200.000 distributions worldwide of the original Silver Mask launched on Kickstarter in 2017, we decided to take it to the next level and create an ultimate premium mask by empowering protection, comfort and user experience.

Silver Mask 2 offers an advanced solution to the invisible, everyday encounters. The new and improved edition introduces exclusive and innovative features: Polygiene™ Treatment, an empowered replaceable filter with Anti-fog design, and an NFC Chip-connected app to monitor the Silver Mask 2 lifespan.

 

Silver Mask 2 provides four different levels of protection: Polygiene™ Treatment, a Silver embedded Layer, empowered replaceable Filter, and a hydro-repellent treatment. Check out all four levels of protection in-depth!

The outer cover has been treated with Polygiene™ Treatment, the latest in textile treatment technology.

The Polygiene™ Treatment resists up to 100 wash cycles.

 

The iconic Silver Layer (Ag) is now embedded in the inside of the outer cover. Silver works around the clock to keep the breathing environment healthy and neutralize bad odors.

It also allows moisture to easily evaporate and you can wash your cover whenever you want without compromising the silver function.

The built-in replaceable filter is composed of four different layers, each with a specific protective action.

Our empowered filters are the only ones on the market produced in Europe with premium materials that provide an extended lifespan (6-8 week average duration).

For any details about filtering and protective action, please comment or send a message to support@banale.com. 

With Silver Mask 2 you protect others too, thanks to a hydro-repellent treatment applied to the outer cover. This special treatment impedes any outgoing droplets coming out from the ventilation valve.

The valve is a very important feature in a face mask because it increases internal ventilation, reduces moisture and augments comfort. 

 

Protection matters but it’s nothing without comfort. Designing face masks since 2015, we know how important it is to supply our customers with something they can wear naturally and easily.

Thanks to the maximum comfort, the more you wear it, the safer you’ll be.

A removable foam buffer provides advanced comfort, adhering to any face shape. The unique design ensures an airtight seal that supports maximum filtering efficiency and enables a unique anti-fog defense system. 

To ensure optimal operation of the anti-fog design, the filter must be properly adjusted to adhere to the face.

In addition, we design a reflective band* that maximizes safety, especially for bikers. 

 *reflective band provided separately and mounted manually.

With its patented lace system, Silver Mask 2 offers versatility, maximizing personalized wear while rendering a stylish and convenient wear for active and inactive use. 

The lacing system allows for four different types of wear, ensuring maximum comfort suited for every type of wear, including with glasses and helmets.

With Silver Mask 2 one size fits all: pull the laces until the mask automatically adapts to any face. It will also fit with all different kinds of sunglasses and helmets.

Silver Mask 2 is the ultimate evolution of a design intended to get you comfortably covered in every aspect of your daily routine.

Its high standard of protection and comfort enables you to wear it while commuting, shopping, working and moving around in public spaces.

Silver Mask 2 is equipped with an advanced built-in NFC chip that enables tracking of the filter lifespan. Tap your mask to your smartphone by bringing the phone closer to the chip and beep: now the mask is connected!

The waterproof chip is seamlessly integrated into the mask, protecting it from unwarranted damages and frequent washings, maximizing hygiene and safety.

With the Banale web app you'll always be connected with your mask and can constantry monitor your filter lifespan. And refill filters are just one click away. 

The refill filters of Silver Mask 2 will always be available on BANALE.COM and the Banale web app, and are eligible for global shipment.

For 5 years we are committed to delivering refills and the spare parts to customers anywhere they need.

And with the new BANALE web app, ordering refill filters is easier, faster and more convenient.

Along with the Banale web app and Silver Mask 2, we are launching the Recycling Program, a new exclusive service by Banale.

Banale will collect the exhausted filters of your Silver Mask 2. Use the Banale web app to buy new filters and upon the delivery we’ll collect exhausted filters and recycle them correctly through our industrial partner BLS.

This new program is aimed to ensure the sustainability of your Silver Mask 2 and reduce the impact of replaceable filters on the environment.   

The washable cover can be hand or machine washed up to 60°, leaving you with a fresh and clean feeling.

It is recommended to let it dry in the open air and to avoid using an automatic dryer.

 

Silver Mask 2 comes equipped with a case, allowing safe storage of your mask and prolonging the filter lifespan during inactive use. 

Silver Mask 2 is state of the art in terms of protection. Get the most premium face mask on the market. Silver Mask 2 is the best in terms of comfort protection for you and those around you.

At this moment yo can preorder your favorite reward at a special price. Hurry up! If you’re interested in getting Earlybird offers, click on the button/pledge to choose the reward that best fits you!

To add more filters:

Click on “Manage your pledge”

Add the corresponding amount of the filter cost onto the total of “Your current pledge”

 Confirm your new total and keep the same reward option

Filters costs 5€, and filter lifespans average about 6/8 weeks depending on usage. 

Example: if your current pledge is 49€ for 1 Silver Mask 2 and you want 2 additional filters, add 10€ (5€x2) to your current 49€ pledge, for a total of 59€.

Silver Mask 2 is available in three different colors that fit perfectly with your style. 

Silver Mask 2 enables many customizations whether you’re a team or an individual looking to wear something truly unique. At Banale we gladly provide this customization service on request. 

Choose the "Team pledge" to have Silver Mask 2 customized.

The five-year journey until the arrival of Silver Mask 2 enabled us to challenge the design world, creating innovative solutions to maximize safety, hygiene and style.

A special thanks to all our passionate customers around the world that continue to support our research and development by sharing their feedback and amazing ideas, empowering us to continue our mission of providing everyday products that solve everyday problems. 

Silver Mask 2 is the result of years of designing lasting products made from quality material. With more than five years of mask design experience, we know how much the little details matter on an everyday basis. With evolutionary design and innovation behind Silver Mask 2, it offers an everyday solution to your everyday routine.

Given the materials we have chosen, with Silver Mask 2 you'll never worry about your voice. We optimized sound engineering to allow for effortless breathability and clear sound while speaking, unlike traditional face masks.

Silver Mask 2 is entirely designed and manufactured in Italy.

Thanks to our 5-year partnership with BLS Group, a 40-year-old top global player in the respiratory system market, we've been able to constantly improve the technological assets and develop the design features of Silver Mask 2. 

Environmental and reusable product design is part of our DNA. That’s why we create quality products that not only last, but that offer a design you won’t get tired of. 

With Silver Mask 2 you can look and feel good, simultaneously doing your part to minimize excess waste created by disposable masks. The environmentally friendly and replaceable filter combo offers a design that lasts for all your daily needs.

 

Silver Mask 2 and its multi-layer filter technology is tested at the BLS GROUP laboratory, one of the world’s most advanced filter laboratories. 

To access the lab test report, please comment or send a message to support@banale.com. 

people around the world

 BANALE is an Italian word that means common, ordinary, not original.

We chose this word as a brand name in 2015 because it represented the opposite of the products that we wanted to design.

Unique and useful accessories that help you make it through daily commuting and long traveling more easily and safely.

At BANALE, we design creative accessories for urban nomads and frequent travelers, with a unique focus on the design and engineering of our Masks. 

Our team is made of different people with a common view: make the ordinary extraordinary with everyday objects.

For any further information about the product and the campaign, please contact us at support@banale.com

story:
Short Summary 

Hi! I'm Sherin Rashad and the founder of Frogami! I have always used my creativity and love of origami to craft intricate, handmade jewelry. My first collection was based on the origami frog - and that's what we are providing to our indiegogo supporters!

Frogami is more than just a fashionable accessory - it's about helping save a variety of species of frogs that inhabit our world from extinction, from the Kihansi Spray Toad to the Corrobboree. Frogs play a vital role in our ecosystem by eating up mosquitos that spread disease and providing a food source to a variety of animals. They also produce chemicals that are the topic of lots of medical research!  

Our goal is to make beautiful jewelry and help save a species! 

What We Need & What You Get

WE set a goal of $1700  to fund the following: 

  • Basic website setup and maintenance ($360)
  • Manufacturing costs/supplies ($140)
  • Postage and packaging ($700) - we ship internationally!
  • Wildlife preservation donation of our choice ($500)
YOU get to choose your own pair of Frogami earrings from our first collection: The Blue-Dipped Dango and the Red-Dipped Skipper. Each pair of earrings:
  • are hand-made and hand-painted 
  • use non-leaded and non-toxic paint 
  • are made from recycled paper
  • come with silver or gold plated earring hooks (lead- and nickel-free)
  • come in a 6.5 x 6.5 x 2.3 cm earring box 

In ADDITION, we are giving away a FREE Indiegogo Pink Frogami with every "Red Earrings" or "Blue Earrings" reward. 


Little bit more about me:

I am a 2nd year dental student at King's College London. The concept of Frogami was invented when I gifted my best-friend a pair for her high school graduation. Since then, I have been designing and crafting handmade jewelry to go with my every outfit. Raising money for our environment helps gives me purpose and a goal to reach - I love to work hard to achieve them! 


Risks & Challenges

Challenges include:

  • Manufacturing these highly intricate jewelry pieces
  • Sharing the mission with all the fashion- and animal-lovers out there
  • Providing efficient customer support - we want to make SURE that you are satisfied with Frogami's efforts

Other Ways You Can Help

If this isn't your thing then don't worry! Sharing my facebook page, this campaign, tweeting about Frogami, and following us on instagram @frogami.jewelry can help a lot and will be much appreciated!

story:
GREETINGS FROM KANABIS 

Thanks for checking us out. We've been hard at work building our dream into reality. 

India alone produces 1 BILLION pairs of leather shoes every year, which requires slaughtering of 50 MILLION cows - just so people can wear shoes! 

As an animal lover, I gave up leather few years ago. It ached my heart when I learned how leather is made. In India, it is ILLEGAL to KILL healthy young cattle but they are beaten, deprived of food and water, dehorned, transported in appalling conditions and tortured with iron rods.  

It is easy to find great non-leather options for handbags, belts, jackets but we found it impossible to find stylish yet affordable non-leather shoes- they were either super expensive or inferior quality.

We set out to solve this problem by creating shoes which would be stylish, affordable and animal friendly. Our initial focus is on women's footwear, with aspirations to expand to mens and kids in the near term.  

My name is Devika Srimal. I'm a Cross-Continent MBA student at Duke University and the founder of KANABIS. 


Why Kanabis (aka marijuana) ??

Our core animal friendly substitute for leather is canvas. 

Historically canvas was made from hemp, which came from cannabis plant. Kanabis is a play on the word Cannabis and lends itself well to our canvas products. 


What do we stand for ??


Our Vision



Spring/Summer 2015 - sneak peak...

   

                       Love Triangles                                                   Cherry Blush                            

       

             Li'l Miss Lacy                         Dance the Polka                   Jute Meets Lace            


What makes Kanabis...smoking?! 

  • Shoe story, true story - each shoe has been exclusively designed and has a story to tell.  To give an example, there's an old grandma saying - "Opposite attract". We tried that theory on our shoes- picked the rough jute and delicate lace and we got one good looking team- Jute Meets Lace (pictured above)
  • Comfort- All our shoes have 

    • Insole cushion  

    • Durable outsole    

    • Open toe feature for the hot climate  

    • Painless heels 

  • Price- sits well with the emerging upper middle class in India 

  • High quality- all our materials have been hand picked to create 

    a careful mix of fabrics for the right look and comfort, keeping compassion for animals as a core value of the business.


Impressed yet? 

We need YOUR HELP to expand our product offering to include men and children.

We want to build a solid team and hire specialists for merchandising, sales and marketing. 

And we aspire to have a global outreach by next year.

It’s not all about the money. Little things such as a shout out on social media (Twitter, Instagram- ‘kanabis.in’, Facebook) go a long way. If you like us please find, follow and send us your feedback. We would love to hear from you!

With your support, fashion can now be animal-friendly !

• Painless
heels 





Price-
sits well with the emerging upper middle class in India 



High quality- all our materials have been hand picked to create 

a careful mix of fabrics for the right look and comfort, keeping compassion for animals as a core value
of the business.





Impressed yet? 




We need YOUR HELP to expand our product offering to include men and children. 



We want to build a solid team and hire specialists for merchandising, sales and marketing. 
And we aspire to have a global outreach by next year.

It’s not all
about the money. Little things such as a shout out on social media (Twitter,
Instagram- ‘kanabis.in’, Facebook) go a long way. If you like us please find, follow and send us your
feedback. We would love to hear from you! 
With your
support, fashion can now be animal-friendly !

story:
Our project is not only to produce a collection of Intimate Toys, by adding innovation to chic and elegant material and design, our Love Toys are connected.To achieve the target of our project, we need you.If we have tickled your curiosity, please follow us for more information.

 English

Our needs :

To realize this project we need to raise € 60,000. The simple reason why we need this amount is because banks do not support finance for a project which touches closely or indirectly to eroticism. If the amount we require is not reached, it is not the end of our project. We will use a part of the funds  to begin the production of our products and subsequently present them at the various planned exhibitions such as the AAE in Macao and the AVN in Las Vegas, both of which are the most popular at the moment.

How we will use your contributions :

A big part of the amount will be for development of the electronic parts for our products, the creation of the application which will be for used as the interface and to create our website : €29,500.

The production of 16 prototypes (prototyping + realization) :  €16,000.

Material investment (3D Printer) :  €2,800.


The impact :


Perhaps your curiosity urges you to know who behind this project; we are a balanced team, where everyone has found his place. 

- Sébastien, our creative consultant, works on the conception of designs of our products and the visual identity of our brand.

- Roland, is the jewellery setter by profession, he brings his expertise in this art craft, he has previously worked for famous brand of French and Japanese jewellery.

- Morgan, got his savoir-faire from his experiences in the sector of hotels and catering industry, he leads the marketing, the management and also public and customer relations.

We are the base of this project, working in close collaboration for three years as a  functional trio.
Since October 2011, we have conducted research and documentation to develop quality products, design and high quality finish. We aim to bring jewellery into another dimension.


Our manufacturing process and accessories are completely safe and are in accordance with the European standards, allowing us to guarantee total reliability of our products. 




We use the latest technology (3D Software, 3D printing, setting binocular microscope, laser engraving). 


We have developed a remote interaction system on the object, using a Smartphone application which allows the user to act on the remote accessory.
Opening number of possibilities, for example : your partner is on business trip to New York and he/she misses you... You just need to send a notification to him/her  and your companion takes things in hand ! So you can keep in touch through this little erotic game. Almost 78% of women admit using a Sex Toy to spice up a relationship.

The USB charging is an integral part of the services and products offered by our concept, but also other technological advantages we will reveal later.

Our intimate jewels are customizable. Through used metals and our jewellery setting techniques (text or patterns), everything is possible, the only limit is your imagination.

Implementing objects of such value involve the creation of jewellery case with upscale setting.

In the same notion, to design our products with high technologies, our accessories are presented to you in their package and provided with a padded velvet, thermo-moulded base including the stand charger, in accordance with our quality requirements.


Your compensations :

To reward you in exchange for your donation, we chose to create discrete jewellery in the image of our brand; these include bracelets, earrings and necklaces. In the case that of a contribution to our project being made by a gentleman, we are sure you will find someone to offer this to as a gift. We cannot forget the origin of our project you will find accompanied with your rewards, condoms and lubricant,     generously offered by our partner “GLIX” who have contributed in their way to our project. We thank them for their support.


The little preview of  our upcoming events are in this calendar as below:



In conclusion, if our project has created some excitement in you or your close relations, but you cannot contribute financially, we just ask you to kindly share our link and convince your friends to do it at a maximum, this shows your input to our project moves it forward a little bit more and just for this,we are thankfull.



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Francais

Notre projet n'est pas seulement de produire une collection de Jouets intimes, raffinés et élégants,
 de part les matériaux employés et leurs designs, mais aussi innovants, par leurs interface d’utilisation. Nos Love Toys sont connectés.
Mais pour concrétiser notre projet nous avons besoin de vous. Si nous avons excité votre curiosité, suivez nous pour en savoir plus.


Nos Besoins:

Afin de réaliser ce projet nous avons besoin d’une somme conséquente 60 000 €. Pourquoi, pour la simple raison que les Banques ne financent pas ce qui touche de près ou de loin à l’érotisme. Si le montant de nos besoins n’est pas atteint ce n’est pas la mort de notre projet, il nous faut néanmoins une certaine somme afin de pouvoir commencer la production de nos produits, et par la suite les exposer dans les différents salons prévus tels que l’AAE à Macao et l’AVN de Las Vegas, les deux plus en vogue à l’heure actuelle. 

A quoi serviront vos contributions :

Une grande partie ira dans le développement de la partie électronique de nos produits, dont la création de l’application qui servira d’interface et de notre site internet : 29 500 €.

La production des 16 prototypes (prototypage + réalisation) : 16 000 €.

Investissement matériel (imprimante 3D) : 2 800 €.

Production des contreparties : 4 500 €.

 Frais de la plateforme : 7 200 €.


L’impact :


Peut-être votre curiosité vous pousse à savoir qui se cache derrière ce projet.
Nous sommes une équipe équilibrée, où chacun a su trouver sa place.

- Sébastien, notre consultant créatif, travaille à la conception des différents designs de nos produits et à l’identité visuel de notre marque.

- Roland, bijoutier sertisseur de métier, apporte son expertise dans ce domaine, ayant travaillé et sous-traité pour les plus grande marques de la joaillerie française et japonaise.

- Morgan, tire son savoir faire de son expérience en tant que directeur dans l’hôtellerie et restauration, assumant la partie marketing, management, relations publiques et toujours à votre écoute.

Ce sont les fondateurs de ce projet, travaillant en étroite collaboration depuis trois ans, c'est un trio qui fonctionne.   

Depuis octobre 2011, nous avons effectué un travail de recherche et de documentation pour développer des produits  de qualité, design et de haute  finition. Nous avons pour objectifs d’amener la joaillerie dans une autre dimension.



Nos process de fabrication, en accord avec les normes en vigueur, nous permettent de garantir la totale fiabilité de nos produits. Les accessoires sont normé et entièrement sûrs.


Nous utilisons les dernières avancées technologiques (logiciel informatique 3D, sertissage binoculaire, gravure laser).

Nous développons un système d’interaction à distance sur l’objet, via une application Smartphone qui permet d’interagir sur l’accessoire à distance.
Cela ouvre de nombreuses possibilités, petit exemple concret : votre partenaire est en déplacement professionnel à New York et il vous manque... Il vous suffit de lui envoyer une notification, à l'aide de l'application, et votre compagnon de plaisir prend les choses en main, ou plutôt le contrôle de votre accessoire,  ainsi, vous gardez le contact au travers de ce support de jeu érotique à distance. 78% des femmes avoues utiliser un Sex Toy pour pimenter leur rapports.


La recharge USB fait partie intégrante des services et produits de notre concept, mais possède également d’autres atouts technologiques que nous vous révélerons ultérieurement.

Nos bijoux intimes sont personnalisable à volonté. Que ce soit au travers des métaux employés ou des techniques comme l’enchâssement des pierres précieuses (textes ou motifs) tout est possible, la limite n'étant que votre imagination.

Concevoir des objets d’une telle valeur implique de créer également leur écrin haut de gamme.


Dans la même idée de développer nos produits avec des technologies de pointe, nos accessoires sont proposés dans leur coffret muni d’un intérieur en velours capitonné avec un socle thermo-moulé qui joue le rôle de base de chargement, dans la continuité de notre exigence de qualité.

Vos contreparties :

Pour vous récompensez en échange de vos dons, nous avons fait le choix de créer des bijoux discrets à l’effigie de notre marque. Que ce soit le bracelet, les boucles d’oreille ou le collier, ils se portent en toutes circonstances et si Monsieur a contribué à notre projet, nous sommes sûres qu’il trouvera à qui l’offrir.
Ces contreparties sont accompagnées en plus de préservatifs avec lubrifiant au format innovant généreusement offerts par notre partenaire "GLIX", qui a contribué à sa manière à notre projet. Nous les remercions de ce coup de pouce.



Pour que vous ayez un petit aperçu des événements à venir voici ce petit calendrier des faits majeurs à suivre :




En conclusion, si notre projet a su créer un certain enthousiasme chez vous ou vos proches,
mais que vous ne pouvez y contribuer financièrement, il suffit de partager notre lien et inciter vos proches à le faire au maximum,
ainsi vous contribuez à ce que notre projet avance un peu plus et rien que pour cela
nous vous remercions.

story:
The Movement

 

 

Every​​ ​​child​​ ​​has​​ ​​a​​ ​​dream.​​ ​​Every​​ ​​professional​​ ​​athlete,​​ ​​artist,​​ ​​and​​ ​​musician​​ ​​started somewhere.​​ ​​But​​ ​​for​​ ​​some​​ ​​parents,​​ ​​the​​ ​​cost​​ ​​is​​ ​​too​​ ​​high​​ ​​to​​ ​​put​​ ​​their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​in​​ ​​programs​​ ​​that would​​ ​​help​​ ​​them​​ ​​reach​​ ​​their​​ ​​full​​ ​​potential.​​ ​​After​​ ​​school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​are​​ ​​expensive,​​ ​​and unfortunately​​ ​​thousands​​ ​​of​​ ​​families​​ ​​around​​ ​​the​​ ​​country​​ ​​don’t​​ ​​have​​ ​​the​​ ​​resources​​ ​​to​​ ​​put their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​through​​ ​​these​​ ​​programs.

ReCreation​​ ​​is​​ ​​a​​ ​​clothing​​ ​​brand​​ ​​with​​ ​​a​​ ​​purpose.​​ ​​We​​ ​​will​​ ​​give​​ ​​a​​ ​​portion​​ ​​of​​ ​​the​​ ​​proceeds​​ ​​to help​​ ​​fund​​ ​​after-school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​for​​ ​​underprivileged​​ ​​kids.​ ​Profits​ ​will​ ​go​ ​to​ ​programs, courses,​ ​classes,​ ​sports​ ​equipment,​ ​art​ ​supplies,​ ​instruments,​ ​and​ ​all​ ​other​ ​necessities for​ ​underprivileged​ ​children.

Motivated​ ​and​ ​inspired​ ​children​ ​are​ ​happy​ ​children.​ ​With​ ​your​ ​contribution​ ​and​ ​support, ReCreation​ ​will​ ​fully​ ​develop​ ​the​ ​brand​ ​and​ ​produce​ ​goods​ ​and​ ​products​ ​to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​in retail.


Short Summary

 

 

My​ ​name​ ​is​ ​Bret​ ​Young​ ​-​ ​I​ ​am​ ​a​ ​fashion​ ​designer​ ​and​ ​consultant​ ​by​ ​day.​ ​Most importantly,​ ​however,​ ​I​ ​am​ ​the​ ​father​ ​of​ ​three​ ​amazing​ ​children.​ ​I​ ​know​ ​first​ ​hand​ ​how difficult​ ​it​ ​is​ ​to​ ​raise​ ​children​ ​while​ ​giving​ ​them​ ​all​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​need​ ​to​ ​thrive and​ ​excel​ ​outside​ ​of​ ​the​ ​classroom.

In​ ​today’s​ ​world,​ ​too​ ​many​ ​kids​ ​do​ ​not​ ​get​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​explore​ ​their true​ ​passions.​ ​Many​ ​extremely​ ​talented​ ​and​ ​gifted​ ​children​ ​miss​ ​out​ ​on​ ​their​ ​chance​ ​to enhance​ ​their​ ​capabilities​ ​due​ ​to​ ​their​ ​lack​ ​of​ ​resources.

ReCreation​ ​wants​ ​to​ ​be​ ​the​ ​change,​ ​and​ ​help​ ​as​ ​many​ ​underprivileged​ ​children​ ​as possible.​ ​I​ ​want​ ​to​ ​give​ ​them​ ​the​ ​chance​ ​that​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​shine.​ ​Through​ ​this campaign,​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand​ ​will​ ​help​ ​build​ ​a​ ​better​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​children.​ ​Let’s inspire​ ​more​ ​children​ ​to​ ​follow​ ​their​ ​dreams!

 

How You Can Help

 

The​ ​Recreation​ ​team​ ​needs​ ​to​ ​raise​ ​$40,000​ ​to​ ​begin​ ​production​ ​on​ ​the​ ​first​ ​collection to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​online​ ​and​ ​at​ ​retail.​ ​With​ ​this​ ​money,​ ​we​ ​will​ ​also​ ​be​ ​able​ ​to​ ​fulfill​ ​contributor perks!​ ​After​ ​that,​ ​50%​ ​of​ ​the​ ​remaining​ ​funds​ ​will​ ​be​ ​given​ ​to​ ​our​ ​first​ ​charity​ ​project.

As​ ​a​ ​contributor,​ ​you​ ​will​ ​receive​ ​the​ ​first​ ​production​ ​of​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand’s​ ​product! YOU​ ​will​ ​launch​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​-​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​of​ ​educating,​ ​inspiring,​ ​and​ ​building​ ​a greater​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​society.

Contributors​ ​will​ ​receive​ ​their​ ​perks​ ​or​ ​products​ ​by​ ​Feb​ ​28​ ​-​ ​Mar.​ ​15​ ​of​ ​2018.

 

What You Get

 

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

                                          

 

 

Partners & Fund Raising

 

We are lucky to be working with some amazing organizations, to help raise money for their scholarship programs.Our first campaign will help fund the following programs and orginizations. Pateadores Soccer Club, The Kids Art School, Drawn 2 Art, Bright Artists and Dramaworks. 

http://www.pateadores.org

http://www.kidsartclasses.com

http://www.dramasue.com

http://www.brightartists.org

 

 

Partnering with some of the best contractors in L.A.

  

http://www.tagtimeusa.com

http://www.headcasela.com

http://www.impactmfginc.com

 

Risks and Challenges

 

 

We've put together a strong supply chain, from the materials suppliers to manufacturers to shipping and fulfillment partners, and have full confidence that we can deliver product you’ll be proud to own for years to come.

Once our campaign is completed and funded, we are ready to go straight into purchasing all the materials from our suppliers and then into production with our manufacturer. We will keep our backers updated throughout the process of the campaign and production to ensure that we deliver on time.

A note on delivery date: As with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery.

 

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED

 

 

We are so confident you’ll love our product and cause that we guarantee it! When you receive your perk, if you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable). We’re pretty sure you’ll be more excited to show or wear your support than return it though!

 

Meet The Team

 

Bret A. Young

CEO / Creator

                                                                                     

Chase J. Carnahan

Writer / Director

Royal T. Binion

Photographer

Michael Perlmutter

Digital Content

 

 

And that’s all there is to it.
story_txt:
The Movement  Every​​ ​​child​​ ​​has​​ ​​a​​ ​​dream.​​ ​​Every​​ ​​professional​​ ​​athlete,​​ ​​artist,​​ ​​and​​ ​​musician​​ ​​started somewhere.​​ ​​But​​ ​​for​​ ​​some​​ ​​parents,​​ ​​the​​ ​​cost​​ ​​is​​ ​​too​​ ​​high​​ ​​to​​ ​​put​​ ​​their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​in​​ ​​programs​​ ​​that would​​ ​​help​​ ​​them​​ ​​reach​​ ​​their​​ ​​full​​ ​​potential.​​ ​​After​​ ​​school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​are​​ ​​expensive,​​ ​​and unfortunately​​ ​​thousands​​ ​​of​​ ​​families​​ ​​around​​ ​​the​​ ​​country​​ ​​don’t​​ ​​have​​ ​​the​​ ​​resources​​ ​​to​​ ​​put their​​ ​​kids​​ ​​through​​ ​​these​​ ​​programs.ReCreation​​ ​​is​​ ​​a​​ ​​clothing​​ ​​brand​​ ​​with​​ ​​a​​ ​​purpose.​​ ​​We​​ ​​will​​ ​​give​​ ​​a​​ ​​portion​​ ​​of​​ ​​the​​ ​​proceeds​​ ​​to help​​ ​​fund​​ ​​after-school​​ ​​programs​​ ​​for​​ ​​underprivileged​​ ​​kids.​ ​Profits​ ​will​ ​go​ ​to​ ​programs, courses,​ ​classes,​ ​sports​ ​equipment,​ ​art​ ​supplies,​ ​instruments,​ ​and​ ​all​ ​other​ ​necessities for​ ​underprivileged​ ​children.Motivated​ ​and​ ​inspired​ ​children​ ​are​ ​happy​ ​children.​ ​With​ ​your​ ​contribution​ ​and​ ​support, ReCreation​ ​will​ ​fully​ ​develop​ ​the​ ​brand​ ​and​ ​produce​ ​goods​ ​and​ ​products​ ​to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​in retail.
Short Summary  My​ ​name​ ​is​ ​Bret​ ​Young​ ​-​ ​I​ ​am​ ​a​ ​fashion​ ​designer​ ​and​ ​consultant​ ​by​ ​day.​ ​Most importantly,​ ​however,​ ​I​ ​am​ ​the​ ​father​ ​of​ ​three​ ​amazing​ ​children.​ ​I​ ​know​ ​first​ ​hand​ ​how difficult​ ​it​ ​is​ ​to​ ​raise​ ​children​ ​while​ ​giving​ ​them​ ​all​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​need​ ​to​ ​thrive and​ ​excel​ ​outside​ ​of​ ​the​ ​classroom.In​ ​today’s​ ​world,​ ​too​ ​many​ ​kids​ ​do​ ​not​ ​get​ ​the​ ​opportunities​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​explore​ ​their true​ ​passions.​ ​Many​ ​extremely​ ​talented​ ​and​ ​gifted​ ​children​ ​miss​ ​out​ ​on​ ​their​ ​chance​ ​to enhance​ ​their​ ​capabilities​ ​due​ ​to​ ​their​ ​lack​ ​of​ ​resources.ReCreation​ ​wants​ ​to​ ​be​ ​the​ ​change,​ ​and​ ​help​ ​as​ ​many​ ​underprivileged​ ​children​ ​as possible.​ ​I​ ​want​ ​to​ ​give​ ​them​ ​the​ ​chance​ ​that​ ​they​ ​deserve​ ​to​ ​shine.​ ​Through​ ​this campaign,​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand​ ​will​ ​help​ ​build​ ​a​ ​better​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​children.​ ​Let’s inspire​ ​more​ ​children​ ​to​ ​follow​ ​their​ ​dreams! How You Can Help The​ ​Recreation​ ​team​ ​needs​ ​to​ ​raise​ ​$40,000​ ​to​ ​begin​ ​production​ ​on​ ​the​ ​first​ ​collection to​ ​be​ ​sold​ ​online​ ​and​ ​at​ ​retail.​ ​With​ ​this​ ​money,​ ​we​ ​will​ ​also​ ​be​ ​able​ ​to​ ​fulfill​ ​contributor perks!​ ​After​ ​that,​ ​50%​ ​of​ ​the​ ​remaining​ ​funds​ ​will​ ​be​ ​given​ ​to​ ​our​ ​first​ ​charity​ ​project.As​ ​a​ ​contributor,​ ​you​ ​will​ ​receive​ ​the​ ​first​ ​production​ ​of​ ​the​ ​ReCreation​ ​brand’s​ ​product! YOU​ ​will​ ​launch​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​-​ ​the​ ​movement​ ​of​ ​educating,​ ​inspiring,​ ​and​ ​building​ ​a greater​ ​future​ ​for​ ​our​ ​society.Contributors​ ​will​ ​receive​ ​their​ ​perks​ ​or​ ​products​ ​by​ ​Feb​ ​28​ ​-​ ​Mar.​ ​15​ ​of​ ​2018. What You Get                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Partners & Fund Raising We are lucky to be working with some amazing organizations, to help raise money for their scholarship programs.Our first campaign will help fund the following programs and orginizations. Pateadores Soccer Club, The Kids Art School, Drawn 2 Art, Bright Artists and Dramaworks. http://www.pateadores.orghttp://www.kidsartclasses.comhttp://www.dramasue.comhttp://www.brightartists.org  Partnering with some of the best contractors in L.A.  http://www.tagtimeusa.comhttp://www.headcasela.comhttp://www.impactmfginc.com Risks and Challenges  We've put together a strong supply chain, from the materials suppliers to manufacturers to shipping and fulfillment partners, and have full confidence that we can deliver product you’ll be proud to own for years to come.Once our campaign is completed and funded, we are ready to go straight into purchasing all the materials from our suppliers and then into production with our manufacturer. We will keep our backers updated throughout the process of the campaign and production to ensure that we deliver on time.A note on delivery date: As with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED  We are so confident you’ll love our product and cause that we guarantee it! When you receive your perk, if you’re not 100% satisfied with the design or quality simply send it back for a full refund of the purchase price (Shipping and handling fees are non-refundable). We’re pretty sure you’ll be more excited to show or wear your support than return it though! Meet The Team Bret A. YoungCEO / Creator                                                                                     Chase J. CarnahanWriter / DirectorRoyal T. BinionPhotographerMichael PerlmutterDigital Content  And that’s all there is to it.

story:
If you are reading this text, chances are that you are down with the brown, and you appreciate the musical talents of Ween. If not, then it is time to inform your self. This campaign is solely for the appreciation of Ween and to give an original concept based on the Boognish to those who also appreciate. The Boognish is the most iconic symbol that represents the music, so out of curiosity I re-created the symbol as an earthy entity engulfed in wood and tree. The re-creation became something aesthetically appealing so it was then decided to construct some shirts with this design on the front.

  To achieve this goal on my own I will need the help of other Weeners! If you donate $30 ($25 for shirt $5 for S/H) or $50 for 2, choose your size and color (any size any color) you will receive your shirt(s) by the end of the campaign which will last 30 days. Be aware that only 50 are going to be made! These shirts will be printed with high quality ink from a garment printer onto soft American Apparel shirts. The designs on the shirt will consist of a wooden Boognish on the front and a Tibetan calligraphy style of writing with a hidden message on the back of the shirt. For those of you who can guess what the image says you will receive an extra gift in your package. If the specified goal here is not reached, all of the funding will still continue to go to the construction of these shirts and then to each buyer.

  If this sounds like something you can dig on, then get a shirt or two. Only going to print 50 according to the specified colors and sizes. Remember to share this with others to spread awareness. Thanks for your time, looking forward to creating these beauties for ya!

  Also if you like what I do you can peep my instagram @imperial_peasant_tree and check for more information on my work. Will have more original artwork and original shirts to come.

If you donate make sure you get a hold of me on facebook so I can document your name and what you want.
