story:
The PASSION

  1. To open a luxury Pop Up Store in each of the top 5 Luxury Department store chains in the world
  2. To Help rebuild the lives of women and girls who are victims of the sex trafficking trade
  3. To reward a specific number of contributors with UNPRECEDENTED PERKS for their generosity and support of my company and this cause
  • My name is Jacob Taylor, CEO/Founder of PATRIARCH FASHION COMPANY™. I am a Passionate lover of life and all things Fashion. As an Entrepreneur, I have the Freedom and distinct pleasure of following my heart in an attempt to better the world through the vehicles of Fashion and Philanthropy.
  • My Love of Fashion began as an early teenager, when I used to design sneakers and submit them to The NIKE™ Corporation as "design suggestions" (LOL) for sneakers I "thought" they should release. They would send me letters thanking me for my submissions, but failed to return my designs. Right then and there, I knew that I had the Passion to excel in this industry. 
  • As I grew up, my Passion for design really took off when I became a contracted Spacesuit Lab Tech for N.A.S.A. I was responsible for breaking and redesigning spacesuits according to the highest standards, (literally, life and death.)
  • It also helped that I grew up in close proximity to all 4 of the major Fashion "Meccas" in the world; London, Paris, Milan and New York.
  • My desire to help people is generational. I come from a long line of givers and noble people who care for others and stand up for what they believe in.

The PURPOSE

  • My desire is to utilize the funds that we raise in 3 specific ways:
  • 1.) Special inventory production; 2.) Retail Rental Space; 3.) Infrastructure/Equipment Upgrading
  • Any Funds raised beyond our goal, will be utilized to enhance the customer service experience on the back end (special edition merchandise/Holiday Exclusive merchandise/Credit Towards future merchandise)
  • Now here is what separates us from every other Luxury Fashion brands: 
  • 1.) All contributors will receive UNPRECEDENTED PERKS
  • 2.) Some contributors will receive Rewards That Remain, FOR LIFE. I repeat, FOR LIFE.  
  • 3.) All Contributors will be named as Supporters of the "Winnable" War against sex trafficking, which includes bi-monthly updates, via our newsletter, concerning exactly how the seed money is being used to combat this dehumanizing trade. 
  • 4.) ALL CONTRIBUTORS WILL BE REWARDED; SOME, FOR LIFE.
  • Concerning the importance of your contributions: You will be helping us to reconstruct and restore the lives of women and girls who are victims of this "trade."

The PROMISE

We need at least $15,000 to:

  • secure the retail space within the department store
  • produce necessary inventory (specifically) for the Pop Up Store(s)/Perks Program
  • Update our business infrastructure (I.E. Top Accounting software and equipment upgrades)
  • In the unlikely event that we don't reach our goal, we will still Reward All Contributors according to the perks program.

The PLAN of IMPACT

  • A portion of the proceeds of every sale of our branded merchandise will go to organizations that assist in rebuilding the lives of those in or affected by the sex trafficking trade .
  • Bi-monthly updates via our newsletter, which will feature real time stories about the victims whose lives have been reclaimed from this dehumanizing trade.
  • Any and all donations are Appreciated.
  • Though all donations are appreciated, in the event that we do not make our goal, that which we do collect will be utilized to (at least) initiate the number "1" and "2" of 'The PASSION' part of our description. (see The PASSION above)

Risks?

As With any goal, there are usually challenges and potential risks in achieving that goal. The Good News is that there is virtually no risk in donating to this cause due to the integral relationships that have been built and sustained both with the corporate offices of the department store chains and the rapidly growing community of supporters.

  • Basically, we must pay for retail space.
  • We must produce the specific inventory for the Pop Up stores (which is separate from our regular inventory).
  • We must Reward You for giving!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Hey, don't feel bad if you cannot contribute. We understand. All We ask is that you spread the word.
  • We encourage you to use social media, and word-of-mouth

LINKS:

www.patriarch.shoes
www.jacobtaylornewyork.us
FACEBOOK/TWITTER/INSTAGRAM/PINTEREST: @patriarchshoes and @jacobtaylorNY
YOUTUBE Links: (some of the products that contributors will receive upon closure and funding of the campaign)
***PATRIARCH FOOTWEAR: www.youtube.com/thepatriarchchannel
***JACOB TAYLOR NEW YORK: www.youtube.com/jacobtaylorNY
Thank You in advance for all your support!
Stay Tuned for More Updates via YouTube and Social Media!

Sincerely,
The Patriarch Fashion Company™
Beverly Hills, CA 90209

story:
Short Summary

I'm Sara and I'm a designer.

I have a boutique in a nice village on beautiful Lake Maggiore, Italy.
Fashion is not only my job but a true passion.

My husband Moreno supports me and is by my side in this journey.

Here are a few pics of my boutique

Entrance


Interior

Interior

Interior detail

Travelling in our country we met many people who do great things thanks to their passion, their love for tradition and innovation as well.

That’s where Racconto comes from: in Italian Racconto means Tale.

I want to tell the story of this beautiful country and its talented people through fine fashion products, made with care using natural fibers, available both in my boutique and in Racconto online shop.

Contributing to Racconto you will be part of the story.

So enjoy with me this Italian journey !


What we need and what you get

With your contribution I want to make real the Racconto capsule collection fall/winter 2015.

This is the color schemes inspiration for the collection

And these are a few sketches with possible articles of the Racconto capsule collection f/w 2015




I think that Racconto fashion products should be easily available online, to make the Italian Journey possible from wherever you are.

In order to achieve the complete Racconto fashion collection we aim to reach €40000 (forty thousands).

We plan to use the funds as follows:

-  € 3500 web site with online shop

-  € 2500 brand and packaging design

-  € 9000 marketing, advertisement

-  € 25000 development and production of the capsule collection f/w 2015

Contributing will grant you interesting perks based on the contribution, going from an original thank you note to a fine product of the Racconto fashion collection up to a stay in a luxury hotel on the beautiful lake Maggiore in Italy.

Every contribution counts !
If the goal will not be completely reached we will make good use of your help. The following progressive spending plan shows what will be accomplished based on the level of contribution.

-  € 2500 brand and packaging design

-  € 6000 brand and packaging design, web site with online shop

-  € 31000 brand and packaging design, web site with online shop, development and production of the capsule collection f/w 2015

-  € 40000 Racconto collection completed!

-  more than € 40000 more products for the collection f/w 2015


The Impact

Since opening my boutique I have been looking for the right products to offer as I feel better selling products I believe in.

I met craftsmen who express real excellence in what they do, so I decided to work with them to create a collection which is affordable yet with all the quality you deserve from real Made in Italy clothing.

I want the Racconto fashion collection made with attention to details, nice to wear and conceived with love.

Fine yarns knitwear and fashion accessories will make the Racconto Capsule Collection Fall/Winter 2015.

The Capsule Collection color range will include a color scheme chosen by Indiegogo contributors between the following.

Color Scheme 1

Color Scheme 2

Risks & Challenges

The main risk is underfunding. To overcome it we defined a progressive spending plan in order to achieve sure results based on the level of contribution.

My knowledge of this domain and our experience in managing the supply chain ensure that the development of the new collection is possible in a professional way.


Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you just can't contribute with money but it doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Tell about this campaign to your friends, especially those who might be interested in our project.
  • If you find something which is not clear, just let us know: your feedback is appreciated.

story:
At BootstrapFashion, our vision is to unite the fashion community and become the leading online customized fashion design platform. And our mission is to bring integrity and heart to the fashion industry and offer unlimited design possibilities for the BootstrapFashion community while empowering all involved.

We help aspiring designers, do-it-yourselfers and creative consumers design, make or buy custom fashion. They can start and grow their own design or home sewing business, earn extra income or simply be part of something creative and exciting while doing what they love. Together we will revitalize the fashion world by enabling INDIVIDUALS to be THE driving force in the fashion industry.

It's time for fashion evolution!  Say goodbye to the exclusive, elitist fashion establishment and say hello to the future of fashion creation: more collaborative, more convenient, more affordable and more fun than before. 

BootstrapFashion will create 2,000,000 indie designers and home seamstresses and change the face of the fashion industry forever.  

Our easy-to-use Design Center gives aspiring fashion designers of all ages, abilities and experience levels access to a range of design tools and resources to create their very own custom designs and outfits. The result: fashion pros and fashion dreamers alike can get everything they need to bring their design ideas to life -- easily, affordably and quickly.

We offer B2B marketplace with all the tools necessary to launch or grow a successful business:
  • powerful and simple design tools
  • access to world-class tailors, seamstresses
  • source factories and suppliers
  • your own branded storefront
    •
Rich social community
  • collaborate, connect and get inspired 
  • become a fashion muse and influencer

Fashion Mall for consumers

  • shop custom designed fashion
  • find a local tailor, seamstress or designer
  • get your own style made by professionals


Easily illustrate unique designs and flat technical sketches, render them with color and fabric and automatically get made-to-measure well-fitting sewing patterns within minutes.

Find the right tailor or seamstress to custom make your design, or find a factory that will manufacture your unique garments and accessories in quantities of one or thousands.

Then, post it in our marketplace and get orders for your designs, without having to produce them ahead of time. 


  


The comprehensiveness and affordability of our entire solution gives it applications for a broad range of design enthusiasts, ranging from home seamstresses all the way up to major fashion brands. 

People who will benefit from our services: 

Creative shoppers
Fashion Bloggers
Home DIY seamstresses
Aspiring designers 
Dressmakers
Fashion design students
Indie and beginner designers
Small- to medium-sized apparel manufacturers and importers
Large apparel manufacturers and importers 




Introducing Design Center, the first of its kind fashion design software. It is an easy-to-use, point-and-click app that delivers unique designs and custom-fit sewing patterns in minutes.


Fashion Design Genius Pro Explainer from BootstrapFashion on Vimeo.

Once you have completed your design, the next step is to customize the fit to your unique body. Simply enter a few key measurements, your fit preferences and the types of fabric you want to use and our unique, automated 3D fit technology will generate a sewing pattern just for you. Petite or plus-sized? Apple- or pear- shaped? Short legs or long torso? No problem. Women, men, and children of all shapes and sizes can finally have clothing that is customized to their specific, individual taste, preferences and figure — all for a fraction of the cost of the luxury and designer brands. 





BootstrapFashion was founded by Yuliya Raquel, a four-time award winning fashion designer, who in the past revolutionized the contemporary plus-size fashion industry segment. Her keen and experienced eye for fashion has allowed her to dress a number of renowned celebrities, such as Oscar winner Gabourey Sidibe, and has also earned her a place within the most popular and widely consumed fashion magazines, such as Glamour, InStyle, Oprah, and the like. Not only does Yuliya have a passion for innovative fashion design, but she also focuses on empowerment: she wants to transform the way we consider beauty and democratize fashion. 


Don Straub, Co-Founder and COO, an experienced brick-and-mortar entrepreneur, spent 6 years conducting leadership programs for Landmark Worldwide, a top educational company that specializes in professional and personal development. Having honed his skills throughout his various leadership projects, he now focuses specifically on bootstrap funding BootstrapFashion, managing the project,  and strategic operational planning.

 

Sahil Goyal, Head Software Engineer and partner and an amazing developer, Has worked at Amex India on solution delivery systems. He built the entire BootstrapFashion platform and also designed and built the Custom Design App.



Victor Lazarev, Chief of Pattern Technology, received Masters degree in Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics from Lomonosov Moscow University. His early work involved rocket science and he lauched his first software company in 1989. Since then he has taught himself pattern making skills and earned numerous awards from Intel. In 2011 his proprietary 3D pattern customization SaaS won First Place and the Grand Prize at Intel competition.



Our Advisers

Anton Vorontsov, consultant/CFO, has 15 years of strategic financial plannning, P&L analysis and business strategy with work experience including MasterCard, McKinsey & Company and PricewaterhouseCooper. Anton holds an MBA in Finance, Accounting and Entrepreneurship from the University of Chicago.

 


Gary Jinks, adviser, Startup Wiz worked with hundreds of startups and at BootstrapFashion helps with strategic and operational planning and business development. 




Catherine Schuller, ambassador/adviser,

The full figured fashion industry icon, former Ford Model, actress and comedienne, Certified Image Professional with the Association of Image Consultants International. Was a Fashion Editor at MODE Magazine and Media Spokesperson for Charming Shoppes. Teaches at Fashion Institute of Technology in NYC and a founder of Runway the Real Way.



The rise of Etsy and other similar maker-focused sites over the past few years has dramatically altered the DIY landscape. Trends toward custom design, artisan quality and quick turnaround point to the customers' desire for less inflated pricing and individual and unique pieces. 


Our  FREE Fashion Design Genius, is currently hosted on Bootstrapfashion.com and outfitted with an entire selection of pre-designed sewing patterns. With the success of Fashion Design Genius, we released Fashion Design Genius Pro, a patent-pending revolutionary custom apparel design app.



Unlike commercially bought patterns, which can only be licensed for personal use and have a poor fit, various companies have co-opted our exciting, diverse sewing patterns for their commercial products and projects. Functioning companies are already actively implementing our patterns: Poppy and Bloom, Sydney’s Closet and MyrdaJ, along with many others, have taken advantage of what we offer to help create their collections.

"BootstrapFashion has given me the opportunity to have great patterns at my fingertips for my fashion line. Without it, I would have spent countless hours on patterns, grading and fit. I am beyond excited to be one of their loyal subscribers! This program is a real game changer for the fashion industry!" MyrdaJ, an Indie fashion designer.




We've been through a very long creative process since March of 2013. From early concept development to design sketches, to building the design software and social platform, to custom-fit patternmaking and testing our custom fit calculator with thousands of users. It's all led us to the beautiful, fully loaded BoostrapFashion social platform ready to launch on March 1, 2016.  Up to this moment we have been true to our name and we have NOT taken a penny from outside investors, bootstrapping all the way.

Why do we need the money?

We’ve built a revolutionary social network that features everything one needs to design and make a single item or quantities of thousands. 

The Design Center can now generate 250,000 unique designs, and custom-fitted sewing patterns.

The Fashion Mall and Find Services sections are helping designers, seamstresses and fashion consumers alike to connect, work together, creating thousands of small business worldwide allowing international collaboration, providing new sources of revenue and enriching local economies.

But we need your help to bring our vision to the next level. Your support will provide additional server space, technical support, better UX/UI, design libraries and features that will revolutionize the entire fashion industry.



We believe we have developed a platform that will radically transform the way fashion is created, both in the United States and the world. No longer will top-brand designers be the only ones that set the standards in fashion. With  BootstrapFashion, we are leveling the playing field and making fashion creation easy, affordable and fun, so that the next great fashion innovation can come from anywhere and anyone. BootstrapFashion is yet another company delivering on the promises of the Internet and its ability to accelerate creation and spark inspiration. 

The BootstrapFashion team would like to thank you for taking the time to learn more about our company. We thank you for your consideration and look forward to seeing you on our site in the exciting times ahead!
story_txt:
At BootstrapFashion, our vision is to unite the fashion community and become the leading online customized fashion design platform. And our mission is to bring integrity and heart to the fashion industry and offer unlimited design possibilities for the BootstrapFashion community while empowering all involved.We help aspiring designers, do-it-yourselfers and creative consumers design, make or buy custom fashion. They can start and grow their own design or home sewing business, earn extra income or simply be part of something creative and exciting while doing what they love. Together we will revitalize the fashion world by enabling INDIVIDUALS to be THE driving force in the fashion industry.

It's time for fashion evolution!  Say goodbye to the exclusive, elitist fashion establishment and say hello to the future of fashion creation: more collaborative, more convenient, more affordable and more fun than before. BootstrapFashion will create 2,000,000 indie designers and home seamstresses and change the face of the fashion industry forever.  Our easy-to-use Design Center gives aspiring fashion designers of all ages, abilities and experience levels access to a range of design tools and resources to create their very own custom designs and outfits. The result: fashion pros and fashion dreamers alike can get everything they need to bring their design ideas to life -- easily, affordably and quickly. 

We offer B2B marketplace with all the tools necessary to launch or grow a successful business:

 powerful and simple design tools
access to world-class tailors, seamstresses
source factories and suppliers
your own branded storefront

Rich social community

collaborate, connect and get inspired 
become a fashion muse and influencer


Fashion Mall for consumers


shop custom designed fashion
find a local tailor, seamstress or designer
get your own style made by professionals





Easily illustrate unique designs and flat technical sketches, render them with color and fabric and automatically get made-to-measure well-fitting sewing patterns within minutes. 
Find the right tailor or seamstress to custom make your design, or find a factory that will manufacture your unique garments and accessories in quantities of one or thousands. 
Then, post it in our marketplace and get orders for your designs, without having to produce them ahead of time. 



  


The comprehensiveness and affordability of our entire solution gives it applications for a broad range of design enthusiasts, ranging from home seamstresses all the way up to major fashion brands. 
People who will benefit from our services: 
Creative shoppersFashion BloggersHome DIY seamstresses
Aspiring designers 
Dressmakers
Fashion design students
Indie and beginner designers
Small- to medium-sized apparel manufacturers and importers
Large apparel manufacturers and importers 








Introducing Design Center, the first of its kind fashion design software. It is an easy-to-use, point-and-click app that delivers unique designs and custom-fit sewing patterns in minutes.
